18.18: pau-lo cvj yem Ko-lin-To zivb Zamb Nxi teij Eei. Ga'haaq ninb Zauj syenj ye-su Eei kxb muag kxvq liud leib Yaav waag, pau-lo Zauj Jyenq pitg-sinj-laa Zauj aa-Kwin-laa pia'g Ravq mivb si-lia teib puv. yem Ken-Ke-lia uaq zang, pau-lo Teij Revg Ba'pyei weig zu'g ninb Zauj Tinb huvb lcvd vcvg waag.
18.8: kruj wig txvb Eei myenb koj uaq taub Kaa-litq-patg Zauj ninb Eei pyauq zov myenb syenj zyruq Revg. cvj maaib Ko-lin-To zivb Eei myenb Zamq Eei haid liud tod zyrug syenj cvj Jiaj uam Eei leid.
18.3: cvj Zauj ninb Bua yem Jwavg kov zruj weig zu'g pau-lo Navq uaq teij i Mwavq nx, zruj Dopg liub Eei zavg.
18.21: ninb mivb uaq zang, ninb kxvq, “sij kxvq ei Tinb huvb Eei za'eij yia cvj taaib Rung meib Bua naaiq.” ninb zyrug pia'g Ravq Zwrtq e-fe-so zivb a'q.
18.14: pau-lo xij kxvq waag uaq zang, kan-li-o zyrug kxvq Daavg Buaj yiu-Tai myenb, “sij kxvq ninb zruj waaig fai zruj haiq Euvg x'q Eei sig, yia hxpg zu'g lovg nxig mwavj.
18.23: yem Zaamj uaq, ninb cvj mivb yrub kaa-laa-Tia Zauj faa-li-Jia teib puv Tevj syenj ye-su Eei myenb syenj henq Jyenq faauj.
18.6: yiu-Tai myenb Zauj ninb txib tekg, kxvq to'g ninb uaq zang, pau-lo zyrug sru ninb Eei lwib hruj Eei niab Buv yaag kxvq, “meib Bua zu'g taig Eei zwid meib Bua kanb xij zu'g Daamb txv. zwid maiq Dxtq zu'g yia a'q. yavb naaiq Jiaj yia mivb lxd Janj.”
18.2: yem uaq ninb pwavb zu'g taub yiu-Tai myenb, Buaj heug aa-Kwin-laa, yem pxn-Tatq teib puv Zwrtq seij Eei myenb. ninb Zauj ninb Eei auq, pitg-sinj-laa, yem i-taa-li kua'q Ko'q ho'g pyauj taaib yem Ko-lin-To zivb, weig zu'g Kaa-laau-Di-atg huvb hatg yetg zuvq yiu-Tai myenb Zwrtq lo-maa zivb. pau-lo mivb lxd ninb Bua
18.20: zwavj myenb lyrub ninb yem uaq kaub laub teij mq paag ninb maiq lcvd.
18.24: maaib taub yiu-Tai myenb, Buaj heug aa-px-lo, taaib Tauj e-fe-so zivb. ninb se yem aa-lekq-saan-De-lia zivb Zwrtq seij Eei myenb. ninb zunb tod kxvq waag Byaavg yaag hiuq tu'q kivb sru Truj.
18.28: weig zu'g ninb txv zwavj Rcv hivb yiu-Tai myenb. ninb lovg kivb sru pun Ziv ye-su se tovb ki-tug.
18.7: pau-lo Zwrtq uaq nxm wig txvb mivb, yem taub zavg Tinb huvb Eei Janj Eei pyauq. naaiq taub Janj Eei Buaj heug Ti-Ti-atg-yu-saa-Tatq. ninb yem wig txvb Eei ka'Len.
18.19: Tauj e-fe-so zivb, pau-lo Zauj pitg-sinj-laa, aa-Kwin-laa Bua i Mwavq pun Gxi txig. pau-lo pia'g wig txvb mivb Zauj yiu-Tai myenb lwrnj leid.
18.17: Zwrtq mivb ninb Bua zyrug Eau Jyenq kruj wig txvb Eei myenb koj, soj-saa-Te-netq, yem uaq sig txvb Eei kcvb Daavg Bx'q. mq paag kan-li-o maiq kunq ninb Bua a'q.
18.27: aa-px-lo xij Jiaj Tauj aa-Kaa-yaa scvq, e-fe-so Eei Jiub paav myenb Tevj Jyenq yaag fiaq fyenj Buaj aa-Kaa-yaa scvq Eei syenj ye-su Eei myenb zipq ninb. aa-px-lo mivb Tauj uaq, ninb Tevj Kauj Tinb huvb Eei en syenj liud uaq teij myenb Zamq,
18.11: pau-lo zyrug yem Havb pyenj uaq, zx'q Tinb huvb Eei tod Faauj ninb Bua.
18.5: si-laa Zauj Ti-mo-Tai yem maa-si-Do-nia teib puv taaib Tauj, pau-lo kuq Jyenq lovg ninb Eei zyavb hog zunb tod Navq, kxvq mevb Buaj yiu-Tai myenb ye-su se tovb ki-tug.
18.9: maaib mwrnd nx, pau-lo pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig. zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og. kunq kxvq Jyenq mivb, maiq tuvq tivb,
18.16: kxvq liud, kan-li-o zyrug zung ninb Bua Zwrtq sig txvb mig a'q.
18.4: nxmb nxm tivb kov Nxi, pau-lo mivb uaq wig txvb Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Zauj Janb kikg lwrnj leid Kwinj ninb Bua syenj.
18.10: weig zu'g yia Zauj meib yem. zuvq maiq maaib haiq taub zruj haiq Euvg hxig meib, weig zu'g yem naaiq nxm zivb maaib yia Eei myenb Zamq Eei.”
18.22: Tauj si-saa-li-yaa zivb, ninb Zwrtq Ravq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem. pwavb liud Jiub paav txig ninb cvj mivb an-Ti-okg zivb.
18.12: kan-li-o zruj aa-Kaa-yaa scvq Eei zuvj uaq zang, yiu-Tai myenb tovb Hruq mivb zx'q pau-lo txb mivb uaq sig txvb.
18.15: mq paag meib Bua Rcv Einb tauj Erud, Rcv Buaj, Rcv meib Bua kanb Eei leid. sweib meib Bua kanb Beng a'q. yia maiq xij Tevj meib Bua Paaiq naaiq teij sig.”
18.13: ninb Bua koj ninb kxvq, “naaiq laanb myenb Faauj myenb zavg Tinb huvb mq paag Faauj ninb Bua zavg txvg leid.”
18.1: Ga'haaq pau-lo Zwrtq aa-Ten zivb cvj mivb Ko-lin-To zivb.
18.26: aa-px-lo yem wig txvb puvj laavg Eei zunb tod Faauj myenb. pitg-sinj-laa Zauj aa-Kwin-laa haid ninb kxvq zyrug zipq ninb mivb ninb Bua Eei pyauq cvj kxvq Tinb huvb Eei Jauq pun ninb kaub hiuq tu'q Rxib.
18.25: ninb tu'q ho'g Jiaj zyruq Eei Jauq zyrug Jxm Hruq Faauj pun myenb hiuq tu'q ye-su, yaag Faauj tu'q zyen Eei. mq paag ninb Kuvj hiuq tu'q maaib yo-han Tevj myenb Jiaj uaq Euvg leid Navq.

8.18: si-mon pwatg kovb zob Bua lovg puad maan Jyenq myenb, yaag pwatg Tinb huvb Zeij sivj livb pun ninb Bua, ninb zyrug txb Eaanb taaib xij pun pi-te Zauj yo-han.
8.8: uaq nxm zivb Eei myenb zyrug Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g haig a'q.
8.33: ninb zu'g myenb paaig ninb Eei Myen, lovg maanb leid hxig ninb. maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q kxvq Tauj ninb Eei funb fa'q weig zu'g ninb yem paamb ken Eei mcvg Jiaj Revg mig a'q.”
8.3: mq paag sau-lo xij myetg Jiub paav, ninb zyrug zweib pyauq lxd syenj ye-su Eei myenb mJavg msia'q zx'q Tx mivb wrnj Jyenq lob.
8.32: tomb Jyen to'g uaq trug kivb sru Eei waag Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “ninb Navq taub pa'ki yuvb nx, zu'g txb mivb taij, yaag Navq taub pa'ki yuvb txn zu'g myenb Japq pyei, ninb yaag maiq Ko lo.
8.21: meib yem yia Bua Eei kov maiq maaib meib Eei pwrng, weig zu'g Tinb huvb pwatg meib Eei Hruq maiq zivj.
8.35: fi-lipq zyrug Jiad kxn lovg naaiq trug kivb sru kxvq ye-su Eei Kuq fyenj pun tomb Jyen mwavj.
8.40: Ga'haaq myenb pwatg fi-lipq yem uaq aa-so-Tatq zivb. ninb yem naaig zweib muvq zweib laavd zunb Jyenq Kuq fyenj mivb Tauj si-saa-li-yaa zivb.
8.14: kovb zob Bua yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb haid kxvq saa-maa-lia myenb zipq tu'q Tinb huvb Eei tod mig a'q. ninb Bua zyrug Paaiq pi-te Zauj yo-han mivb ninb Bua uaq.
8.23: yia pwatg meib Eei Hruq pa'la'g mweig Jia'q haig, zu'g zwid Dob Jyenq a'q.”
8.6: zwavj myenb haid fi-lipq kxvq Eei waag yaag pwatg ninb zruj Zwrtq Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig, ninb Bua zyrug lovb lovj Eei mwavj.
8.34: uaq taub tomb Jyen naaig fi-lipq, “Toq meib Buaj yia og. naaiq taub trug waag myenb kxvq zu'g haiq taub? kxvq zu'g ninb kanb fai kxvq zu'g kanb taub?”
8.2: maaib teij kan lovj Tinb huvb Eei myenb txb saa-Te-fen Eei sei mivb zavj, Hruq Raub haig, Fiag Qa'q Eyemq Byrub Byrub Eei.
8.36: ninb Bua zweid Jyenq maab Zia mivb kau, Tauj nxm txvj pwatg maaib uam Eei. uaq taub Jyen kxvq, “mavg kaaj, naaiq maaib uam Eei. maaib haiq Euvg pun yia maiq kcvb haib Jiaj tu'q uam Eei leid fai?”
8.20: pi-te tau ninb, “laaij meib Namq taaib haib lovg zinb Eaanb maaid tu'q Tinb huvb Eei zivb Eeig, meib Zauj meib Eei zinb Eaanb yetg zuvq zu'g myetg maa'b!
8.24: si-mon kxvq Buaj pi-te Zauj yo-han, “Toq meib Bua Tevj yia tauj kauj Toq zyruq maiq tuvq pun yia zu'g Navq meib Bua kxvq uaq nx og.”
8.28: fi-lipq zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb a'q. maaib taub e-Ti-o-pia kua'q Eei tomb Jyen Tevj e-Ti-o-pia huvb maag, Kaan-Daa-sij, kruj ninb Eei yetg zuvq zinb Eaanb. naaiq taub tomb Jyen mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb paaij Tinb huvb Rwrnj, zweid Jyenq maab Zia to'g Jyenq trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, Eei sru Rwrnj.
8.7: Yiab kwaiq myenq yem myenb Eei sin vaaub vaauq Eei heug Jyenq Zwrtq. zauj Bai zauj waaig Eei myenb tu'q zxg lovj Zamq haig.
8.29: sivj livb kxvq Buaj fi-lipq, “meib xij zu'g zung zaaig uaq Jaaj maab Zia yaag nitq Jyenq ninb Eei ka'Len mivb maa'b!”
8.19: ninb kxvq, “Toq meib Bua pun naaiq Euvg Qa'q yia, pun yia haib lovg puad maan haiq taub, uaq taub zyrug tu'q zipq sivj livb.”
8.17: pi-te Zauj yo-han lovg puad maan Jyenq ninb Bua, taub taub zyrug tu'q zipq sivj livb mig a'q.
8.38: kxvq liud, ninb heug maab Zia tivb Jyenq. ninb Bua i taub zyrug pia'g uam. fi-lipq yaag Tevj tomb Jyen Jiaj uam Eei leid.
8.31: tomb Jyen tau, “maiq maaib haiq taub Pxq mevb Buaj yia, yia fuvg haib hiuq tu'q?” ninb zyrug heug fi-lipq faauj taaib zweid Jyenq ninb Eei maab Zia.
8.30: fi-lipq zyrug Tiuj Jyenq mivb Tauj ninb Eei ka'Len, haid tomb Jyen to'g Jyenq trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, Eei sru. fi-lipq zyrug naaig kaaj, “meib to'g Jyenq naaig nxm txvj, meib mevb pc'g Eei saa'b?”
8.39: ninb Bua Zwrtq uam taaib, zyruq Eei sivj livb lyemb zeib txb fi-lipq mivb mig a'q. tomb Jyen zyav naaig cvj maiq tu'q pwatg ninb a'q. mq paag tomb Jyen Fyenb yrub Eei kan Jyenq Jauq Rwrnj.
8.11: si-mon zruj faatq pun myenb Bua'g hxvb haig, ninb Bua zyrug kan ninb laub a'q.
8.5: fi-lipq mivb Tauj saa-maa-lia scvq Eei yetg nxm zivb zunb Buaj myenb ki-tug se tovb ye-su.
8.9: maaib taub myenb, Buaj heug si-mon, yem uaq nxm zivb zruj faatq laub teij a'q, pun saa-maa-lia myenb Bua'g hxvb haig ninb. ninb Zev ninb kanb se yetg taub zruj Lo Eei myenb.
8.16: weig zu'g sivj livb maiq kcvb Fiag Zauj haiq taub yem. myenb Kuvj tevq zyruq ye-su Eei Buaj Jiaj uam Eei leid Navq.
8.37: fi-lipq tau, “sij kxvq meib lyepg tivg Hruq syenj, Jiaj tu'q Eei lx'g.” uaq taub Jyen kxvq, “yia syenj a'q. yia syenj ye-su ki-tug se Tinb huvb Eei txn.”
8.4: pyauj Raanj uaq teij syenj ye-su Eei myenb mivb Tauj haaij, ninb Bua zunb Jyenq Kuq fyenj mivb.
8.10: maiq kunq haaij hxvb myenb, yetg zuvq xij mwavj ninb Eei waag. ninb Bua kxvq, “naaiq laanb myenb maaib yem Tinb huvb taaib Eei Qa'q. se tovb myenb heug, ‘tomb Qa'q’ uaq taub.”
8.22: meib xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg Revg naaiq Euvg waaig haig Eei za'eij. meib yem Hruq Namq Zwrtq naaiq teij waaig sig mq paag meib xij zu'g tauj kauj Toq, Riaj zyruq haib kwavg Gxi pun meib mq pei.
8.12: mq paag fi-lipq zunb Kuq fyenj kxvq Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb yaag kxvq ye-su ki-tug Eei Jaub lrug. zwavj myenb syenj ninb Eei waag, lyemb mJavg msia'q Jiaj uam Eei leid Revg.
8.15: pi-te Zauj yo-han mivb Tauj, zyrug Tevj syenj Eei myenb tauj kauj, Toq Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua zipq sivj livb,
8.13: si-mon kanb yaag syenj. ninb Jiaj liud uam Eei leid. ninb zanb zang kan Jyenq fi-lipq mivb yaag Bua'g hxvb haig fi-lipq zruj Eei tomb Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig.
8.1: naaiq teij myenb taij saa-Te-fen, sau-lo yaag a'Neiq Eei. tovb uaq Nxi myenb Jiad kxn zruj to'g hxig ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei Jiub paav myenb Kruq haig. Zwrtq liud kovb zob Bua, syenj ye-su Eei myenb yetg zuvq pyauj Raanj, mivb yem yu-Dia scvq Zauj saa-maa-lia scvq.
8.26: maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb taaib Buaj fi-lipq, “xij zu'g mivb naamb puv mcvj, yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb mivb kaa-saa zivb uaq tiub Jauq.” (naaiq tiub Jauq Jiaj teib puvb Waav.)
8.25: pi-te Zauj yo-han zruj liud zxvb zevj yaag zunb liud zyruq Eei tod, ninb Bua Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. Rwrnj uaq zang ninb Bua yavb saa-maa-lia scvq Eei Zamb nxm laavd zunb Jyenq Kuq fyenj Rwrnj.

3.18: zinb Daavg Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb kxvq ki-tug xij zu'g syrug Kruq. ib zang ninb lovg naaiq Euvg za'eij pun naaiq teij waag Zwrtq taaib zyen Eei.
3.8: ninb piu Jiad sin taaib Jiad kxn yavb Jauq a'q. ninb zyrug kan pi-te Zauj yo-han pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, yavb Jyenq mivb, piu Jyenq mivb, Zev Jyenq Tinb huvb mivb.
3.3: pwatg pi-te Zauj yo-han xij pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, ninb zyrug kan ninb Bua Toq Eaanb.
3.21: ki-tug zuvq xij zu'g yem Tinb txvb zuaq Tauj Tinb huvb lyepg Euvb Euvg syav Eei zyavb hog, Navq lob Nxi Tinb huvb pun ninb Eei Zivb Revg trug waag myenb trug taaib kxvq nx.
3.14: meib Bua Gemb maiq lovg Zivb Revg, pcvb fim Eei uaq taub. taauj Rwrnj Toq pi-laatq puvj taij myenb uaq taub pun meib Bua.
3.23: haiq taub maiq mwavj ninb Eei waag zyrug zu'g Pai kwavg, myetg Revg, maiq pun Zauj Tinb huvb Eei myenb yem a'q.’
3.6: mq paag pi-te cvj kxvq Buaj ninb, “Jyem Eaanb yia maiq maaib og. mq paag yia maaib Eei, yia xij pun meib. tevq naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su ki-tug Eei Buaj, Jiad sin taaib yavb Jauq maa'b!”
3.2: maaib taub yemb Txi waaig, zauj Bai Eei myenb. myenb Nxib Nxi txb ninb mivb zweid Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg, tovb myenb heug “kcvb Rweig,” uaq taub kcvb, kan pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei myenb Toq Eaanb.
3.20: yaag xij Paaiq ye-su taaib, tovb ninb weig meib Bua kinq zyavj zruj ki-tug, uaq taub.
3.24: “zwavj trug waag myenb yem saa-mu-en Fiag taaib, ta'faanb trug Tinb huvb Eei waag uaq teij, kxvq Tauj naaiq teij Nxib Eia'g Zwrtq taaib Eei sig.
3.7: pi-te zyrug nanq Jyenq uaq laanb myenb Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad, Ken ninb Jiad sin taaib sruq Jyenq. zaub penq Zauj zaub mweig lyemb zeib henq taaib maaib Qa'q.
3.19: weig naaiq, meib Bua xij zu'g kxiq Hruq Rwrnj taaib lxd Tinb huvb, pun ninb sxtq kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid. zyruq zyrug pun meib Bua Eei Hruq maaib zyavb hog Eyemd, fivq Jiad taaib,
3.17: “zwavj kxb yrud aa'b! yia hiuq tu'q meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei Jyen zruj pun ye-su se laaij meib Bua maiq hiuq Zivj taaib zruj.
3.11: naaiq laanb myenb Zxg nanq Jyenq pi-te Zauj yo-han uaq zang, zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug Tiuj Jyenq mivb lxd ninb Bua yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Eiag uaq Qovj, Buaj heug “saa-lo-mxn Eei pivj laavb txvj.”
3.5: ninb zyrug mavg, laaig ninb Bua xij pun haiq Euvg mq pei.
3.9: zwavj myenb pwatg ninb yavb Jyenq Jauq Zev Tinb huvb,
3.16: se ninb Eei Buaj Eei Qa'q pun naaiq laanb zauj Bai Eei myenb henq taaib. meib Bua pwatg Eei Zauj hiuq Eei yem naaiq laanb myenb Zwrtq taaib Eei sig se weig syenj ye-su Eei Buaj. weig syenj Kauj ye-su naaiq laanb myenb Zivj taaib lovj Revg, Navq meib Bua yetg zuvq pwatg Jyenq nx.
3.4: ninb Bua nu'g nu'q Eei mavg Jyenq zauj Bai Eei myenb. pi-te kxvq, “mavg yia Bua maa'b!”
3.10: ninb Bua zia'q tu'q se tovb aab log yem kcvb Rweig Eei kcvb Daavg Toq Eaanb uaq laanb myenb. zwavj myenb za'kevb! Bua'g hxvb haig, Namq maiq mevb pc'g naaiq laanb myenb Eei Jaub lrug.
3.22: mo-se kxvq, ‘zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, xij Paaiq taub trug waag myenb Navq yia nx. ninb yaag zruj taub meib Bua kanb Eei myenb. ninb Buaj haiq Euvg meib Bua, meib Bua xij zu'g mwavj Revg ninb Eei waag.
3.12: pi-te pwatg zwavj myenb Navq naaiq nx taaib mavg zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua weig haiq tiug Bua'g hxvb naaiq teij sig? meib Bua Qa'q mavg yia Bua, laaig yia Bua lovg yia Bua kanb Eei Qa'q fai yia Bua kan tu'q lovj Tinb huvb Zivj taaib haib pun naaiq laanb myenb yavb Jauq fai?
3.15: meib Bua taij pun myenb maaib zyavb mcvg uaq taub, mq paag Tinb huvb pun ninb cvj navb taaib. yia Bua zyrug weig naaiq teij sig zruj zxvb zevj.
3.13: maiq zeid. se apg-laa-ham, i-sakg Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb, yaag zruj Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb uaq taub, pun ninb Eei pru, ye-su, tu'q Favb laavg. meib Bua yaag zx'q ninb Jiu pun myenb taij. pi-laatq tivg Hruq puvj ye-su mq paag meib Bua yem pi-laatq Eei Ra'Myen vcvg Jyenq.
3.1: maaib Nxi Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog, se txij zu'g mivb tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog, pi-te Zauj yo-han mivb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq.
3.26: Tinb huvb pun ninb Eei pru navb taaib, ninb Paaiq taaib lxd meib Bua Daavg, Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua, pun meib Bua taub taub kxiq Hruq kwavg meib Bua zruj waaig Eei Jauq.”
3.25: Tinb huvb pun ninb Eei trug waag myenb trug taaib Eei waag Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij lcvd Jiaj Eei vcvg waag, meib Bua yaag tu'q Jwavg Jyenq Ripg, Navq ninb kxvq Buaj apg-laa-ham, ‘yia xij lovg meib Eei zeib fun Zeij fu'q pun luvb Diaq maang fivj.’

21.18: ta'Eeig Nxi pau-lo Zauj yia Bua mivb yaa-kxpg uaq. Jiub paav Eei myenb koj yetg zuvq yaag yem uaq Eei.
21.8: ta'Eeig Nxi yia Bua cvj mivb si-saa-li-yaa muvq. Tauj uaq yia Bua hitq zunb Kuq fyenj uaq taub fi-lipq Eei pyauq. naaiq taub fi-lipq tovb zinb Daavg yem ye-lu-saa-lem Jiub paav kinq taaib Eei uaq teij siag taub Eei yetg taub.
21.33: tomb pcvb pyeiq mivb Tauj zyrug zx'q pau-lo cvj heug pcv lovg i tiub Lia'g limg Dob Jyenq. ninb naaig kaaj, “naaiq haiq taub? ninb zruj haiq Euvg?”
21.3: mivb kau, mavg pwatg sai-patg Kxib Rru zyrug Jiaj ninb Eei naamb puv mivb si-lia teib puv. Tauj Tai-la'q zivb, Ravq xij puvj huaj Fiag, yia Bua zyrug Zwrtq uaq a'q.
21.32: ninb zyrug txb teij pcvb pyeiq Zauj pcv, Tiuj Jyenq mivb ninb Bua uaq. zwavj myenb pwatg tomb pcvb pyeiq Zauj pcv, ninb Bua zyrug tivb, maiq Bx'q pau-lo a'q.
21.21: ninb Bua haid kxvq meib yem Janj Eei teib puv Faauj zwavj yiu-Tai myenb kwavg mo-se Eei leib latg. meib yaag Buaj ninb Bua maiq zu'g Tevj fu'Jweiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid yaag maiq zu'g ei Bua yiu-Tai myenb Eei leib fivj.
21.35: Tauj uaq Teib kxn zwavj myenb Zyruq haig, pcv zyrug Lxpq pau-lo faauj kub vwaaig.
21.40: tomb pcvb pyeiq Gxi Rwib pun ninb kxvq. pau-lo sruq Jyenq Teib taaub Wavj puad Buaj myenb sekq. zwavj myenb sekq mivb, pau-lo zyrug lovg hipq-lu waag Zauj ninb Bua kxvq.
21.14: Dovg haaij kxvq pau-lo yaag maiq mwavj. yia Bua zyrug maiq kxvq a'q. Kuvj kxvq, “Toq zyruq ei Jyenq ninb Eei za'eij zruj.”
21.23: meib xij zu'g ei yia Bua Eei waag zruj. yem yia Bua naaiq maaib pyei laanb myenb Zauj Tinb huvb lcvd Jiaj vcvg waag.
21.6: yia Bua pia'g Ravq. uaq teij yaag Rwrnj pyauq mig a'q.
21.34: zwavj myenb maaib teij Navq naaiq kxvq, maaib teij Navq uaq kxvq. tomb pcvb pyeiq zx'q maiq zu'g zyen kxnb pcvj weig zu'g myenb lung haig. ninb zyrug heug pcv txb pau-lo mivb pcv yem Eei txvj uaq.
21.2: yem uaq pwatg maaib Pruj Ravq xij mivb fi-ni-sia teib puv, yia Bua zyrug pia'g Ravq mivb a'q.
21.36: zwavj myenb kan Jyenq Ga'haaq mivb Kib Kuvj Kaatq Eei kxvq, “taij ninb kwavg a'q.”
21.20: yem uaq Eei myenb haid ninb kxvq liud naaiq teij sig zyrug Zev Tinb huvb, cvj Buaj pau-lo, “tomb kxj aag, meib hiuq Eei. maaib ziaj waang yiu-Tai myenb syenj ye-su. yetg zuvq yaag Jxm Hruq kan leib latg.
21.24: meib xij zu'g kan Jyenq ninb Bua mivb yaag Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua saaj wij, Tevj ninb Bua Zwrtq saaj wij Eaanb, ninb Bua zyrug haib Teij Ba'pyei a'q. Navq naaiq zruj, zwavj myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q ninb Bua haid uaq teij waag se maiq zyen. meib kanb yaag ei Jyenq leib latg zruj.
21.28: naub naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! Tevj yia Bua maa'b! tovb naaiq laanb myenb mivb nxmb nxm txvj Faauj myenb mavg Piaj Bua yiu-Tai myenb Zauj Bua Eei leib latg Zauj naaiq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq. maiq taan uaq Euvg Navq, ninb yaag txb Janb kikg pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad, pun naaiq nxm Zivb Revg txvj maaib wij.”
21.7: yia Bua yem Tai-la'q yavb Ravq mivb Tauj Tx-le-mi Zauj yem uaq Eei kxb yrud kxvq wig pwavb waag cvj Zauj ninb Bua yem Nxi uaq.
21.29: (ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g ninb Bua pwatg yem e-fe-so zivb taaib uaq taub to-fi-matq Zauj pau-lo yem zivb ka'Euad zyrug laaig pau-lo txb ninb pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq.)
21.19: pau-lo kxvq liud wig pwavb waag, ninb zweib yetq zweib Eeig Eei kxvq Revg Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx lovg ninb yem Janj Eei txvj zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig.
21.17: mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem, syenj ye-su Eei myenb a'Neiq zipq yia Bua.
21.38: uaq Euvg meib maiq zeid zinb Daavg Zeuj lung txb pyei Zin za'g pcv mivb teib puvb Waav uaq taub i-yipq myenb fai?”
21.31: zyavb kwanb myenb xij taij pau-lo uaq zang, lo-maa tomb pcvb pyeiq haid fyenj kxvq ye-lu-saa-lem myenb lung Revg.
21.30: zyavb nxm zivb Eei myenb zyrug lung Revg, Dutg Dutg Eei Tiuj taaib zx'q pau-lo Tx Zwrtq zi'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq. zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb zyrug lyemb zeib kwrn Jyenq a'q.
21.27: uaq teij siag Nxi aaq lamb pwavq, maaib teij e-sia scvq taaib Eei yiu-Tai myenb pwatg pau-lo yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq. ninb Bua Zo'q zwavj myenb yaag zx'q pau-lo,
21.11: ninb taaib lxd yia Bua, zx'q pau-lo Eei hrub Laav Dob Jyenq ninb kanb Eei puab zauj yaag kxvq, “sivj livb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei yiu-Tai myenb xij Navq naaiq nx Dob Jyenq naaiq tiub hrub Laav Eei zyruq yaag Jiu pun yem Janj Eei puab Diaq.’+”
21.5: mq paag yem yetg nxm leib paaij liud, yia Bua Zwrtq Jauq mivb a'q. yetg zuvq syenj ye-su Eei myenb, lyemb ninb Bua Eei aub Jweiq, Zauj Jyenq fuvj yia Bua Zwrtq zi'g zivb mivb Kxib Len, yem uaq Byenj kweig Fiag tauj kauj. tauj kauj liud, kxvq liud leib Yaav waag,
21.9: ninb maaib pyei taub sia'q maiq kcvb lovg Goj. ninb Bua yaag tu'q zivb Eeig trug Tinb huvb Eei waag.
21.16: maaib teij yem si-saa-li-yaa Eei saib kxj kan Jyenq yia Bua mivb yaag txb yia Bua mivb yia Bua xij zu'g hitq uaq taub maa-naa-sanj Eei pyauq. maa-naa-sanj se yem sai-patg Kxib Rru taaib Eei myenb yaag zruj taub syenj Daavg Jiaj uaq paan saib kxj.
21.37: pcv xij txb pau-lo pia'g ninb Bua yem Eei txvj ka'Euad uaq zang ninb kxvq Buaj taub pcvb pyeiq, “Toq pun yia Zauj meib kxvq Jruj waag, tu'q Eei fai?” tomb pcvb pyeiq kxvq, “meib haib kxvq kikg waag Eei?
21.39: pau-lo tau, “yia se yiu-Tai myenb, Zwrtq seij yem si-li-sia scvq, Taa-satq zivb, tovb maaib mevb hog uaq nxm tomb zivb Eei pc'g fivj. Toq pun yia Zauj naaiq teij zwavj myenb kxvq waag og.”
21.4: yem uaq yia Bua lxd pwatg syenj ye-su Eei myenb zyrug Zauj ninb Bua yem yetg nxm leib paaij. sivj livb lovg ninb Bua Buaj pau-lo maiq tuvq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
21.10: yem ziaj Nxi uaq, maaib taub trug waag myenb, Buaj heug aa-kaa-Batg, yem yu-Dia scvq taaib.
21.22: uaq Euvg, Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj? ninb Bua zuvq haid kxvq meib taaib Tauj naaiq taaib a'q.
21.12: haid liud naaiq teij waag yia Bua Zauj yem uaq Eei myenb Qa'q Toq pau-lo maiq tuvq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
21.15: Ga'haaq yia Bua Beng zyavj ka'naaiq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem.
21.13: pau-lo tau, “meib Bua weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx Eyemq pun yia Eei Ba'Riu yu'g Revg? yia zunq tivg Hruq maiq taan Eung pun myenb Dob Navq, mq paag weig zyruq ye-su Eei Buaj Eung yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb pun myenb taij.”
21.1: Zauj zwavj myenb kxvq liud leib Yaav waag, Ravq pcv za'g Eei mivb Tauj Kotg Kxib Rru. ta'Eeig Nxi yia Bua mivb Tauj lo-De Kxib Rru cvj mivb paa-Taa-laa muvq.
21.26: ta'Eeig Nxi pau-lo zyrug txb uaq teij myenb yaag Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua saaj wij. ninb cvj pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Buaj sai myenb cvj maaib Bu'ziaj Nxi Zivj pwavq saaj wij Eei Nxi. Tauj uaq Nxi sai myenb xij zu'g weig ninb Bua taub taub lovg ka'naaiq ziag pun Tinb huvb.
21.25: mq paag syenj ye-su Eei Janj c'q, zinb Daavg Bua fiaq fyenj ei Bua tivg taaib Eei waag Buaj ninb Bua, ‘xij zu'g keg maiq tuvq Eang ziag Jiaj miub favj Eei haiq Euvg ka'naaiq, maiq tuvq Eang Ryaamq, maiq tuvq Eang nc'g Jaav taig Eei scvb Kuq xq, yaag maiq tuvq zruj maiq lwrnj hxvg Eei sig.’+”

14.18: kovb zob Bua kxvq naaiq teij waag tonq ninb Bua mq paag Kaaq teij kxvq maiq hivb. zwavj myenb Zxg xij txb ka'naaiq taaib ziag pun ninb Bua.
14.8: yem li-saa-taa muvq maaib laanb yemb Txi zauj waaig Eei myenb zweid Jyenq uaq, maiq yavb Jiaj Jauq.
14.3: pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg yem uaq laub Eei, puvj laavg Eei kxvq zyruq Eei tod. zyruq yaag pun ninb Bua zruj Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig Zamq Eei, pun Ziv ninb Bua zunb zyruq Zeij en Eei tod se zyen Eei.
14.21: pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg yem De-Bi zivb zunb Kuq fyenj zyrug tu'q myenb Zamq Eei taaib zruj saib kxj. Ga'haaq pau-lo Bua Rwrnj li-saa-taa muvq, i-Ko-ni-yum zivb Zauj pi-si-Dia teig Eei an-Ti-okg zivb,
14.14: Baa-naa-Batg Zauj pau-lo haid myenb kxvq ninb Bua xij Navq naaiq nx zruj, ninb Bua zyrug petq kanb Eei lwi, Tiuj pia'g zwavj myenb ka'Euad mivb, naub naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq,
14.23: yem nxmb nxm Jiub paav ninb Bua xn myenb zruj myenb koj. ninb Bua tauj kauj, zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg zyrug zx'q naaiq teij myenb koj fuvj pun ninb Bua syenj Kauj uaq taub zyruq.
14.6: mq paag kovb zob Bua hiuq tu'q zyrug pyauj mivb li-Kaa-o-nia teig Eei li-saa-taa muvq Zauj De-Bi zivb Zauj Wiv Rwrnj uaq teij txvj,
14.2: mq paag maiq syenj uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb Zo'q Janj pun ninb Bua maaib Hruq xij zruj to'g uaq teij kxb yrud.
14.20: mq paag syenj ye-su Eei kxb yrud taaib weib Jyenq ninb, ninb zyrug Jiad sin taaib cvj pia'g muvq. ta'Eeig Nxi ninb Zauj Baa-naa-Batg cvj mivb De-Bi zivb.
14.24: pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg cvj Jiaj pi-si-Dia teib puv mivb Tauj pam-fi-lia.
14.28: ninb Bua yaag Zauj saib kxj Bua yem laub Eei.
14.19: maaib teij yiu-Tai myenb yem an-Ti-okg Zauj i-Ko-ni-yum taaib Duaq zwavj myenb Zauj ninb Bua tovb Hruq lovg la'pyeiq zov pau-lo. zov liud, Tx Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g zivb, laaig ninb taig mig a'q.
14.17: mq paag ninb haiq zang zruj lovj pun Bua, zruj zxvb zevj piuj mevb ninb zyavb Jyenq Eei. ninb pun luvb twib Byuvg, pun kcvb zwavj ei Zunb Zyru Zwrtq tu'q hxpg. ninb yaag pun meib Bua Eang peuq, Fyenb yrub haig.”
14.27: Rwrnj Tauj an-Ti-okg, pau-lo Bua heug zwavj Jiub paav kapq zunq. ninb Bua zyrug kxvq Tinb huvb Tevj ninb Bua zruj Eei Jaub lrug, yaag kxvq Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx Kxi Jauq pun Janj syenj ye-su.
14.11: zwavj myenb pwatg, ninb Bua lovg li-Kaa-o-nia waag naub naug Eei heug, “maaib zyenb Waaj penj myenb Eei sin Fiag Bua naaiq taaib a'q lo'b!”
14.5: uaq zang, maaib teij Janj Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Zauj ninb Bua zruj Lo Eei myenb Zaavb laavb zruj to'g pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg, xij zx'q la'pyeiq zov ninb Bua.
14.9: ninb zweid Jyenq uaq mwavj pau-lo kxvq. pau-lo nu'g nu'q Eei mavg, pwatg ninb maaib syenj fim haib zxg tu'q zauj lovj,
14.16: lob Nxi Tinb huvb pun maang fivj sweib ninb Bua kanb Eei Hruq zruj.
14.4: zivb Eei zwavj myenb zyrug pun Gxi Revg. maaib teij kan yiu-Tai myenb, maaib teij kan kovb zob Bua.
14.10: zyrug lovg Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq, “Jiad sin taaib sruq Jyenq za'g Eei maa'b!” uaq laanb myenb zyrug lyemb zeib Gwa'q Jiad sin taaib yavb Jauq.
14.22: yem uaq teij txvj Tevj saib kxj Bua syenj wrnq yaag Kwinj ninb Bua haiq zang xij zu'g kan lovj syenj ye-su Eei Jauq, yaag Buaj ninb Bua, “Bua xij zu'g tiaq Zamb Euvg Kruq naang Zivj taaib haib tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q.”
14.12: Baa-naa-Batg ninb Bua Zwrtq Buaj heug sutq. pau-lo ninb Bua heug he-metq, weig zu'g ninb zunb tod kaub Zamq.
14.15: “meib Bua weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq zruj lcb? yia Bua yaag paamb myenb Navq meib Bua nx. yia Bua taaib zunb Kuq fyenj Buaj meib Bua kwavg Gxi naaiq teij henb sig cvj lxd zyavb Jyenq Eei Tinb huvb, tovb zeij luvb zeij Dau zeij Kxiq yaag zeij yem naaiq teij ka'Euad Eei maang mwrtg ka'naaiq uaq taub.
14.13: sutq zyenb Eei miub pyauq yem zivb ka'Eiag. sutq Eei sai myenb txb vovb kruq, txb pyavb taaib Tauj zivb kcvb xij Zauj zwavj myenb ziag pun pau-lo Bua.
14.1: Tauj i-Ko-ni-yum zivb, pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Navq yetg kau nx, mivb yiu-Tai myenb Eei wig txvb. ninb Bua zunb tod maaib eij leid haig zyrug maaib yiu-Tai myenb Zauj Janj syenj Zamq Eei.
14.26: yem naaig pia'g Ravq Rwrnj si-lia teib puv, an-Ti-okg zivb mig a'q. naaiq nxm zivb se tovb zinb Daavg saib kxj Bua zx'q pau-lo Bua fuvj pun Tinb huvb ei ninb Eei en kruj, Tevj ninb Bua haib zruj Zwrtq ib zang zruj zyavj naaiq teij kov.
14.25: yem uaq pe-kaa zivb zunb liud tod, ninb Bua zyrug Fiag Tauj atg-Taa-li-yaa muvq.

23.18: pcvb pyeiq zyrug txb ninb mivb pwavb tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug kxvq, “wrnj lob uaq taub pau-lo Toq yia txb naaiq taub hrub scv taaib. ninb maaib Jruj waag xij taaib Buaj meib.”
23.8: weig zu'g saa-Du-sij myenb maiq syenj myenb taig mivb cvj haib navb taaib, maiq syenj maaib finb myenb, yaag maiq syenj maaib myenq, mq paag faa-li-sij myenb syenj naaiq teij pua Euvg zuvq maaib Eei.
23.33: mivb Tauj si-saa-li-yaa zivb, ninb Bua zx'q fyenj pun zuvj yaag Jiu pau-lo pun ninb mig a'q.
23.3: pau-lo kxvq, “Myen Rweig Hruq Zyruq Eei myenb aa'b!  Tinb huvb yaag xij Baij meib a'q. meib zweid naaig lovg leib latg tunj yia Eei sig, mq paag meib kanb yaag zruj txvg leib latg Buaj myenb Baij yia.”
23.32: ta'Eeig Nxi yavb Jauq Eei pcv taauj sin Rwrnj. Kuvj keb maad Eei pcv kanb fuvj ninb mivb Navq.
23.21: mq paag Toq meib maiq tuvq mwavj ninb Bua Eei waag weig zu'g maaib feij zyepg levb taub zuaq Jyenq Daamb Jauq. ninb Bua Druq Jiad zyruj kxvq ninb Bua maiq Eang yaag maiq hopq haiq Euvg Tauj tu'q taij pau-lo kwavg. ninb Bua Beng zyavj a'q, Kuvj zuaq Jyenq meib Gxi Rwib pun pau-lo mivb Eei waag Navq.”
23.35: “zuaq koj meib uaq teij myenb taaib Tauj, yia zyrug mwavj meib Eei kxnb pcvj.” kxvq liud, zuvj zyrug Paaiq pcv txb mivb yem he-lotq Eei huvb ting kruj Jyenq.
23.14: ninb Bua mivb sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj Bua uaq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “yia Bua lomb Rxib Druq Jiad zyruj Lo Eei. yia Bua maiq Eang haiq Euvg Tauj tu'q taij kwavg pau-lo.
23.23: tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug heug i taub pcvb pyeiq taaib Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua xij zu'g liug leid zyavj Eig pc'q taub yavb Jauq Eei pcv, Zyetq zyepg taub keb maad Eei pcv, Zauj Eig pc'q taub Daam Zav Eei pcv. ib mwrnd Duab nxm zyavb hog xij zu'g Zwrtq Jauq mivb si-saa-li-yaa zivb.
23.6: pau-lo pwatg yem uaq Eei zwavj myenb maaib teij se saa-Du-sij myenb, maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb. ninb zyrug heug Bwi Eei Buaj kunq sig wig Eei myenb, “kxb yrud aa'b! yia yaag faa-li-sij myenb, yaag zruj faa-li-sij myenb Eei txn. yia yem naaiq zu'g syemq se weig zu'g yia maaib lamb Namq. yia syenj myenb taig mivb cvj haib navb taaib.”
23.34: zuvj to'g liud fyenj, ninb naaig kaaj pau-lo ninb yem haiq nxm scvq taaib Eei myenb. hiuq tu'q pau-lo yem si-li-sia taaib ninb zyrug Buaj pau-lo,
23.2: aa-naa-nia tomb sai myenb heug sruq Jyenq pau-lo Eei ka'Len uaq teij myenb Baij pau-lo Eei Rwib.
23.20: uaq taub hrub scv kxvq, “zruj Lo uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb tovb Hruq Toq meib Fav Nxi txb yia Eei tomb naud pau-lo mivb ninb Bua Eei kunq sig wig uaq. ninb Bua xij zruj Navq xij hiuq ninb Eei Jauq kaub mwrng teij.
23.24: yaag xij zu'g liug leid maad pun pau-lo keb, kruj Jyenq ninb Jauq zavg pcvb xn Eei mivb fe-likq zuvj uaq.”
23.28: yia xij hiuq tu'q ninb Bua weig haiq tiug koj ninb zyrug txb ninb mivb Tauj ninb Bua Eei kunq sig wig uaq.
23.7: pau-lo Navq naaiq nx kxvq, faa-li-sij myenb Zauj saa-Du-sij myenb Rcv Jiad Jaaj taaib. wig Eei zwavj myenb zyrug pun Gxi zruj i kwanb mig a'q.
23.29: yia zyrug hiuq tu'q ninb maiq txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taij fai zig tu'q wrnj lob. ninb Bua koj Eei se Rcv yiu-Tai myenb Eei leid Navq.
23.19: tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug Ken uaq taub hrub scv mivb levb teij naaig ninb, “meib maaib haiq Euvg xij Buaj yia?”
23.17: pau-lo zyrug heug taub pcvb pyeiq taaib Buaj ninb, “Toq meib txb naaiq taub hrub scv mivb tomb pcvb pyeiq uaq. naaiq taub txn maaib Jruj waag xij kxvq Buaj ninb.”
23.31: pcv zyrug ei Jyenq tomb pcvb pyeiq Eei waag zruj. uaq mwrnd ninb Bua fuvj mivb an-Ti-paa-ti muvq uaq.
23.30: yia hiuq tu'q maaib teij myenb taaq za'eij xij zx'q ninb Eei mcvg, yia zyrug lyemb zeib fuvj ninb mivb meib naaig. yia yaag heug koj ninb uaq teij myenb mivb meib uaq koj.”
