20.7: uaq nxm leib paaij Eei taaub Nxi  uaq mwrnd, tovb yia Bua kapq zunq mc'q Fuaq  uaq zang, pau-lo kxvq waag Faauj zwavj myenb. ninb hiuq tu'q ta'Eeig Nxi ninb xij zu'g Zwrtq Jauq zyrug kxvq waag Daauq Eei, Tauj Daamq mwrnd.
20.29: yia hiuq tu'q yia leib Gxi meib Bua liud, Ga'haaq maaib Zyruq haig Eei Yiab Juq xij pia'g meib Bua ka'Euad. ninb Bua yaag maiq Eaavg naaiq teij yuvb.
20.19: yia Eyemg kanb zruj faij, yaag maaib uamb mweig lyrug Jyenq fub suj zyruq yaag zu'g ziaj Euvg Kruq weig zu'g yiu-Tai myenb taaq za'eij hxig yia.
20.17: yem mi-le-Tatq zivb, pau-lo Paaiq myenb mivb e-fe-so zivb Buaj Jiub paav Eei myenb koj taaib pwavb ninb.
20.38: ninb Bua kaub Raub Jiaj se weig ninb kxvq Ga'haaq hivq maiq tu'q cvj pwatg ninb Eei Myen uaq Jruj waag. ninb Bua zyrug lomb Rxib fuvj pau-lo mivb pia'g Ravq a'q.
20.31: xij zu'g kiv Hruq Javj Jyenq. pua Havj ka'Euad yia zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd maaib uamb mweig lyrug Jyenq Kwinj meib Bua taub taub.
20.30: yem meib Bua ka'Euad zuvq xij maaib myenb zx'q zyen leid Tiuq penj Jaaq leid Duaq syenj ye-su Eei myenb mivb kan.
20.27: weig zu'g yia zx'q Tinb huvb Eei za'eij yetg zuvq zunb Buaj meib Bua Revg mig a'q, maiq lyrub yetg Euvg.
20.11: pau-lo cvj faauj kub vwaaig mivb zx'q Fuaq taaib mc'q pun Gxi Eang cvj kxvq waag laub Eei, Tauj luvb Fav, zyrug mivb mig a'q.
20.5: naaiq teij mivb Daavg yem uaq to-atg zuaq yia Bua.
20.9: maaib laanb myenb lunj myenb, Buaj heug yu-Ti-katg, zweid Jyenq fov mwrnb mwavj pau-lo kxvq waag laub haig, zyrug mFxmb ta'Vatq. pau-lo kxvq Jyenq waag mivb, yu-Ti-katg zyav naaig mFxmb Do Eei, yem pua Ravb pyauq Dxtq Fiag Tauj Dau. myenb mivb Lxpq Jiad taaib pwatg taig mig a'q.
20.16: pau-lo tivg Hruq maiq hitq e-fe-so zivb, maiq xij yem e-sia scvq laub. haib kaanq tu'q hivb nx, ninb xij mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Daavg syru syavb Byaub Eei zipq.
20.37: zwavj myenb Eyemq Revg, Qam Jyenq pau-lo Eei Jaav zom.
20.4: Zauj ninb mivb Eei myenb maaib yem Be-lo-aa zivb taaib uaq taub pi-latq Eei txn, soj-paa-Te, Zauj yem Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa zivb uaq teij i taub aa-litq-Taa-Katq Zauj sej-Kun-Datg, Zauj yem De-Bi zivb uaq taub kaai-atg, cvj maaib Ti-mo-Tai yaag maaib e-sia scvq uaq teij i taub Ti-Ki-katg Zauj to-fi-matq.
20.10: pau-lo Fiag mivb Baapq Fiag Qam Jyenq uaq taub txn yaag kxvq, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj, ninb Zxg maaib mcvg Eei.”
20.22: “ib zang weig sivj livb aapq yia, yia zyrug mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, mq paag Tauj uaq xij pwavb zu'g haiq Euvg sig yaag maiq hiuq.
20.12: zwavj myenb txb uaq taub maaib mcvg zyavb Jyenq Eei txn Rwrnj pyauq, haid Hruq fov Revg a'q.
20.15: yavb Ravq mivb, ta'Eeig Nxi yia Bua Tauj Ki-otg Kxib Rru. cvj ta'faam Nxi Jiaj mivb Tauj saaj-mxtq Kxib Rru, cvj ta'feij Nxi yia Bua mivb Tauj mi-le-Tatq zivb.
20.13: yia Bua pia'g Ravq mivb atg-sotg zivb Daavg, xij yem naaig zipq pau-lo Zauj yia Bua pia'g Ravq. naaiq se pau-lo kanb tivg zyavj, weig zu'g ninb xij yavb Jauq kan Byenj mivb.
20.1: zivb Eei myenb lung paag, Ga'haaq pau-lo heug syenj ye-su Eei zwavj myenb taaib zunq. ninb Kwinj liud yaag kxvq liud leib Yaav waag zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb maa-si-Do-nia teib puv.
20.26: weig naaiq yia lovb lovj Eei kxvq, sij kxvq meib Bua haiq taub zu'g myetg, zwid maiq Dxtq zu'g yia.
20.25: “yia mivb mivb taaib taaib yem meib Bua naaiq zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj pun meib Bua mwavj. ib zang yia hiuq tu'q Ga'haaq hivq meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg yia Eei Myen a'q.

24.18: ninb Bua pwatg yia yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ei leid saaj liud wij a'q. uaq zang maiq maaib myenb Zamq Zauj yia kapq zunq yem, yia yaag maiq Zeuj lung.
24.8: yaag kxvq koj pau-lo uaq teij myenb xij zu'g taaib meib naaiq koj. sij kxvq meib kanb zaab naaig ninb, meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia Bua koj ninb naaiq teij sig se za'kevb zyen Eei.”
24.3: yia Bua haiq taub yem haiq nxm txvj a'Neiq haig yaag za'kevb maaib Hruq lcvd zivb meib.
24.21: sij kxvq txvg tovb naaiq Du'g Euvg Navq, yia yem ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen uaq zang yia heug Jyenq kxvq, ‘yia ib Nxi yem naaiq zu'g syemq zwid se weig zu'g yia syenj myenb taig mivb mq paag cvj haib navb taaib.’+”
24.14: “mq paag yia Eyemg pun meib, yia kan tovb ninb Bua heug Jaaq uaq tiub Jauq, zavg yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb. mq paag yia yaag syenj Revg mo-se Eei leib latg Zauj Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb Eei sru.
24.23: ninb yaag Buaj pcvb pyeiq kruj lovj pau-lo, pun ninb mivb mivb taaib taaib teij, yaag maiq tuvq laanb ninb Eei haiq taub myenb. sweib ninb Bua taaib liug leid teij ninb.
24.6: maiq taan Zua'q sig Navq, ninb lyemb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq xij pun maaib wij, yia Bua Zivj taaib zx'q ninb, xij ei yia Bua Eei leid syemq zwid.
24.2: txb pau-lo pia'g taaib, Te-Tu-latq zyrug Jiad kxn koj pau-lo a'q. ninb kxvq, “fe-likq tomb zuvj aa'b! weig meib zruj zuvj yia Bua Eei teib puv tu'q Taaib pcvb laub Eei. kua'q zavg maaib haiq Euvg maiq penj, meib yaag zxg lovj Jyenq faauj.
24.20: maiq zei nx, ib zang yem naaiq Eei myenb pwatg yia yem kunq sig wig uaq zang txvg haiq Euvg, ninb Bua xij zu'g kxvq a'q.
24.24: Jiaj taaib Zamb Nxi teij, fe-likq Zauj ninb Eei auq, Du-sinj-laa, taaib. ninb Eei auq se yiu-Tai myenb. fe-likq heug pau-lo taaib zyrug mwavj ninb kxvq syenj ki-tug ye-su Eei Jaub lrug.
24.7: mq paag uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq, li-syetq, taaib Qavq maanb Zaavq ninb yem yia Bua Eei puab Diaq Zwrtq taaib,
24.19: mq paag maaib teij yem e-sia scvq taaib Eei yiu-Tai myenb. sij kxvq naaiq teij myenb maaib haiq Euvg sig xij koj yia, ninb Bua zuvq hxpg zu'g taaib meib naaiq koj a'q.
24.17: “yia leib ye-lu-saa-lem zivb ziaj Havj a'q. Ga'haaq cvj Rwrnj mivb weig txb teij Eaanb Tevj Zauj yia Jwavg fivj Eei myenb, yaag txb ka'naaiq mivb fovg hxg pun Tinb huvb.
24.27: i Havj Jiaj liud, px-si-atg fe-saa-Tatq taaib zruj zuvj tiq fe-likq. fe-likq xij yiu-Tai myenb a'Neiq ninb zyrug maiq puvj pau-lo, Zxg Kwrnj Jyenq uaq lob.
24.11: yia mivb ye-lu-saa-lem paaij Tinb huvb se maiq kcvb Jiaj zyepg Eeig Nxi. naaiq meib kanb naaig tu'q Zwrtq Eei.
24.5: “yia Bua pwatg naaiq laanb myenb Kuvj Zua'q sig Navq, Duaq luvb Diaq yiu-Tai myenb lung Revg. ninb yaag zruj taub naa-saa-letq uaq Jauq myenb Eei pyeiq zeiq.
24.9: yiu-Tai myenb yaag fib Navq Eei kxvq koj pau-lo uaq teij sig yetg zuvq zyen Eei.
24.16: weig naaiq yia lovg Revg Qa'q yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen Zauj zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen zanb zang lovg zyepg zua'q Eei laavb fim.
24.4: mq paag ib zang yia Bua maiq xij zxq meib Eei zyavb hog laub. Toq meib lovg nxig mwavj yia Bua kxvq i ziaj Jruj waag og.
24.10: fe-likq zuvj uq Buaj pau-lo kxvq, pau-lo zyrug kxvq a'q. ninb kxvq, “yia hiuq tu'q meib yem naaiq nxm kua'q tunj sig tu'q Zamb Havj a'q. yia zyrug a'Neiq taaib meib naaiq kxvq yia Eei sig pun meib mwavj.
24.22: fe-likq zuvj hiuq tu'q uaq tiub Jauq mwrng teij Eei, zyrug hitq Fiag naaiq teij sig cvj kxvq, “zuaq tomb pcvb pyeiq, li-syetq, taaib Tauj, yia zyrug tunj meib Eei sig.”
24.12: koj yia naaiq teij myenb maiq pwatg yia yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Rcv haiq Euvg Jaaj, yaag maiq pwatg yia yem haiq nxm wig txvb fai zivb ka'Euad haiq Dau Zeuj lung zwavj myenb.
24.15: yia yaag Navq ninb Bua nx, Kauj Tinb huvb maaib lamb Namq, weig zu'g yia yaag syenj maiq kunq Kuq myenb fai x'q myenb, taig mivb mq paag cvj xij navb taaib.
24.13: ninb Bua koj yia naaiq teij sig ninb Bua lxd maiq tu'q haiq Euvg zruj zxvb zevj pun Ziv za'kevb Navq naaig.
24.1: Ga'haaq pyaa Nxi, aa-naa-nia tomb sai myenb Zauj teij myenb koj Zauj taub Zcvj sig myenb, Buaj heug Te-Tu-latq, mivb si-saa-li-yaa zivb yem zuvj Eei Ra'Myen koj pau-lo.
24.26: cvj maaib tiug, fe-likq yem Hruq Namq mRiaj pau-lo xij Rwid teij Eaanb mq pei, Zivj taaib zanb zang heug pau-lo taaib Zauj ninb kxvq waag.
24.25: pau-lo kxvq Tauj zruj hxpg Eei Jauq, kunq tu'q kanb, yaag kxvq Tauj xij taaib Eei syemq zwid Nxi. fe-likq kamb Riaj haig, Buaj pau-lo, “Bua'g naaiq kauj a'q. ib zang meib kunq mivb a'q. haiq zang maaib zyavb hog yia cvj heug meib taaib.”

28.18: ninb Bua syemq liud yaag maiq pwatg yia txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taij zyrug xij puvj yia.
28.8: pupg-li-atg Eei tia putq pcvg sin Jxm, ka'sia yaag fiaj Kruq Eei, pweij Jyenq Zruj. pau-lo pia'g mivb mavg, Tevj ninb tauj kauj liud, txb puad maan ninb Eei sin, pcvg zyrug lovj mig a'q.
28.3: pau-lo mivb lxd tu'q yetg paaq zaavb taaib puaq trud. an uaq trub Raug trud Jaamb zu'g Jxm, maaib tiub naavb to'g yem uaq zaavb Zwrtq taaib Ex'q Jyenq puad, maiq puvj kwavg.
28.21: mwavj Eei myenb tau, “yia Bua maiq tu'q zipq yu-Dia scvq Eei fyenj kxvq Tauj meib Eei sig, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub kxb yrud yem uaq taaib kxvq meib zruj txvg haiq Euvg.
28.14: Tauj uaq yia Bua pwavb zu'g teij syenj ye-su Eei myenb. ninb Bua Toq yia Bua yem yetg nxm leib paaij uaq. Navq naaig yia Bua zyrug mivb Tauj lo-maa zivb.
28.23: Navq naaig kxvq liud, ninb Bua zyrug tunj Nxi. Tauj ninb Bua tunj zyavj uaq Nxi maaib myenb kaub Zamq kapq zunq taaib yem pau-lo hitq Eei txvj. pau-lo zyavb Nxi zunb tod Tauj Mwavj, lovg mo-se Eei leib latg Zauj Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb Eei sru kxvq mevb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei tod yaag Kwinj ninb Bua syenj ye-su.
28.6: yem uaq Eei myenb laaig ninb haib omj fai Kiv uaq Dau taig mq paag mavg laub tavb Eei maiq pwatg fuvg. ninb Bua zyrug kxiq waag kxvq, “naaiq laanb myenb kevb! zruj taub zyenb a'q.”
28.2: yem uaq Eei pwrnb teig myenb zipq yia Bua lovj haig. twib Byuvg, Jwavq haig, ninb Bua zyrug puaq trud pun yia Bua Raauj.
28.20: weig naaiq yia heug meib Bua taaib txij Myen kxvq. i-saa-laa-en myenb maaib lamb Namq weig zu'g ninb Bua zuaq Jyenq maaib taub taaib. se weig ninb Bua zuaq uaq taub yia Zivj zu'g naaiq Lia'g limg Dob.”
28.24: pau-lo kxvq naaiq teij waag maaib teij zyrug syenj, maaib teij maiq syenj.
28.28: pau-lo cvj kxvq, “Navq naaiq meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq a'q. Tinb huvb Eei Fruj en ib zang zunb Tauj fivb fivj Janj, Janj yaag xij mwavj.”
28.7: leib uaq nxm txvj maiq navg ko maaib uaq nxm Kxib Rru Eei taaub myenb, Buaj heug pupg-li-atg, Eei Deig. ninb zipq yia Bua mivb yem pyauq pua Nxi yaag Jwav tu'q lovj haig.
28.29: pau-lo kxvq liud naaiq teij waag, yiu-Tai myenb zyrug Rcv Jyenq Jaaj Zwrtq.
28.19: mq paag yiu-Tai myenb Rcv Jyenq, yia zyrug maiq haib fuvg zruj. yia xij zu'g Toq pun lo-maa huvb tunj yia Eei sig. mq paag maiq zeid yia maaib haiq Euvg sig koj Zauj yia Jwavg fivj Eei myenb.
28.17: Ga'haaq pua Nxi, pau-lo Toq yiu-Tai myenb Eei myenb koj taaib. taaib Rxib, pau-lo kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “zwavj kxb yrud aag, yia maiq zruj haiq Euvg txvg Bua Eei myenb yaag maiq zruj txvg Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei leid, mq paag yia yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb zu'g zx'q zruj zwib myenb yaag zu'g Jiu pun lo-maa Jyen.
28.31: ninb puvj laavg Eei zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei tod, yaag zx'q zyruq ye-su ki-tug Eei Jaub lrug Faauj ninb Bua, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub laanb Jyenq a'q.
28.30: pau-lo yem ninb kanb kruq taaib Eei pyauq pwavq i Havj. haiq taub taaib lxd ninb, ninb a'Neiq zipq.
28.27: weig zu'g naaiq teij myenb Eei Hruq Rotq. ninb Bua zotq Jyenq mnxmb Kwrtq, yaag Fipq Jyenq mziv. maiq zei c'q, ninb Bua Eei mziv haib mavg tu'q pwatg, mnxmb haib mwavj tu'q haid. Hruq yaag haib mevb pc'g. Navq naaig ninb Bua zyrug Win Rwrnj taaib lxd yia, yia yaag xij zxg lovj ninb Bua.’+”
28.11: yia Bua yem mxn-taa Kxib Rru pua Laaj Eia'g cvj pia'g Ravq mivb a'q. uaq Pruj Ravq se yem aa-lekq-saan-De-lia zivb taaib yaag yem naaiq nxm Kxib Rru Jiaj tovb ken Nxi. Ravb mGxvq tiu Jyenq i taub zyenb Eei favj penj suvb kub vwaab txn, zruj Javb hog.
28.5: mq paag pau-lo fevj Dutq naav pia'g trub Raug. ninb yaag maiq penj haiq Euvg.
28.9: Navq naaiq nx zruj liud, yem Kxib Rru Eei putg pcvg myenb yetg zuvq taaib lxd pau-lo, taub taub zyrug zxg lovj Revg.
28.16: yia Bua Tauj lo-maa zivb, huvb Jaa sweib pau-lo yem ninb kanb Eei txvj, mq paag maaib taub pcv kruj Jyenq.
28.4: pwrnb teig myenb pwatg naav vaatg Jyenq pau-lo Eei puad saaib saaib uaq, ninb Bua zyrug kxvq, “naaiq laanb myenb kevb! taij Jiaj myenb a'q. yem Kxiq Fruj Zwrtq mcvg taaib mq paag luvb Dau maiq prug sevb ninb.”
28.10: ninb Bua yaag Taaib yia Bua, pun Zamb Euvg ka'naaiq zruj zivb Eeig. yia Bua xij pia'g Ravq Zwrtq uaq zang, yia Bua Qyemj zu'g Eei ka'naaiq ninb Bua yaag fuvj taaib an Jyenq Ravq.
28.22: mq paag yia Bua xij mwavj meib kanb Namq Zwrtq Eei Jauq, weig zu'g meib syenj uaq Euvg leid maiq kunq mivb Tauj haaij yia Bua yaag haid myenb taanb.”
28.12: pia'g Ravq mivb Tauj sai-laa-Kiu hitq pua Nxi uaq.
28.15: yem uaq Eei kxb yrud haid fyenj kxvq yia Bua taaib, ninb Bua zyrug Zwrtq mivb Tauj apg-pi-atg hei Zauj pua nxm Kc'g pyauq uaq teij i nxm laavd zipq yia Bua. pau-lo yetq pwatg naaiq teij myenb zyrug lcvd zivb Tinb huvb yaag haid Hruq lovj haig a'q.
28.13: yem naaig cvj mivb Tauj le-yi-um muvq. ta'Eeig Nxi maaib Ryaauj yem naamb puv mcvj taaib, Ga'haaq yetg Nxi zyrug Tauj pu-Ti-o-li muvq.
28.1: zwavj myenb yetg zuvq tu'q mcvg Zwrtq Revg, faauj Byenj mivb, yia Bua Zivj taaib hiuq tu'q naaiq nxm Kxib Rru Eei Buaj heug mxn-taa.
28.26: i-saa-yaa kxvq, ‘meib xij zu'g mivb Buaj naaiq teij pc'g fivj, maiq kunq Dovg haaij mwavj, meib Bua yaag maiq pia'g Hruq, Dovg haaij mavg, yaag maiq pwatg.
28.25: ninb Bua zyrug fiub Zovj Jyenq Zwrtq. maiq kcvb Zwrtq uaq zang pau-lo cvj Tipq waag. ninb kxvq, “sivj livb lovg trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, Zauj Bua Eei ovb Taaij kxvq tu'q hxpg haig.

7.18: zruj kau, cvj maaib taub syavb huvb kunq i-yipq teib puv. ninb yaag maiq hiuq tu'q yetg teij yo-sepq.
7.45: Ga'haaq Bua Eei ovb Taaij tu'q Ripg uaq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei Dopg liub yaag pyenb kan Jyenq yo-su-waa mivb. Tauj ninb Bua taaib Rcv teib puv, tovb Tinb huvb zung yem Daavg uaq teij myenb Twij Zwrtq naaiq nxm teib puv, ninb Bua pyenb Jyenq uaq nxm Dopg liub pia'g. Dopg liub yaag yem naaig Tauj Daa-witq huvb Eei luvb Diaq.
7.3: kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘xij zu'g kwavg Jyenq meib Eei teib puv Zauj meib Eei Zyenb Ze'q mivb yem tovb yia xij pun meib hiuq uaq nxm teib puv.’
7.43: meib Bua kcv mo-lekq zyenb Eei Dopg liub, yaag kcv le-faan zyenb Eei Leij, se meib Bua kanb zeij taaib zavg Eei miub favj. weig naaiq yia xij kwaatq meib Bua mivb Baa-Bi-lon Eei uaq Daavg mcvj.’
7.50: naaiq teij ka'naaiq yetg zuvq se yia kanb Eei puad zeij taaib maiq zeid?”+’
7.14: yo-sepq zyrug pun waag mivb Buaj ninb Eei tia, yaa-Kopq, Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Mwavq txig taaib. (yetg zuvq maaib Zyetq zyepg Mmd laanb myenb.)
7.48: “mq paag yem Lav Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb maiq zeid yem myenb zruj taaib Eei pyauq. Navq trug waag myenb kxvq,
7.34: yia pwatg yia Eei myenb yem i-yipq teib puv syrug Kruq, yaag haid ninb Bua Funb Jyenq yem. yia zyrug Fiag taaib xij Fruj ninb Bua. taaib maa'b! yia xij Paaiq meib mivb i-yipq teib puv.’
7.2: saa-Te-fen tau, “zwavj myenb koj Zauj zwavj kxb yrud aag, mwavj yia kxvq og. Bua Eei ovb Taaij, apg-laa-ham, yem me-soj-po-te-mia maiq kcvb mivb haa-laan uaq zang, Favb laavg Eei Tinb huvb hing Zwrtq taaib
7.36: ninb txb pc'g fivj Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv yaag yem i-yipq teib puv, yem Kxib si'q, yaag yem feij zyepg Havj teib puvb Waav zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Zauj Javb hog.
7.35: “naaiq taub mo-se tovb zinb Daavg i-saa-laa-en myenb Gemb uaq taub. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘haiq taub xn meib taaib kunq yia Bua, Tevj yia Bua tunj sig?’ Tinb huvb kanb lovg yem Dyavb txnb fomq hing Zwrtq uaq taub finb myenb Paaiq mo-se kunq ninb Bua yaag Fruj ninb Bua.
7.24: mivb kau, pwatg taub i-yipq myenb hxig taub i-saa-laa-en myenb. mo-se mivb Tevj zu'g hxig uaq taub Jaauq syrub zyrug taij uaq taub i-yipq myenb.
7.7: mq paag yia xij tivg hxig ninb Bua zruj nrub uaq teij myenb Eei zwid. Ga'haaq ninb Bua xij Zwrtq uaq nxm teib puv taaib yem naaiq nxm txvj zavg yia.’
7.17: “aaq lamb teij Tauj Tinb huvb xij zruj ei ninb lcvd pun apg-laa-ham Eei waag, i-saa-laa-en myenb yem i-yipq teib puv Yaavj tu'q Zamq haig.
7.58: lang ninb Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g zivb, zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig ninb. txij zevj uaq teij myenb Jaiq ninb Bua Eei tomb lwi an Jyenq taub myenb lunj myenb, Buaj heug sau-lo, Eei zaub Len.
7.49: “luvb se yia Eei weig, Dau se yia lxvj zauj Eei txvj. meib Bua weig yia Zeij Eei ting xij Navq haiq nx? yia tu'q hitq Kwrnj Eei txvj xij yem haaij?
7.11: “Ga'haaq i-yipq teib puv Zauj Kaa-naa-an teib puv pwavb zu'g tomb vxg hxig ninb Bua Kruq. Bua Eei ovb Taaij lxd maiq tu'q haiq Euvg Eang a'q.
7.33: “zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘Tutq Gxi heb maa'b! meib ib zang sruq Jyenq naaiq nxm txvj se Zivb Revg Eei Dau.
7.16: ninb Bua Eei sei txb Rwrnj se-Kem, zavj Jyenq apg-laa-ham lovg Eaanb Tevj haa-mo Eei txn maaid uaq nxm zruq.
7.40: ninb Bua zyrug Buaj aa-lon, ‘Toq meib zeij teij zyenb Eei favj yend yia Bua Eei Jauq maa'b! txb yia Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq taub mo-se ov Jiaj haaij mig a'q, yia Bua yaag maiq hiuq.’
7.59: myenb lovg la'pyeiq zov kau saa-Te-fen, saa-Te-fen heug Jyenq Tinb huvb kxvq, “zyruq ye-su aa'b! Toq meib zipq yia Eei livb wrnb!”
7.37: “tovb naaiq taub mo-se kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, ‘Tinb huvb xij weig meib Bua Paaiq taub trug waag myenb Navq yia nx, yem meib Bua Eei kxb yrud Bu'Dovj Zwrtq taaib.’
7.4: “apg-laa-ham zyrug Zwrtq Ken-Dia myenb Eei teib puv mivb yem haa-laan teib puv. ninb Eei tia taig mivb, Tinb huvb Paaiq apg-laa-ham taaib yem ib zang meib Bua yem naaiq nxm teib puv.
7.51: “meib Bua Hruq vcvg Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua mnxmb hod, maiq mwavj Tinb huvb. meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij fib Navq Eei, haiq zang yaag vcvg Jyenq sivj livb.
7.12: mq paag yaa-Kopq haid kxvq i-yipq teib puv maaib laavb zi'g, ninb zyrug Paaiq Bua Eei ovb Taaij mivb ta'yetq Rung.
7.46: Daa-witq huvb tu'q Tinb huvb a'Neiq ninb, zyrug Toq Tinb huvb pun ninb liud leid nxm txvj pun yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb yem.
7.13: ta'Eeig Rung yo-sepq pun ninb Eei kxj Zauj yrud hiuq tu'q ninb. faa-lo huvb zyrug hiuq tu'q yo-sepq Eei Mwavq txig Eei Jaub lrug.
7.26: ta'Eeig Nxi ninb cvj pwatg i taub i-saa-laa-en myenb Bx'q Jaaj, ninb zyrug mivb paaq ninb Bua. ninb kxvq, ‘kxb yrud aa'b! meib Bua lomb Rxib i-saa-laa-en myenb, weig haiq tiug laanb xij hxig laanb?’
7.28: meib xij taij yia Navq a'Nxi meib taij uaq taub i-yipq myenb nxb?’
7.54: kunq sig uaq kwanb myenb haid saa-Te-fen kxvq naaiq teij waag, ninb Bua Qiaj Jiad! haig, zyrug tapg Eaab tapg Zeiq Eei.
7.8: Tinb huvb zyrug pun Jiaj kaatq Eei leid zruj lcvd vcvg waag Eei Javb hog. Navq naaig apg-laa-ham Eei txn, i-sakg, Zwrtq seij pwavq Yetg Nxi, apg-laa-ham Tevj ninb Jiaj kaatq Eei leid. i-sakg zruj yaa-Kopq Eei tia, yaa-Kopq yaag zruj Bua Eei zyepg Eeig taub ovb Taaij Eei tia.
7.9: “naaiq teij ovb Taaij mweig Jia'q ninb Bua Eei yrud, yo-sepq, zyrug maaig ninb mivb i-yipq teib puv zruj nrub. mq paag Tinb huvb Zauj ninb yem,
7.32: ‘yia se meib Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, apg-laa-ham, i-sakg Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb.’ mo-se kamb Riaj haig, sin zinj, lyemb maiq kaamq mavg.
7.21: Tauj zu'g kwavg ka'Eiag uaq zang, huvb Eei sia'q zyrug Lxpq taaib txb Lo zruj ninb kanb Eei txn.
7.57: zwavj myenb cvj haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ninb Bua zyrug Fib Fuvj Futg Eei heug, yaag lovg puad zotq Jyenq mnxmb Kwrtq Tiuj mivb Zaa saa-Te-fen,
7.23: “mo-se tu'q feij zyepg Havj uaq zang, ninb Jiad Hruq mivb mavg Zauj ninb Jwavg fivj uaq teij i-saa-laa-en myenb.
7.6: Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘meib Eei zeib fun xij zu'g yem kanb nxm kua'q, zu'g uaq nxm kua'q Eei myenb hxig ninb Bua zruj nrub, zeij ninb Bua feij pc'q Havj.
7.55: mq paag saa-Te-fen maaib sivj livb yem pwavq Hruq. ninb mavg kub vwaaig luvb, pwatg Tinb huvb Eei Favb laavg yaag pwatg ye-su sruq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei Byaaug mcvj puv.
7.44: “Bua Eei ovb Taaij yem teib puvb Waav uaq zang, ninb Bua maaib uaq nxm lcvd vcvg waag Eei Dopg liub. naaiq nxm Dopg liub ninb Bua ei Tinb huvb Paaiq mo-se yaag pun mo-se pwatg Jiaj Eei Euvg zeiq zruj taaib.
7.20: “txij zu'g uaq zang mo-se Zwrtq seij taaib, yaag ei Tinb huvb pwatg, ninb zyavb tu'q Rweig haig. ninb Eei tiaj maag zyrug txb ninb yem pyauq pwavq pua Laaj Eia'g.
7.5: uaq zang Tinb huvb lyemb yetg nxm zaub penq Zaaiq Eei Dau yaag maiq pun zruj ninb Eei pwrng. mq paag apg-laa-ham maiq kcvb maaib fu'Jweiq uaq zang Tinb huvb lcvd pun naaiq nxm teib puv ninb Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun.
7.56: ninb kxvq, “meib Bua mavg kaaj maa'b! yia pwatg luvb kcvb Gxi, yaag pwatg paamb myenb Eei txn sruq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei Byaaug mcvj puv.”
7.53: finb myenb Jiu Tinb huvb Eei leib latg pun meib Bua, meib Bua yaag tu'q zipq mig a'q, mq paag maiq ei Jyenq zruj.”
7.19: ninb Duaq Bua naaiq fivj myenb yaag zruj to'g pun Bua Eei ovb Taaij, aapq ninb Bua zx'q ninb Bua Eei kub vwaad kwavg, pun kub vwaad maiq maaib mcvg zyavb.
7.38: tovb naaiq taub Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb kapq zunq yem teib puvb Waav. ninb Zauj Bua Eei ovb Taaij yaag Zauj yem si-naai Bov Zauj ninb kxvq waag uaq taub finb myenb yem, yaag zipq zyavb Jyenq Eei tod Jiu pun Bua.
7.31: mo-se pwatg zyrug Bua'g hxvb haig. mivb fatq teij mavg zyrug haid zyruq Eei Qiaj kxvq,
7.52: maaib haiq taub trug waag myenb maiq zu'g meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij zruj to'g Jiaj? lyemb taaib trug waag kxvq pcvb fim uaq taub xij taaib, Bua Eei ovb Taaij zuvq taij ninb Bua kwavg mig a'q. ib zang pcvb fim uaq taub meib Bua maaig yaag taij ninb kwavg.
7.27: “mq paag tovb txvg uaq taub fovq mo-se pyauj Gxi. ninb kxvq, ‘haiq taub xn meib taaib kunq yia Bua, Tevj yia Bua tunj sig?
7.60: ninb kweig Fiag Dau heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! Toq meib kwavg Gxi maiq tuvq lovg ninb Bua zruj naaiq teij zwid.” kxvq setq waag ninb zyrug tavj Qiaj mig a'q.
7.41: tovb uaq Rung ninb Bua zruj taub vovb kruq txn Eei favj, txb ka'naaiq mivb ziag, yaag Beng Eang hopq hrug ninb Bua kanb Eei puad zeij taaib Eei ka'naaiq.
7.1: tomb sai myenb naaig kaaj saa-Te-fen, “naaiq teij sig za'kevb maaib Eei fai?”
7.39: “mq paag Bua Eei ovb Taaij Gemb mo-se, maiq Kavq mwavj ninb Eei waag. Hruq Kuvj Namq taauj sin Rwrnj uaq i-yipq teib puv Navq.
7.47: mq paag tovb saa-lo-mxn weig Tinb huvb tu'q zruj uaq nxm pyauq.
7.10: Fruj ninb pyauj Dutq naang zivb. Tinb huvb pun yo-sepq maaib Zovb mevb yaag zruj tu'q hxpg i-yipq teib puv Eei faa-lo huvb. faa-lo huvb zyrug pun ninb zruj zuvj kunq i-yipq teib puv yaag kunq Revg huvb ting.
7.25: (mo-se laaig Zauj ninb Jwavg fivj Eei myenb haib hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb xij lovg ninb Fruj ninb Bua, mq paag ninb Bua maiq pia'g Hruq.)
7.22: mo-se tu'q ho'g Revg i-yipq myenb Eei Zovb mevb Eei Jauq. ninb kxvq Eei waag, zruj Eei sig, za'kevb zruj tu'q kwai haig.
7.42: Tinb huvb zyrug maiq mavg ninb Bua a'q. sweib ninb Bua zavg kub vwaaig luvb Eei Leij, Navq fiaq Jyenq trug waag myenb Eei sru nx. sru kxvq, ‘i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! meib Bua yem feij zyepg Havj teib puvb Waav, meib Bua maiq zeid taij scvb Kuq ziag yia.
7.15: yaa-Kopq Zauj Bua Eei ovb Taaij zyrug swiq mivb i-yipq teib puv yaag yem uaq kwei seij.
7.29: mo-se haid naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug pyauj Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv mivb yem mi-Dyen teib puv. yem uaq ninb tu'q i taub txn taaib a'q.
7.30: “Jiaj liud feij zyepg Havj, mo-se yem uaq teib puvb Waav, leib si-naai Bov maiq navg ko, maaib taub finb myenb yem zia'g Jyenq Dyavb txnb fomq Eei trub Byetg ka'Euad hing pun mo-se pwatg.

19.18: e-fe-so zivb syenj ye-su Eei myenb Zamq Eei taaib txv zwavj Eyemg zwid kxvq ninb Bua zruj Jiaj Eei sig.
19.8: pau-lo lovg pua Laaj Eia'g mivb uaq wig txvb kxvq tob leid. ninb lwrnj leid kxvq Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei sig Kwinj myenb syenj.
19.33: yiu-Tai myenb fovq aa-lekq-saan-De Zwrtq uaq Daavg mcvj. cvj maaib teij Buaj ninb Navq haiq nx kxvq. aa-lekq-saan-De zyrug Wavj puad xij Jaiq sin Buaj zwavj myenb.
19.3: pau-lo cvj naaig, “uaq Euvg meib Bua Jiaj haiq Euvg leid?” ninb Bua tau, “yia Bua Jiaj yo-han Eei leid.”
19.32: kapq zunq Eei myenb Zeub Zeuq naub naug Eei. maaib teij heug naaiq, maaib teij heug uaq. myenb kaub Zamq Jiaj zuvq maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Bua weig haiq tiug kapq zunq yem naaig.
19.21: naaiq teij sig Zwrtq liud, pau-lo tivg Hruq Jiaj maa-si-Do-nia teib puv Zauj aa-Kaa-yaa scvq cvj mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. ninb kxvq, “mivb liud ye-lu-saa-lem, yia yaag xij zu'g mivb mavg lo-maa zivb.”
19.35: zruj kau, maaib taub e-fe-so zivb Eei Jyen Zwrtq taaib paaq ninb Bua sekq mivb cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “e-fe-so zivb Eei myenb aa'b! haiq taub yaag hiuq tu'q Bua e-fe-so myenb kruj aan-Te-mitq zyenb Eeid Zauj yem luvb Dxtq taaib Eei la'pyeib favj maiq zeid?
19.40: kamb Riaj ib Nxi Zwrtq Eei sig huvb Jaa zuvq xij koj mq pei, weig zu'g Bua lyemb maiq maaib txvj Jaiq ib Nxi Zeuj lung zivb naaiq teij sig.”
19.14: maaib yiu-Tai myenb Eei yetg taub sai myenb pyeiq, Buaj heug sej-waa, maaib siag taub txn Navq naaiq nx zruj.
19.23: uaq zang laaij ye-su Eei Jauq, e-fe-so zivb Zwrtq tomb sig.
19.6: pau-lo maan Jyenq ninb Bua, sivj livb zyrug Fiag Tauj ninb Bua. ninb Bua kxvq Zwrtq kanb Euvg waag yaag trug Tinb huvb Eei waag.
19.34: mq paag myenb zia'q tu'q ninb se yiu-Tai myenb zyrug tovb tavb naub naug Eei heug leib maiq ko i nxm zyavb hog. ninb Bua heug Jyenq kxvq, “e-fe-so myenb Eei aan-Te-mitq zyenb zruj Lo.”
19.2: pau-lo naaig ninb Bua, “meib Bua syenj ye-su uaq zang, meib Bua tu'q zipq sivj livb Eei fai?” ninb Bua tau, “yia Bua lyemb maiq haid Jiaj maaib taub sivj livb.”
19.36: maiq maaib haiq taub haib kxvq maiq zeid. Navq naaiq, meib Bua kunq puvj Hruq, maiq tuvq Zeuj a'q.
19.20: naaiq Kav sig Zwrtq liud, zyruq Eei tod zunb Javq Jyenq mivb yaag kunq zruj kunq henq.
19.24: maaib taub Eaanb zavg, Buaj heug De-metq-li-atg. ninb lovg Eaanb taaq aan-Te-mitq miub pyauq txn. Navq naaiq zruj pun yetg zuvq Eaanb zavg zxng tu'q Daaub taaub Zamq.
19.28: zwavj myenb haid naaiq teij waag ninb Bua kevb! Qiaj Jiad haig, naug Jyenq kxvq, “e-fe-so myenb Eei aan-Te-mitq zyenb zruj Lo.”
19.7: naaiq teij myenb Riaj maaib zyepg Eeig taub.
19.29: maiq laub yetg nxm zivb lung Revg. ninb Bua zyrug Eau Jyenq Byend pau-lo taaib uaq teij maa-si-Do-nia myenb, kaai-atg Zauj aa-litq-Taa-Katq, zyavb kwanb Eei lomb lomd Eei Tiuj pia'g ninb Bua Eei a'Ryaaug Zyavq.
19.19: zruj faatq Eei myenb Zamq Eei txb ninb Bua Eei faatg sru taaib Dwi Jyenq txv zwavj myenb puaq kwavg Revg mig a'q. naaiq teij sru Eei Jaab zinb funj taaib zig tu'q pyaa waang lob Nxi Eei zinb.
19.17: yem e-fe-so zivb, maiq kunq yiu-Tai myenb fai fivb fivj Janj haid naaiq teij sig, ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig. myenb zyrug cvj Jaa Taaib zyruq ye-su Eei Buaj Zamq.
19.38: sij kxvq De-metq-li-atg Zauj ninb Jwavg kov Eei zavg myenb maaib sig xij koj haiq taub, Bua maaib Beng sig Eei Nxi yaag maaib tunj sig Jyen Tevj tunj. ninb Bua haib mivb uaq koj tu'q Eei.
19.31: maaib teij e-sia scvq Eei tomb Jyen zruj pau-lo Eei txig, pun waag mivb Toq ninb maiq tuvq pia'g a'Ryaaug Zyavq.
19.30: pau-lo kanb yaag xij mivb zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen uaq mq paag syenj ye-su Eei myenb maiq pun ninb mivb.
19.27: Navq naaiq, maiq taan Kuvj Bua Eei scvb eij Dxtq Navq. kamb Riaj myenb mavg Piaj aan-Te-mitq zyenb Eeid Eei pyauq. e-sia scvq Zauj luvb Diaq myenb zavg naaiq taub aan-Te-mitq zyenb Eeid Eei Favb laavg yaag zu'g Dxtq Revg a'q.”
19.11: Tinb huvb lovg pau-lo Eei puad zruj Zwrtq levg Jeiq Bua'g hxvb Eei sig.
19.5: haid pau-lo Navq naaiq nx kxvq liud, ninb Bua tevq zyruq ye-su Eei Buaj Jiaj uam Eei leid.
19.9: mq paag yem uaq maaib teij myenb Hruq vcvg, maiq Kavq syenj, cvj txv zwavj taanb ye-su Eei Jauq. pau-lo zyrug maiq Zauj ninb Bua yem uaq a'q. ninb txb Jyenq saib kxj Zauj ninb mivb Ti-lan-natq Eei hx'g txvb, Nxib Nxi yem uaq lwrnj leid.
19.16: maaib Yiab kwaiq myenq yem sin uaq laanb myenb zyrug piu mivb Eau Jyenq pxvd hivb ninb Bua yetg zuvq. ninb Bua lcvb kcvq Eei pyauj Zwrtq uaq nxm pyauq, yetg zuvq mun Revg.
19.41: kxvq paag ninb zyrug heug zwavj myenb Rwrnj Revg.
19.37: meib Bua txb naaiq teij myenb taaib naaiq. ninb Bua maiq nimg miub pyauq Eei haiq Euvg ka'naaiq, yaag maiq kxvq to'g Bua Eei zyenb Eeid.
19.39: sij kxvq meib Bua cvj maaib haiq Euvg sig, xij zu'g zuaq Tauj Kxi tomb zwavj Eei Beng sig wig zyrug haib mivb uaq kxvq.
19.4: pau-lo kxvq, “yo-han Tevj myenb Jiaj uaq Euvg uam Eei leid se pun Ziv myenb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid. mq paag yo-han zunb Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb ninb taaib Daavg, cvj maaib taub Ga'haaq taaib. myenb xij zu'g syenj uaq taub, se tovb ye-su a'q.”
19.10: ninb Navq naaiq nx zruj tu'q i Havj, Tauj e-sia scvq Eei myenb, maiq kunq yiu-Tai myenb fai fivb fivj Janj, yetg zuvq tu'q haid zyruq Eei tod.
19.22: ninb Paaiq i taub ninb Eei pxvb puad myenb, Ti-mo-Tai Zauj e-latq-Tatq, mivb maa-si-Do-nia teib puv Daavg. ninb kanb cvj yem Nxi paaq e-sia scvq uaq.
19.12: pau-lo lovg Jiaj Eei si'g Jaauq Zauj ninb Txvq lwib hruj uaq Kwaaiq Dia, myenb txb mivb an pcvg myenb Eei sin, pcvg zyrug lovj. lyemb myenq yaag zu'g zung Zwrtq mig a'q.
19.15: uaq taub myenq tau ninb Bua, “ye-su yia hiuq Eei, pau-lo yia zia'q tu'q Eei. mq paag meib Bua ni? tovb haiq taub?”
19.13: maaib teij yiu-Tai myenb yrub Jyenq zweib laavd zweib muvq mivb Tevj zung Yiab kwaiq myenq Zwrtq myenb Eei sin. ninb Bua seij mavg kaaj ninb Bua lovg zyruq ye-su Eei Buaj haib zung tu'q myenq Zwrtq fai maiq Zwrtq. ninb Bua Buaj myenq, “yia tevq pau-lo zunb uaq taub ye-su zung meib Bua Zwrtq mivb.”
19.1: aa-px-lo yem Ko-lin-To zivb uaq zang, pau-lo yavb uaq Jiaj uaq tiub Jauq mivb Tauj e-fe-so zivb. yem naaig ninb pwatg teij syenj ye-su Eei myenb.
19.26: meib Bua tu'q pwatg yaag tu'q haid uaq taub loq, pau-lo, Navq haiq nx zruj. ninb maiq taan yem e-fe-so zivb zruj Navq. ninb mivb aaq lamb kxmj e-sia scvq Duaq myenb Zamq haig kwavg lob Jauq mig a'q. ninb kxvq myenb Eei puad zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq se maiq zeid zyenb.
19.25: De-metq-li-atg heug yetg zuvq Eaanb zavg Zauj pavg naaiq Euvg scvb eij tu'q Eaanb Eei myenb taaib zunq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “kxb yrud aa'b! meib Bua hiuq tu'q Bua Kub yem Kub Eang se weig naaiq Euvg kov.

17.18: maaib kwanb e-pi-Ku-lyen finb scv Zauj kwanb saa-to-ikg finb scv taaib Zauj pau-lo puvj leid. maaib teij kxvq, “eq! naaiq laanb myenb la'kwaib kxvq naaiq teij henb waag zruj haiq Euvg lcb?” cvj maaib teij kxvq, “haid Navq ninb txb kanb fivj myenb Eei zyenb taaib kxvq Navq.” ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g pau-lo zunb kxvq Tauj ye-su yaag kxvq ninb navb taaib Eei Kuq fyenj.
17.8: zwavj pc'g fivj Zauj kunq zivb Eei Jyen haid naaiq teij waag, yetg zuvq zyrug lung Revg.
17.33: pau-lo zyrug Zwrtq wig mig a'q.
17.3: pau-lo kxvq mevb kivb sru pun ninb Bua hiuq tivg ki-tug xij zu'g syrug Kruq Tauj taig cvj navb taaib. pau-lo yaag kxvq, “tovb yia zunb Buaj meib Bua naaiq taub ye-su se tovb ki-tug.”
17.32: yetq haid pau-lo kxvq Tauj myenb taig cvj navb taaib Eei sig, maaib teij myenb Jyetq ninb mq paag maaib teij kxvq, “yia Bua cvj xij mwavj meib kxvq Rung naaiq teij sig.”
17.21: ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g aa-Ten pwrnb zivb Eei myenb Zauj taaib yem Jyenq uaq teij kanb fivj myenb maiq lovg ninb Bua Eei zyavb hog zruj haiq Euvg. Kuvj xij kxvq, xij mwavj syavb leid Navq.
17.14: syenj ye-su Eei myenb lyemb zeib fuvj pau-lo mivb uaq Kxib Len, mq paag si-laa Zauj Ti-mo-Tai Zxg yem uaq Be-lo-aa zivb.
17.23: yia mivb saau, samj mavg meib Bua zavg Eei ka'naaiq, zyrug pwatg nxm ziab txvb Divb Jyenq Ravg kxvq, ‘weig maiq hiuq tu'q uaq taub zyenb Eei ziab txvb.’  tovb meib Bua zavg Jyenq mq paag maiq hiuq uaq taub zyenb, yia ib zang zunb Buaj meib Bua.
17.6: lxd kau pau-lo Bua maiq pwatg, ninb Bua zyrug zx'q yaa-sonj cvj Zauj i ziaj laanb syenj ye-su Eei myenb Tx mivb uaq nxm zivb Eei kunq sig Jyen, yaag heug Jyenq kxvq, “faanq luvb Diaq naaiq teij myenb ib zang faanq Tauj naaiq taaib a'q.
17.34: maaib teij myenb kan pau-lo mivb yaag syenj ye-su. maaib taub se aa-le-o-paa-katg kunq sig wig Eei myenb, Buaj heug Di-o-ni-si-atg. cvj maaib taub msia'q txn, Buaj heug Daa-maa-litq, Zauj Jyenq Zamb laanb myenb syenj.
17.2: pau-lo Navq yetg kau nx, mivb uaq nxm wig txvb. ninb linb Jyenq pua nxm tivb kov Nxi lovg kivb sru Zauj myenb lwrnj leid.
17.20: meib kxvq Eei sig maaib teij yia Bua haid kanb Euvg haig, xij hiuq tu'q eij leid Navq haiq nx.”
17.24: “Tinb huvb, tovb zeij paamb ken Zauj yem paamb ken Eei maang mwrtg uaq taub, zruj luvb Zauj Dau Eei zyruq. ninb maiq yem paamb myenb zruj taaib Eei ting.
17.28: maaib taub myenb kxvq, ‘Bua yem ninb zyavb Jyenq, haib navb, haib mivb mivb taaib taaib.’ yaag Navq maaib teij meib Bua Eei myenb Tib fei kxvq, ‘Bua yaag zruj ninb Eei naamb Erud.’
17.7: yaa-sonj yaag zipq ninb Bua yem ninb Eei pyauq. ninb Bua yetg zuvq yaag vcvg Jyenq si-saa huvb Eei livg. ninb Bua kxvq cvj maaib kanb taub huvb, Buaj heug ye-su.”
17.29: “Navq naaig Bua zruj Tinb huvb Eei naamb Erud, Bua maiq hxpg zu'g Namq Tinb huvb Eei fyemb fivj se Navq za'eij lovj, maaib puab taub Eei myenb lovg Jyem, lovg Eaanb fai lovg la'pyeiq zruj taaib Eei miub favj.
17.19: ninb Bua zyrug txb pau-lo mivb aa-le-o-paa-katg, tovb uaq nxm zivb Eei kunq sig wig, kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia Bua xij hiuq tu'q meib kxvq naaiq teij syavb Faauj Eei waag.
17.17: ninb zyrug yem uaq wig txvb Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Zauj zavg Tinb huvb Eei Janb kikg lwrnj leid. ninb Bua yaag Nxib Nxi yem tomb zwavj zaamg Zauj mivb uaq Ryaaug Eei myenb lwrnj leid.
17.31: weig zu'g Tinb huvb tivg zyavj Nxi syemq luvb Diaq myenb Eei zwid. ninb yaag lovg ninb kinq taaib Eei myenb pcvb fim Eei syemq. naaiq taub myenb taig mivb mq paag Tinb huvb pun ninb navb taaib pun zwavj myenb hiuq tivg naaiq teij sig.”
17.30: zinb Daavg myenb maiq hiuq Eei zyavb hog, Tinb huvb maiq zx'q ninb Bua Eei zwid. mq paag ib zang Tinb huvb hatg yetg zuvq luvb Diaq nxmb nxm txvj Eei myenb xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid.
17.27: Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx zruj weig pun paamb myenb lxd ninb, Riaj haib Lua tu'q zu'g ninb mq pei. mq paag Tinb huvb za'kevb leib Bua taub taub maiq ko.
17.11: naaiq teij yiu-Tai myenb kaub Namq tu'q Gxi uaq teij Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa myenb, weig zu'g ninb Bua Jxm Hruq Eei mwavj tod, Nxib Nxi zaab kivb sru mavg kaaj pau-lo Eei waag txij fai maiq txij.
17.5: mq paag yiu-Tai myenb hang pau-lo Bua. ninb Bua zyrug mivb uaq heib hxvg lxd mevb taub waaig, Hruq maiq penj Eei myenb, kapq zunq txig zruj yetg kwanb Zeuj yetg zivb myenb lung Revg. ninb Bua yaag pxvd pia'g yaa-sonj Eei pyauq, xij zx'q pau-lo Zauj si-laa txb Zwrtq pun zwavj myenb.
17.9: uaq teij Jyen aapq yaa-sonj Bua an Jyenq Dapg xnj Eaanb zyrug puvj ninb Bua Rwrnj.
17.16: pau-lo yem aa-Ten zivb zuaq si-laa Zauj Ti-mo-Tai uaq zang, pwatg uaq nxm zivb maaib miub favj pwavq Revg, haid Hruq mun haig, Raub haig.
17.4: maaib teij uaq teij myenb mwavj liud yaag syenj zyrug Zauj pau-lo Zauj si-laa Jwavg Jauq. cvj maaib zavg Tinb huvb Eei Janb kikg Zamq Zauj maaib mevb hog Eei msia'q txn Zamq Eei yaag kan ninb Bua.
17.10: tovb naaig Nxi Mwavj, kxb yrud Bua fuvj pau-lo Zauj si-laa Zwrtq Jauq mivb Be-lo-aa zivb. Tauj uaq nxm zivb, pau-lo Bua mivb yiu-Tai myenb Eei wig txvb.
17.22: pau-lo zyrug yem aa-le-o-paa-katg Eei wig Bu'Dovj sruq Jiad taaib kxvq, “aa-Ten Eei zwavj myenb aa'b! ei yia pwatg, meib Bua yem maang sig se fyru zyenb kevj sivj Eei myenb.
17.12: maaib myenb Zamq Eei syenj ye-su. maaib mevb hog Eei Janb kikg msia'q txn syenj Zamq. cvj maaib Janb kikg mJavg txn yaag syenj Zamq.
17.15: fuvj pau-lo uaq teij myenb fuvj ninb mivb Tauj aa-Ten zivb zyrug taauj Gaav Rwrnj. pau-lo Jaa waag Buaj si-laa Zauj Ti-mo-Tai kaanq taaib Zauj ninb kapq txig.
17.13: mq paag yem Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa Eei yiu-Tai myenb hiuq tu'q pau-lo yem Be-lo-aa zivb zunb tod, ninb Bua cvj kan Gaav mivb Zo'q uaq nxm zivb Eei myenb lung Revg.
17.1: pau-lo Zauj si-laa Jiaj am-fi-Bu-li muvq Zauj aa-px-lo-nia muvq taaib Tauj Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa zivb. yem uaq maaib nxm yiu-Tai myenb Eei wig txvb.
17.26: Tinb huvb lovg yetg laanb myenb zruj pwrnq zeij Zwrtq maang fivj pun yem pwavq luvb Diaq. ninb Jaab Daavg tivg zyavj zyavb hog Zauj ninb Bua yem Eei kapg Jaaij.
17.25: ninb yaag maiq lovg paamb myenb Eei puad fub suj ninb Navq ninb Qyemj zu'g haiq Euvg nx. taauj Rwrnj ninb kanb pun Bua maaib mcvg, maaib Qiaj Tauq, yaag Zeij maang mwrtg pun maang myenb.

27.18: Ryaaub Jia'q Zxg nyruq Jyenq Ravq. ta'Eeig Nxi ninb Bua zyrug zx'q huaj kwavg uaq Kxiq,
27.3: ta'Eeig Nxi yia Bua Tauj sai-Dxn muvq, yu-lyetq pcvb pyeiq Kxb lyenb pau-lo, pun ninb mivb lxd ninb Eei kxb yrud weig pun ninb Eei kxb yrud liug leid teij ninb.
27.43: mq paag pcvb pyeiq xij lyrub pau-lo zyrug maiq pun ninb Bua taij yetg taub. ninb heug haiq taub haib zyrub uam kunq Tiuj Fiag uam zyrub Zwrtq uaq Byenj a'q.
27.14: mivb maiq laub pwavb kxv tomb Ryaaub Jia'q, (tovb myenb heug pa'q puv Zauj tov puv Bu'Dovj Eei Ryaauj), pwrng yavb Kxib Rru uaq puv taaib.
27.34: Navq naaiq yia Kwinj meib Bua xij zu'g Eang teij ka'naaiq Zivj taaib haib tu'q mcvg Zwrtq. meib Bua kx'g myenb Eei Ba'pyei lyemb yetg tiub maiq zu'g myetg.”
27.2: yia Bua zyrug pia'g Pruj atg-laa-mitq-Ti-yum muvq Eei Ravq. naaiq Pruj Ravq xij kan Kxib Len, e-sia scvq Eei Ravb prug Jiaj. Ravq zyrug mivb a'q. maaib taub maa-si-Do-nia teib puv, Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa zivb Eei myenb, Buaj heug aa-litq-Taa-Katq, yaag Zauj Jyenq yia Bua mivb.
27.36: zwavj myenb zyrug haid Hruq lovj teij, yetg zuvq zyrug Eang a'q.
27.35: kxvq setq, pau-lo zyrug zx'q Fuaq taaib txv Jyenq zwavj myenb lcvd zivb Tinb huvb zyrug mc'q taaib Eang.
27.24: ninb kxvq, ‘pau-lo aa'b! meib maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. meib Navq haaij xij zu'g mivb sruq Jyenq lo-maa tomb ziub huvb Eei Ra'Myen. Tinb huvb xij weig meib pun yetg zuvq Jwavg Ravq Eei myenb tu'q mcvg Zwrtq.’
27.7: naaiq teij ziaj Nxi, Ravq mivb tu'q tong haig. a'g tu'q mivb haig, laub Eei Zivj taaib Tauj Kaa-ni-Datg muvq. laaij Ryaauj maiq sunj, maiq haib pcv za'g mivb. yia Bua zyrug pcvb paaid sanj-mo-ne cvj Jiaj Ryaauj maiq pwrng Lo uaq puv Ke-litq Kxib Rru.
27.17: Dob liud Ravb txn, ninb Bua cvj Dob tomb Ravq, zx'q Laav Zunj Fiag ka'Diaq pcv faauj taaib Dob Jyenq. kamb Riaj Ravq haib Ryavg zu'g se-Titq uaq nxm txvj Eei saab zyru Dwi, ninb Bua zyrug puvj Diab Bwavb Fiag sweib Ryaauj pwrng mivb.
27.11: mq paag pcvb pyeiq syenj Ravb Jyen Zauj Ravb zyruq Eei waag, maiq syenj pau-lo Eei waag.
27.33: luvb aaq lamb teij Fav a'q, pau-lo Kwinj zwavj myenb Eang teij ka'naaiq. ninb kxvq, “tu'q zyepg feij Nxi a'q, meib Bua Raub maiq Eang haiq Euvg.
27.16: Ryaauj pwrng Jyenq mivb kau, nitq zu'g nxm Kxib Rru txn, Buaj heug Kaau-Daa, Kxib Rru zyrug Txvq Jyenq teij Ryaauj. yia Bua zyrug zx'q Ravb txn prub faauj pavg tomb Ravq Dob Jyenq, zruj tu'q Kruq haig.
27.40: ninb Bua zyrug Va'q tavj zwig Ravq Eei ka'naaiq kwavg, cvj Jaiq Gxi Ravb Byetg Eei Laav. ninb Bua cvj Zxv Jyenq Ravb mGxvq Eei Diab Bwavb pun Ryaauj pwrng huvj Jyenq mivb Zwrtq uaq Byenj.
27.37: yia Bua yem Ravq Eei myenb yetg zuvq maaib Eig pc'q Zyetq zyepg lua'g laanb.
27.4: cvj yem naaig Rcv Ravq mivb, Ryaauj yetg aaj maiq sunj, yia Bua zyrug Jiaj Ryaauj maiq pwrng Lo uaq puv sai-patg Kxib Rru,
27.12: weig zu'g uaq nxm Ravb prug maiq navg penj Jiaj tovb ken Nxi, yem Ravq xij mivb Eei myenb yaag kaub Zamq, ninb Bua zyrug tivg Hruq haib kaanq tu'q hivb nx, xij mivb fi-nikq uaq nxm Ravb prug zuaq tovb ken Nxi Jiaj. fi-nikq se yem uaq Ke-litq Kxib Rru Eei yetg nxm Ravb prug, Win mivb fai puv Zauj pa'q puv Bu'Dovj yaag Win mivb fai puv Zauj naamb puv Bu'Dovj.
27.13: yem kau uaq nxm txvj, Ryaauj yem naamb puv pwrng taaib syeng Eei, zwavj myenb zyrug laaig mivb tu'q Eei. Ravb nrub zyrug syru zwig Ravq Eei ka'naaiq faauj taaib zyrug Rcv nitq Jyenq Ke-litq Kxib Rru mivb.
27.26: mq paag Bua Eei Ravq zuvq xij zu'g Piu mivb toj Bua kwavg yetg nxm Kxib Rru.”
27.28: ninb Bua zyrug lovg tiub Laav Dob Jyenq ka'naaiq Niaq Eei puvj Fiag Dx'g mavg kaaj Dovg haaij Do, pwatg maaib Eig zyepg zamb Do. yetg zang Jiaj ninb Bua cvj Dx'g Rung pwatg zyepg Mmd zamb Do.
27.8: Ravq kevb! a'g tu'q mivb haig, mq paag yia Bua nitq Jyenq Kxib Rru manb mang mivb zyrug Tauj nxm txvj Buaj heug, “Ravb prug Rweig,” leib laa-sia muvq maiq navg ko.
27.9: mivb kau, kwavg zyavb hog Zamq haig a'q. zuvq Jiaj liud zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Eei zipq a'q. sij kxvq kan Ravq mivb nx, haib pwavb zu'g sig mq pei. pau-lo zyrug Kwinj zwavj myenb. ninb kxvq,
27.32: pcv zyrug Va'q tavj Dob Ravb txn Eei Laav puvj kwavg mig a'q.
27.21: tu'q ziaj Nxi zwavj myenb maiq Eang haiq Euvg. pau-lo zyrug sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Bu'Dovj kxvq, “zwavj kxb yrud aag, sij kxvq meib Bua mwavj yia Eei waag, maiq Zwrtq Ke-litq uaq nxm Kxib Rru nx, Bua maiq zu'g pwavb naaiq teij sig hxig Bua kwavg ka'naaiq Zamq.
27.23: weig zu'g tovb yia penj ninb Eei yaag pua'g zavg Eei Tinb huvb, maaib taub ninb Eei finb myenb a'Mwavj taaib sruq Jyenq yia Eei ka'Len.
27.6: yem uaq pcvb pyeiq cvj lxd tu'q Pruj Ravq yem aa-lekq-saan-De-lia zivb taaib, xij mivb i-taa-li teib puv. ninb zyrug txb yia Bua pia'g uaq Pruj Ravq.
27.44: haiq taub maiq haib zyrub uam xij zu'g Qam Dyavb penq fai yem Ravq haib Byrub Eei ka'naaiq zyrub Zwrtq Byenj. Navq naaiq yetg zuvq zyrug Zwrtq Byenj, maiq zu'g kwavg mcvg.
27.20: tu'q ziaj Nxi yia Bua maiq pwatg Ba'Nxi, maiq pwatg Leij Zwrtq. tomb Ryaauj Zxg pwrng Jyenq seij Eei. yia Bua maaib lamb Namq Fruj tu'q mcvg Zwrtq Eei Jauq paag mig a'q.
27.5: cvj Jiaj Kxiq, Jiaj zu'g si-li-sia Zauj pam-fi-lia mivb Tauj li-sia teib puv, mi-laa muvq.
27.19: cvj ta'faam Nxi ninb Bua cvj zx'q teij Ravq Eei ua'g king kwcvj kwavg Kxiq a'q.
27.38: taub taub Eang peuq zyrug pyenb Byaub kwavg uaq Kxiq, xij pun Ravq hev teij.
27.31: mq paag pau-lo kxvq Buaj pcvb pyeiq Zauj pcv, “sij kxvq Ravb nrub maiq yem naaiq Ravq nx, meib Bua maiq haib tu'q Fruj.”
27.27: Tauj zyepg feij Nxi uaq mwrnd yia Bua Eei Ravq zu'g Ryaauj pwrng Byrub mivb Byrub taaib Eei yem uaq me-Di-te-le-nyen Kxiq. Daamq mwrnd Eei txvj, Ravb nrub haid Navq nitq Byenj fatq teij a'q nx.
27.41: mq paag mivb kau, Ravq pwavb zu'g uamb kapq, Ravb mGxvq Ryavg zu'g saab zyru Dwi kx'q Jyenq, maiq haib mivb. Ravb tweiq zyrug zu'g uam nyruq huq mig a'q.
27.1: lo-maa Jyen tivg Hruq pun yia Bua pia'g Ravq mivb i-taa-li teib puv. ninb Bua zyrug zx'q pau-lo Zauj teij zwib myenb Jiu pun taub x-katg-tatg huvb uaq kwanb pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq, tovb kunq yetg pc'q taub pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq, Buaj heug yu-lyetq.
27.39: luvb Fav taaib, maiq maaib haiq taub zia'q tu'q uaq nxm txvj, mq paag ninb Bua pwatg maaib nxm uamb kx'q maaib saab zyru ywrnb Eei, Kub Zwrtq Eei, zyrug tivg xij txb Ravq Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj.
27.10: “zwavj kxb yrud aa'b! yia pwatg Bua Zwrtq naaiq Rung Jauq za'kevb xij pwavb sig a'q. maiq taan Ravq Zauj huaj haib laaib zitg Navq. lyemb Bua Eei mcvg zuvq xij zu'g kwavg mq pei.”
27.25: zwavj kxb yrud aa'b! kunq puvj Hruq maa'b! yia syenj Tinb huvb. ninb Navq haiq nx kxvq za'kevb xij Navq uaq nx zruj.
27.22: Navq haaij yaag paag, kunq puvj tivg Hruq, meib Bua maiq maaib yetg taub haib zu'g kwavg mcvg. Kuvj kwavg naaiq Pruj Ravq Navq,
27.42: pcv Namq xij taij kwavg zwib myenb, Riaj ninb Bua haib zyrub uam pyauj mq pei.
27.15: Ryaauj zyrug taaib nyruq Ravq, Ravq pxvd maiq hivb Ryaauj. yia Bua zyrug puvj Ravq sweib Ryaauj pwrng mivb.
27.29: ninb Bua kamb Riaj Ravq haib Ryavg zu'g la'pyeiq, Ravb nrub zyrug puvj pyei nxm zwig Ravq Eei ka'naaiq yem uaq Ravb tweiq. zwig Jyenq, mavg maiq tu'q luvb kaanq Fav a'q.
27.30: Ravb nrub Namq xij pyauj, zyrug zx'q Ravb txn puvj Fiag Kxiq zruj Navq xij puvj Ravb mGxvq Eei ka'naaib zwig Fiag nx.

11.18: zwavj myenb haid ninb kxvq naaiq teij waag, ninb Bua zyrug maiq maaib waag kxvq a'q. Kuvj Zev Tinb huvb Navq. ninb Bua kxvq, “Navq naaiq, Tinb huvb yaag pun Janj haib kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid tu'q zyavb Jyenq.”
11.8: “mq paag yia tau kxvq, ‘zyruq aa'b! maiq hxpg Eang saa'b? xij zu'g keg Eei Zauj maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq zuvq maiq pia'g Jiaj yia Eei Rwib.’
11.3: ninb Bua kxvq, “meib pia'g Janj Eei pyauq, ninb Bua yaag maiq kcvb Jiaj kaatq Eei leid. meib zuvq Zauj ninb Bua Eang Naavj.”
11.21: Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q Tevj ninb Bua kxvq zyrug maaib myenb Zamq Eei syenj zyrug Win taaib lxd zyruq ye-su.
11.14: ninb xij kxvq teij waag Buaj meib. meib Zauj meib Eei yetg pyauq myenb zyrug weig naaiq teij waag tu'q Fruj.’
11.23: mivb Tauj, pwatg Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx Zeij en pun naaiq teij myenb, ninb zyrug a'Neiq haig yaag Kwinj ninb Bua lyepg tivg Hruq zanb zang kan lovj zyruq.
11.6: yia mavg lovj uaq Kwaaiq Dia ka'Euad pwatg maaib scvb Kuq, maaib Yiab zxib, maaib Exv Dau Eei ka'naaiq, yaag maaib Daij Daamb luvb Eei nx'g.
11.2: pi-te mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb uaq zang, maaib teij syenj ye-su Eei yiu-Tai myenb, tovb xij pun syenj ye-su Eei Janj Jiaj kaatq Eei leid uaq teij, kxvq pi-te.
11.20: mq paag maaib teij yem sai-patg Kxib Rru Zauj sai-lin muvq Eei yiu-Tai myenb mivb an-Ti-okg zivb kxvq zyruq ye-su Eei Kuq fyenj pun Janb kikg mwavj.
11.24: Baa-naa-Batg zruj taub Kuq myenb, syenj tu'q lovj, yaag maaib sivj livb pwavq Hruq, zyrug Jaa maaib myenb Zamq Eei syenj zyruq.
11.28: maaib taub naaiq teij myenb, Buaj heug aa-kaa-Batg, sruq Jiad taaib. sivj livb lovg ninb trug waag kxvq luvb Diaq myenb xij zu'g pwavb tomb Waav tomb vxg. (Kaa-laau-Di-atg zruj tomb ziub huvb uaq zang za'kevb pwavb naaiq Rung tomb vxg.)
11.7: yia yaag haid maaib Qiaj kxvq, ‘pi-te aa'b! Jiad sin taij naaiq teij ka'naaiq Eang a'q.’
11.29: Navq naaig, saib kxj Bua Zaavb laavb tivg ziuj kx'g myenb Eei panb zeig Zwrtq fim Tevj yu-Dia scvq Eei kxb yrud.
11.19: myenb taij liud saa-Te-fen, Ga'haaq laaij myenb zruj to'g hxig, syenj ye-su Eei myenb zyrug pyauj Raanj Revg. maaib teij pyauj Tauj fi-ni-sia teib puv, sai-patg Kxib Rru, Zauj an-Ti-okg zivb. ninb Bua zunb Tinb huvb Eei Kuq fyenj mq paag Kuvj kxvq pun yiu-Tai myenb mwavj Navq.
11.17: Navq naaig, sij kxvq Tinb huvb Zeij zivb Eeig pun uaq teij Janj Navq Bua syenj zyruq ye-su ki-tug uaq zang ninb pun Bua nx, yia fuvg haib laanb Tinb huvb?”
11.30: ninb Bua zyrug kapq Eaanb taaib Jiu pun Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo txb mivb pun Jiub paav Eei myenb koj.
11.27: uaq teij Zaamj maaib teij trug waag myenb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb mivb Tauj an-Ti-okg.
11.11: “txij uaq nxm zyavb hog, yem si-saa-li-yaa zivb myenb Paaiq taaib lxd yia uaq teij pua laanb myenb taaib Tauj yia hitq uaq nxm pyauq taaib a'q.
11.5: ninb kxvq, “yia yem yapq-faa muvq tauj kauj uaq zang, pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig Zwrtq. yia pwatg maaib Euvg ka'naaiq Navq yetg Kwaaiq Dia Javq Eei, yaag Navq nanq Jyenq pyei nxm kx'q yem kub vwaaig luvb puvj Fiag taaib tivb Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen.
11.9: “mq paag maaib Qiaj yem luvb kxvq ta'Eeig Rung, ‘Tinb huvb pun haiq Euvg Zivb Revg, maiq tuvq funj maaib wij.’
11.16: yia zyrug Javj zu'g zinb Daavg zyruq kxvq Eei waag, ‘yo-han lovg uam Tevj myenb Jiaj leid, mq paag Tinb huvb xij lovg sivj livb Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid.’
11.4: pi-te zyrug yem kxn zweib yetq zweib Eeig kxvq Revg naaiq teij Jaub lrug pun ninb Bua mwavj.
11.10: Navq naaiq nx kxvq pua Rung liud, uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq zyrug syru faauj luvb mig a'q.
11.22: ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei Jiub paav haid naaiq teij fyenj Tauj ninb Bua uaq, ninb Bua zyrug Paaiq Baa-naa-Batg mivb an-Ti-okg zivb.
11.12: sivj livb Buaj yia kan ninb Bua mivb yaag maiq tuvq samb so'q. naaiq teij Ju'q taub kxb yrud yaag Zauj yia mivb pia'g Ko-ne-li-atg Eei pyauq.
11.15: “yia Jiad kxn kxvq waag uaq zang, sivj livb zyrug Fiag taaib yem ninb Bua Eei sin, Navq zinb Daavg Fiag taaib yem Bua uaq nx.
11.13: Ko-ne-li-atg zyrug Buaj yia Bua ninb Navq haiq nx pwatg taub finb myenb sruq Jyenq ninb Eei pyauq ka'Euad Buaj ninb, ‘meib xij zu'g Paaiq myenb mivb yapq-faa muvq lxd laanb myenb, Buaj heug si-mon pi-te, heug ninb taaib meib naaiq.
11.1: kovb zob Bua Zauj yem yu-Dia scvq Eei kxb yrud haid kxvq Janj yaag zipq Tinb huvb Eei tod.
11.26: lxd pwatg, sau-lo Zauj Jyenq Rwrnj an-Ti-okg zivb. ninb Bua i taub yem uaq yetg Havj, zanb zang Zauj Jiub paav kapq zunq Faauj myenb Zamq. myenb heug syenj ye-su Eei myenb zruj “ki-tug myenb” se yem an-Ti-okg zivb Jiad kxn heug taaib.
11.25: Baa-naa-Batg zyrug mivb Taa-satq zivb lxd sau-lo.

5.18: ninb Bua zyrug zx'q kovb zob Bua txb mivb wrnj Jyenq tomb zwavj lob.
5.8: pi-te naaig ninb, “Buaj yia maa'b! meib Bua maaig Dau Eei Eaanb tu'q Bua'g naaiq Navq?” ninb tau, “zeid Eei, tu'q Bua'g naaiq Navq.”
5.33: kunq sig wig Eei myenb haid naaiq teij waag, ninb Bua Qiaj Jiad! haig. Navq haaij yaag xij taij kovb zob Bua a'q.
5.3: pi-te kxvq, “aa-naa-nia aa'b! meib zruj haiq Euvg pun saa-taan kunq meib, pun meib maaib Hruq kxvb pc'g Duaq sivj livb zyrug Repq Zwrtq teij maaig Dau Eei Eaanb?
5.32: yia Bua weig naaiq teij sig zruj zxvb zevj. Tinb huvb Zeij sivj livb pun mwavj ninb Eei waag Eei myenb. sivj livb yaag Zauj yia Bua zruj zxvb zevj.”
5.21: luvb Byrub Byrud Fav Navq, ninb Bua zyrug ei Jyenq naaiq teij waag pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Faauj zwavj myenb a'q.   tomb sai myenb cvj Zauj ninb yem uaq Eei myenb txig taaib zunq. ninb Bua heug kunq sig wig Eei myenb, se i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb koj, taaib Rxib yaag Paaiq pcv mivb uaq lob txb kovb zob Bua taaib.
5.35: ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj kunq sig wig Eei zwavj myenb, “i-saa-laa-en kxb yrud aa'b! meib Bua xij zruj haiq Euvg pun naaiq teij myenb mq paag xij zu'g lovb lovj Eei Namq Daavg.
5.40: kunq sig Eei myenb zyrug ei kaa-maa-li-en Eei waag zruj a'q. ninb Bua heug kovb zob Bua pia'g taaib pun myenb lovg pyaab pin Bx'q, cvj hatg ninb Bua maiq tuvq lovg ye-su Eei Buaj kxvq haiq Euvg. hatg liud zyrug puvj ninb Bua mivb a'q.
5.14: syenj zyruq Eei myenb mJavg msia'q kunq zruj kunq Tim pia'g Zamq.
5.23: “yia Bua Tauj uaq lob yaag pwatg fxq Jyenq lovj Eei. pcv yaag zuaq Jyenq kcvb Daavg Eei, mq paag yia Bua Kxi kcvb pia'g mivb, maiq pwatg yetg taub mig a'q.”
5.6: yem uaq Eei myenb lunj myenb tovd sin zx'q Diab tamb, tamb Jyenq aa-naa-nia Eei sei, kcv mivb pyopq.
5.34: mq paag maaib taub faa-li-sij myenb, Buaj heug kaa-maa-li-en, zruj Faauj leid Eei finb scv. zwavj myenb yaag Taaib ninb. ninb yem kunq sig wig sruq Jiad taaib Buaj myenb txb kovb zob Bua Zwrtq tavb ka'Eiag.
5.2: aa-naa-nia Repq Zwrtq teij maaig Dau Eei Eaanb lyrub ninb kanb lovg. ninb Eei auq yaag hiuq Eei. ninb cvj txb teij mivb Jiu pun kovb zob Bua.
5.36: zinb Daavg maaib taub, Buaj heug Tu-Daatg, Zev ninb kanb zruj Lo. cvj maaib leib maiq ko feij pc'q taub myenb kan ninb. mq paag Ga'haaq ninb zu'g myenb taij taig. kan ninb Eei myenb Raanj Revg, zyav naaig paag Revg mig a'q.
5.20: Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua mivb uaq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zx'q naaiq syavb mcvg Eei Jaub lrug yetg zuvq kxvq pun zwavj myenb mwavj og.”
5.24: kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei pcvb pyeiq Zauj sai myenb pyeiq Bua haid naaiq teij waag, ninb Bua Namq maiq Tov, maiq hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig Ga'haaq xij Navq haiq nx.
5.28: ninb kxvq, “yia Bua hatg meib Bua Zinb maang maiq tuvq lovg naaiq nxm Buaj Faauj myenb ni! mavg kaaj! meib Bua Faauj Eei leid zunb pwavq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb a'q nyaa. lyemb uaq laanb myenb taig Eei sig meib Bua xij hxig yia Bua Daamb txv.”
5.7: cvj Gc'q aaq lamb teij pua nxm zyavb hog, ninb Eei auq yaag pia'g taaib. ninb lyemb maiq hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig Zwrtq.
5.29: pi-te Zauj uaq teij kovb zob Bua tau, “yia Bua xij zu'g mwavj Tinb huvb, maiq zeid mwavj myenb.
5.19: mq paag naaig mwrnd maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb taaib Kxi lob kcvb txb ninb Bua Zwrtq mig a'q,
5.17: zruj kau, tomb sai myenb Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq txig, tovb saa-Du-sij uaq Jauq myenb, hang haig kovb zob Bua.
5.38: Navq naaig, ib zang Zwrtq taaib Eei sig yia Kwinj meib Bua maiq tuvq zruj haiq Euvg pun naaiq teij myenb. puvj ninb Bua mivb a'q. sij kxvq ninb Bua zruj Eei Zauj Namq Eei yem paamb myenb Zwrtq nx, zyrug paaig Revg mig a'q.
5.31: Tinb huvb Taaib ninb faauj Lav, pun ninb zweid Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei Byaaug mcvj zruj pyeiq zeiq yaag zruj Fruj zyruq, pun i-saa-laa-en myenb kxiq Hruq tu'q Tinb huvb kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid.
5.30: meib Bua zx'q ye-su tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj taij ninb, mq paag yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb pun ninb cvj navb taaib.
5.27: pcv txb kovb zob taaib sruq Jyenq kunq sig myenb Eei Ra'Myen. tomb sai myenb zyrug zaab naaig ninb Bua.
5.11: zwavj Jiub paav Zauj haid naaiq teij Jaub lrug Eei myenb za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig a'q.
5.5: aa-naa-nia haid naaiq teij waag, ninb lyemb zeib Kiv Fiag Dau taig mig a'q. haiq taub haid naaiq teij sig za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig.
5.9: pi-te zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib Bua i Mwavq weig haiq tiug tovb Hruq seij zyruq Eei sivj livb? mavg kaaj! pyopq meib Eei Goj uaq teij myenb Rwrnj Tauj kcvb Daavg a'q lo'b! ninb Bua yaag xij zu'g kcv meib Zwrtq a'q.”
5.16: yem nitq ye-lu-saa-lem uaq teij muvq Eei myenb, txb putg pcvg myenb Zauj maaib Yiab kwaiq myenq Kwrnj mxb ninb Bua uaq teij. yetg zuvq yaag zxg lovj Revg.
5.41: kovb zob Bua Zwrtq wig mivb ninb Bua Fyenb yrub haig, weig zu'g Tinb huvb funj ninb Bua Pwij tu'q weig ye-su Eei Buaj tiaq Eaiq.
5.37: “Ga'haaq faauj myenb hrud uaq zang, maaib taub kaa-li-li myenb, Buaj heug yu-Daatg, yua'g myenb Zamq kan ninb. mq paag ninb fib Navq Eei zu'g myenb taij taig. kan ninb uaq teij myenb zyav naaig Raanj Revg mig a'q.
5.39: mq paag sij kxvq yem Tinb huvb taaib nx, meib Bua za'kevb maiq haib hivb ninb Bua. Riaj meib Bua kanb Zauj Tinb huvb Bx'q Jaaj Navq.”
5.4: maiq kcvb maaig se meib Eei Dau maiq zeid? naaiq teij Dau maaig liud se meib kanb Eei Eaanb maiq zeid? haiq Euvg pun meib Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq Navq naaiq nx zruj? meib maiq zeid kxvb pc'g Duaq myenb, meib kxvb pc'g Duaq Tinb huvb.”

5.1: cvj maaib taub myenb, Buaj heug aa-naa-nia, Zauj ninb Eei auq, sapg-fi-laa, maaig Rov ninb Bua Eei Dau.
5.26: pcvb pyeiq Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei pcv zyrug mivb txb kovb zob Bua taaib, mq paag maiq zruj Zyruq pun kovb zob Bua. pcv kamb Riaj zwavj myenb haib zx'q la'pyeiq zov ninb Bua mq pei.
5.25: uaq zang maaib laanb myenb taaib kxvq, “mwavj kaaj! meib Bua zx'q wrnj Jyenq lob uaq teij myenb, ib zang yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq Faauj myenb cj.”

9.3: sau-lo mivb kau, aaq lamb teij Tauj Daa-matq-katg zivb. lyemb zeib yem uaq luvb Zwrtq nxm tomb Fav ziuj kxmj sau-lo Eei sin.

9.35: yetg zuvq yem litq-Daa Zauj saa-lon muvq Eei myenb pwatg naaiq laanb myenb lovj, ninb Bua zyrug kxiq Hruq syenj zyruq.
9.43: Ga'haaq pi-te yem Zaamj yapq-faa muvq, uaq taub Dopg zavg, si-mon, Eei pyauq.
9.40: mq paag pi-te heug ninb Bua yetg zuvq Zwrtq ka'Eiag zyrug kweig Fiag tauj kauj. tauj kauj paag, ninb Win Rwrnj Buaj Janb taig, “Taa-Bi-Taa aa'b! Jiad sin taaib maa'b!” Taa-Bi-Taa zyrug nuvj Gxi mziv, pwatg pi-te, ninb zyrug Jiad sin taaib zweid Jyenq.
9.14: ninb yaag tu'q sai myenb pyeiq Eei livg taaib naaiq, Daa-matq-katg zivb, zx'q yetg zuvq syenj meib Eei myenb  Dob Jyenq.”

9.6: Jiad sin taaib pia'g zivb a'q. meib xij zu'g zruj Eei zyrug maaib myenb Buaj meib.”

9.2: Toq sru txb mivb Daa-matq-katg zivb, yiu-Tai myenb Eei nxmb nxm wig txvb, lxd kan zyruq Eei Jauq Eei myenb, maiq kunq mJavg msia'q, zx'q ninb Bua Dob Jyenq fuvj mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
9.36: yem yapq-faa muvq maaib taub syenj ye-su Eei msia'q txn, Buaj heug Taa-Bi-Taa. (kxvq penj kikg waag se Do-Katq.)  ninb zanb zang zruj Kuq sig yaag Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb.
9.20: ninb lyemb zeib mivb yiu-Tai myenb Eei wig txvb zunb Buaj myenb ye-su za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn.
9.24: mq paag ninb Bua taaq Eei za'eij sau-lo hiuq mig a'q. uaq teij myenb zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd zuaq Jyenq zivb kcvb xij taij ninb.
9.28: sau-lo zyrug Zauj ninb Bua yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb pia'g pia'g Zwrtg Zwrtq, puvj laavg Eei tevq ye-su Eei Buaj zunb tod.
9.7: Zauj sau-lo taaib uaq teij myenb tivb Jyenq uaq, lyemb kxvq waag maiq Zwrtq. ninb Bua haid maaib Qiaj mq paag maiq pwatg haiq taub.
9.29: ninb yaag Zauj kxvq kikg waag uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb kxvq leid lwrnj leid, mq paag ninb Bua xij taaq za'eij taij ninb.
9.19: Eang liud Naavj, ninb zyrug henq taaib a'q. sau-lo Zauj Daa-matq-katg zivb syenj ye-su Eei myenb yem i ziaj Nxi.
9.17: aa-naa-nia zyrug mivb a'q. Tauj uaq ninb pia'g pyauq mivb, zyrug maan Jyenq sau-lo kxvq, “sau-lo yrud aa'b! tovb yem Daamb Jauq hing yaavb pun meib pwatg uaq taub zyruq ye-su, Paaiq yia taaib weig pun meib cvj haib mavg tu'q pwatg, yaag tu'q sivj livb pwavq meib Eei Hruq.”
9.38: litq-Daa Zauj yapq-faa muvq leib maiq ko. yapq-faa muvq Eei syenj ye-su Eei myenb haid kxvq pi-te yem litq-Daa muvq, ninb Bua zyrug Paaiq i laanb myenb mivb uaq Buaj ninb, “Toq meib kaanq taaib yia Bua naaiq.”
9.31: naaiq teij Jauq Jiaj liud, yem yu-Dia, kaa-li-li Zauj saa-maa-lia scvq nxmb nxm txvj Eei Jiub paav tu'q trug pcvb xn Eei yem yaag tu'q Zeij Jiad taaib. ninb Bua Taaib zyruq. sivj livb yaag xn ninb Bua Eei Hruq yaag pun myenb Jaa Zamq Jyenq faauj.
9.30: kxb yrud Bua hiuq tu'q myenb xij taij ninb, ninb Bua zyrug txb sau-lo mivb si-saa-li-yaa zivb, cvj fuvj ninb Zwrtq Jauq mivb Taa-satq zivb.
9.27: mq paag Baa-naa-Batg txb ninb mivb kovb zob Bua uaq kxvq pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q, sau-lo yem Daamb Jauq uaq zang zyruq hing yaavb pun ninb pwatg yaag Zauj ninb kxvq waag. Baa-naa-Batg cvj kxvq sau-lo yem Daa-matq-katg zivb puvj laavg Eei tevq ye-su Eei Buaj zunb tod.
9.11: zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb, “xij zu'g mivb maaib Buaj heug Jaub za'g uaq tiub Jauq. Tauj yu-Daatg Eei pyauq xij zu'g naaig, Taa-satq zivb Eei sau-lo yem haaij. ninb tauj kauj Jyenq Eei,
9.5: sau-lo zyrug naaig kaaj, “zyruq aa'b! meib tovb haiq taub?” sau-lo cvj haid waag tau ninb, “yia se ye-su, tovb meib zruj to'g uaq taub.
9.9: tu'q pua Nxi ka'Euad ninb Eei mziv mavg maiq pwatg haiq Euvg. ninb yaag maiq Eang maiq hopq haiq Euvg.
9.16: yia kanb xij pun ninb hiuq tu'q ninb weig yia Eei Buaj xij zu'g syrug Dovg haaij Kruq.”
9.41: pi-te suv puad Ken ninb Jiad sin taaib sruq Jyenq, cvj heug syenj ye-su Eei zwavj myenb Zauj uaq teij aub kwaaq taaib, Jiu naaiq taub navb taaib Eei msia'q txn pun ninb Bua.
9.37: tovb uaq teij zyavb hog ninb putq pcvg taig mig a'q. myenb Raauj ninb Eei sin cvj ke'g Jyenq kub vwaaig uaq Ravb pyauq.
9.39: pi-te zyrug kan ninb Bua mivb a'q. mivb Tauj, myenb zyrug txb ninb faauj kub vwaaig uaq Ravb pyauq. yetg zuvq aub kwaaq weib Jyenq pi-te, Eyemq Jyenq zx'q Do-Katq zyavb seij lunb Eei lwib hruj pun ninb mavg.
9.4: ninb zyrug Kiv Fiag Dau yaag haid kxvq, “sau-lo aa'b! sau-lo! meib weig haiq tiug zruj to'g yia?”
9.10: yem Daa-matq-katg zivb maaib taub saib kxj, Buaj heug aa-naa-nia, pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig. zyruq heug ninb, “aa-naa-nia aa'b!” ninb zyrug tau, “zyruq aa'b! yia yem naaiq og.”
9.22: sau-lo kunq zruj kunq maaib hatg maad zunb tod, haib kxvq tu'q mevb pun Ziv ye-su tovb ki-tug. Daa-matq-katg zivb Eei yiu-Tai myenb lyemb maiq haib tau ninb a'q.
9.12: yaag pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig. ninb pwatg laanb myenb, Buaj heug aa-naa-nia, pia'g taaib lovg puad maan ninb, pun ninb cvj haib mavg tu'q pwatg taaib.”

9.13: aa-naa-nia tau, “zyruq aa'b! yia haid myenb Zamq Eei kxvq uaq laanb myenb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb kwatg to'g hxig meib Eei Zivb Revg myenb Kruq haig nxb.
9.1: sau-lo haiq zang yaag sia Jyenq waag xij taij zyruq Eei myenb.  ninb zyrug mivb Tauj tomb sai myenb uaq

9.25: mq paag maaib mwrnd sau-lo Eei saib kxj  lovg nxm Baatg puvj ninb kan zivb laatg Kwrtq  Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g zivb mig a'q.

16.14: maaib taub Ti-yaa-Ti-laa zivb Eei msia'q txn, Buaj heug li-Dia. ninb Eei kov se maaig setq lua'g Eei Diab zu'q. li-Dia se zavg Tinb huvb Eei myenb. zyruq yaag pun ninb Eei Hruq Gxi, Namq tu'q Tov pau-lo kxvq Eei waag.
16.23: pcv zyrug Bx'q tu'q ninb Bua syav haig, Ga'haaq cvj txb ninb Bua mivb wrnj Jyenq lob, yaag Buaj kunq lob Eei Jyen lovb lovj zuaq Jyenq ninb Bua.
16.6: sivj livb maiq pun pau-lo yem e-sia scvq zunb tod. ninb Bua zyrug Jiaj faa-li-Jia Zauj kaa-laa-Tia teib puv.

16.2: li-saa-taa Zauj i-Ko-ni-yum Eei kxb yrud yaag Zev Ti-mo-Tai.
16.36: kunq lob Jyen zyrug Buaj pau-lo, “tomb Jyen heug yia puvj meib Zauj si-laa Zwrtq lob. meib Bua ib zang kunq pcvb xn Eei mivb a'q.”
16.20: yem lo-maa Jyen Eei Ra'Myen ninb Bua koj kxvq, “naaiq teij myenb se yiu-Tai myenb. ninb Bua zruj pun yia Bua Eei zivb lung Revg.
16.24: kunq lob Jyen tu'q tomb Jyen Eei waag zyrug zx'q pau-lo Bua wrnj Jyenq ka'Euad uaq Qovj lob, cvj zx'q Dyavj kapg Jyenq ninb Bua Eei zauj.
16.28: mq paag pau-lo Wrn nxm Kaatq, “Weiq! maiq tuvq hxig meib kanb. yia Bua yetg zuvq yem naaiq Eei.”
16.7: Tauj mi-sia teib puv Eei kapg Jaaij ka'Len ninb Bua xij pia'g Bi-Ti-nia, mq paag ye-su Eei sivj livb maiq pun ninb Bua pia'g.
16.29: kunq lob Jyen heug myenb lxd tav taaib ziuj Jyenq Tiuj pia'g pau-lo Bua uaq, Baapq Fiag pau-lo Zauj si-laa Eei Ra'Myen, sin zinj Eanb Eanb Eei.
16.19: naaiq taub nrub peid Eei zyruq zia'q tu'q ninb Bua tu'q Eaanb Eei Jauq maiq lamb Namq a'q, ninb Bua zyrug Eau Jyenq pau-lo Zauj si-laa, Tx mivb tomb zwavj zaamg, zruj Lo uaq teij Eei Ra'Myen.
16.17: naaiq taub nrub peid kan Jyenq pau-lo Zauj yia Bua mivb heug Jyenq kxvq, “naaiq teij myenb se yem Lav Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb Eei pru. ninb Bua zunb tu'q Fruj Eei Jauq pun meib Bua mwavj.”
16.38: pcv zyrug zyav naaiq teij waag mivb kxvq pun tomb Jyen mwavj. tomb Jyen hiuq tu'q pau-lo Zauj si-laa se lo-maa myenb, ninb Bua zyrug kamb Riaj haig.
16.31: pau-lo Bua tau, “xij zu'g syenj Kauj zyruq ye-su, meib Zauj meib Eei yetg pyauq myenb zyrug tu'q Fruj.”
16.30: ninb txb pau-lo Bua Zwrtq taaib naaig kaaj ninb Bua, “tomb kxj aa'b! yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj Zivj haib tu'q Fruj?”
16.27: kunq lob Jyen Eia taaib pwatg lob kcvb Gxi Revg, laaig tu'q zwib myenb pyauj Revg a'q mq pei. ninb zyrug pcv Zwrtq ninb Eei Ru'g Daauq xij taij ninb kanb a'q.
16.11: yia Bua zyrug yem to-atg pia'g Ravq, pcv za'g mivb Tauj saaj-mo-Tatq Kxib Rru. ta'Eeig Nxi mivb Tauj ne-aa-Bu-li muvq.
16.5: weig naaiq zwavj Jiub paav zyrug kaub syenj tu'q henq. Nxib Nxi maaib myenb Tim pia'g Zamq Jyenq faauj.
16.9: mivb Tauj uaq mwrnd, pau-lo pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig. ninb pwatg taub maa-si-Do-nia myenb sruq Jyenq Qa'q Toq, “Toq Jiaj Tauj naaiq maa-si-Do-nia teib puv Tevj yia Bua maa'b!”
16.16: maaib Nxi yia Bua mivb myenb kapq zunq tauj kauj Eei txvj. mivb kau, maaib taub nrub peid taaib pwavb zu'g yia Bua. naaiq taub nrub peid maaib myenq yem ninb Eei sin, pun ninb haib kxvq zinb hod Eei sig zyrug Tevj myenb mavg mcvg, pun ninb Eei zyruq tu'q Eaanb Zamq.
16.37: mq paag pau-lo kxvq Buaj uaq teij sinb Len pcv, “yia Bua yaag lo-maa Eei pc'g fivj. ninb Bua zuvq maiq tivg yia Bua Eei zwid Daavg, la'kwaib txv zwavj Bx'q yia Bua. Zxg cvj txb yia Bua mivb wrnj Jyenq lob. ib zang ninb Bua xij pivj Jyenq puvj yia Bua. Navq naaig se maiq hxpg. uaq teij tomb Jyen kanb xij zu'g taaib puvj yia Bua Zwrtq.”
16.39: tomb Jyen zyrug mivb Toq zwid pau-lo Bua, cvj fuvj ninb Bua Zwrtq lob yaag Toq ninb Bua Zwrtq zivb a'q.
16.4: pau-lo Bua zweib muvq yrub Jyenq mivb. mivb Tauj haaij yaag zx'q kovb zob Zauj myenb koj yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb tivg taaib Eei leid Jiu pun myenb ei Jyenq zruj.
16.10: pau-lo pwatg liud hing yaavb Eei sig, yia Bua zyrug lyemb zeib liug leid mivb maa-si-Do-nia, weig zu'g yia Bua funj tivg Tinb huvb za'kevb heug yia Bua mivb zunb Kuq fyenj pun uaq teij myenb mwavj.
16.22: zwavj myenb Tevj Jyenq zruj to'g pun pau-lo Zauj si-laa. uaq teij Jyen zyrug heug pcv Ziaq pau-lo Bua Eei lwib hruj kwavg, lovg pyaaq Bx'q ninb Bua.
16.12: yem naaig yia Bua Zwrtq Ravq yavb Jauq mivb fi-lipq-Pxi zivb. fi-lipq-Pxi se maa-si-Do-nia teib puv Eei yetg nxm tomb zivb, se lo-maa kua'q lyepg taaib Eei zivb. yia Bua zyrug yem ziaj Nxi uaq.
16.15: ninb Zauj ninb Eei pyauq zov Mwavq txig yetg zuvq zyrug Jiaj uam Eei leid. Ga'haaq ninb heug yia Bua mivb hitq ninb Eei pyauq. ninb kxvq, “sij kxvq meib Bua funj yia za'kevb syenj zyruq nx, Toq meib Bua taaib hitq yia Eei pyauq og.” ninb Qa'q lyrub yia Bua, yia Bua Namq maiq Jiaj eij, zyrug mivb hitq ninb Eei pyauq.
16.13: Tauj tivb kov Nxi yia Bua Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g zivb mivb uaq Daaib Len, Namq taaib maaib nxm txvj kapq zunq tauj kauj. yia Bua lxd pwatg zyrug zweid Fiag Zauj kapq zunq taaib uaq teij msia'q txn kxvq waag.
16.1: pau-lo cvj mivb De-Bi zivb Zauj li-saa-taa muvq. li-saa-taa muvq maaib taub saib kxj, Buaj heug Ti-mo-Tai. ninb Eei maa se yiu-Tai myenb yaag syenj ye-su Eei. mq paag ninb Eei tia penj Janb kikg.
16.26: lyemb zeib Dau tovd tu'q seij haig, Dang Tauj lob Eei kxnb Do'q. taub taub lob kcvb Gxi Revg. zwavj zwib myenb Eei limg yaag Dutq Revg mig a'q.
16.25: Daamq mwrnd Eei zyavb hog, pau-lo Zauj si-laa tauj kauj yaag paauj Ruv Zev Tinb huvb. yem lob Eei zwib myenb yetg zuvq yaag mwavj ninb Bua.

4.18: Zaavb laavb paag, ninb Bua cvj heug pi-te Zauj yo-han pia'g taaib, hatg ninb Bua Zinb maang maiq tuvq tevq ye-su Eei Buaj kxvq fai Faauj haiq Euvg.
4.8: pi-te tu'q sivj livb pwavq Hruq zyrug tau ninb Bua. ninb kxvq, “yetg zwavj zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Zauj myenb koj aa'b!
4.33: kovb zob Bua maaib tomb Qa'q zruj zxvb zevj kxvq zyruq ye-su navb taaib Eei Jaub lrug. Tinb huvb yaag Zamb Zamq Eei Zeij fu'q pun ninb Bua mrud laanb myenb.

4.21: kunq sig myenb Namq maiq Tov Navq haiq nx haib tivg pi-te Bua Eei zwid, weig zu'g pwatg zwavj myenb weig naaiq Kav sig Zev Tinb huvb. Navq naaig, kunq sig myenb Jaa hatg Niaq Eei liud, zyrug puvj ninb Bua a'q.

4.34: yem naaiq kwanb myenb maiq maaib haiq taub Zaa haiq Euvg weig zu'g haiq taub maaib livb teig, maaib pyauq, zyrug maaig mivb txb Eaanb taaib Jiu pun kovb zob Bua.
4.2: ninb Bua maiq hxpg Hruq laaij kovb zob Bua Faauj zwavj myenb ye-su taig cvj navb taaib, pun Ziv myenb taig mq paag haib navb taaib.

4.20: yia Bua pwatg Jiaj, haid Jiaj Eei sig, yia Bua maiq haib kwavg maiq kxvq.”
4.24: haid liud naaiq teij waag, uaq teij myenb lomb Rxib hxpg fim tovb eij Zwrtq Qiaj tauj kauj Buaj Tinb huvb, “zyruq aa'b! meib zeij luvb zeij Dau zeij Kxiq, yaag zeij yem naaiq teij ka'Euad Eei maang mwrtg.
4.28: ninb Bua zruj Euvb Euvg ei meib kanb Eei hatg maad Zauj ei meib Eei eij Jaab Daavg tivg zyavj xij Zwrtq taaib Eei sig.
4.7: ninb Bua heug myenb txb pi-te Zauj yo-han taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen naaig kaaj, “meib Bua lovg haiq Euvg livg fai tevq haiq taub Eei Buaj zruj naaiq teij sig?”
4.29: zyruq aa'b! Toq meib ib zang Javj Jyenq ninb Bua kxvq hc'q yia Bua uaq teij waag, yaag pun yia Bua, meib Eei pru, puvj laavg Eei kxvq meib Eei tod.
4.19: mq paag pi-te Zauj yo-han tau ninb Bua, “meib Bua Namq mavg kaaj, ei Tinb huvb mavg, yia Bua mwavj meib Bua kaub hxpg mwavj Tinb huvb fai?
4.17: Bua xij zu'g hatg Jyenq maiq tuvq pun ninb Bua tevq ye-su Eei Buaj Zauj haiq taub kxvq haiq Euvg, weig pun naaiq teij sig maiq haib zunb Javq mivb.”
4.31: tauj kauj paag, tovb ninb Bua kapq zunq uaq nxm txvj tovd Revg. taub taub tu'q sivj livb pwavq Hruq zyrug puvj laavg Eei kxvq Zwrtq Tinb huvb Eei waag.
4.30: “Toq zyruq suv puad Zwrtq taaib zxg pcvg cvj pun yia Bua Kauj meib Eei Zivb Revg pru, ye-su, Eei Buaj zruj Zwrtq Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog Zauj Namq maiq mevb pc'g Eei sig.”
4.27: “za'kevb maaib he-lotq huvb Zauj pxn-Ti-atg pi-laatq yem naaiq nxm zivb Zauj Jyenq Janj, Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb kapq zunq taaib tovb Hruq vcvg Jyenq meib Eei Zivb Revg pru, ye-su, tovb meib Paaiq zruj ki-tug uaq taub.
4.11: ye-su se tovb kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘meib Bua komq pyauq zavg Gemb Zwrtq uaq nxm la'pyeiq, zuvq penj an pyaub kx'q kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj uaq nxm.’
4.5: ta'Eeig Nxi zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Zauj myenb koj Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv kapq zunq yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
4.9: sij kxvq meib Bua ib Nxi naaig Tauj zruj naaiq teij Kuq sig pun naaiq taub zauj Bai Eei myenb yaag naaig Tauj ninb Navq haiq nx zxg lovj,
4.16: kxvq, “Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj pun naaiq teij myenb ni? yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb taub taub hiuq tu'q tovb naaiq teij i laanb zruj naaiq teij Bua'g hxvb haig Eei Javb hog. Bua kanb maiq haib vcvg kxvq maiq zeid.

4.10: meib Bua zwavj myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq myenb xij zu'g hiuq, ib zang sruq Jyenq meib Bua Eei Ra'Myen naaiq taub myenb zauj lovj Revg se weig naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su ki-tug Eei Buaj, tovb meib Bua tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig mq paag Tinb huvb pun navb taaib.

4.13: uaq teij zruj Lo Eei myenb Zauj myenb koj pwatg pi-te Zauj yo-han puvj tu'q laavg haig, tau ninb Bua, yaag hiuq tu'q naaiq teij i laanb myenb maiq tu'q Kauq Jiaj srub Ravg, Kuvj zruj Prub Tov myenb Navq, ninb Bua Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug Javj zu'g naaiq teij i laanb myenb kan Jiaj ye-su.
4.1: pi-te Zauj yo-han Zauj zwavj myenb kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang, maaib teij sai myenb Zauj kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei pcvb pyeiq Zauj teij saa-Du-sij myenb taaib lxd ninb Bua.
