10.18: ninb Bua zyrug heug naaig kaaj, “maaib laanb myenb, Buaj heug si-mon pi-te, hitq naaiq fai?”
10.45: yem yapq-faa muvq kan pi-te taaib uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb, tovb syenj ye-su uaq teij myenb, za'kevb Bua'g hxvb haig Tinb huvb pun sivj livb Janj.
10.3: maaib Nxi, Fiag aanj leib maiq ko pua nxm zyavb hog, Ko-ne-li-atg pwatg Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb hing yaavb, pwatg tu'q mevb! Eei. finb myenb pia'g taaib kxvq Buaj ninb, “Ko-ne-li-atg aa'b!”
10.43: “yetg zuvq trug waag myenb yaag Tevj ninb zruj zxvb zevj. ninb Bua kxvq, haiq taub syenj ye-su, yaag Kauj ninb Eei Buaj zyrug tu'q Tinb huvb kwavg zwid.”
10.14: mq paag pi-te kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! maiq hxpg Eang saa'b? xij zu'g keg Eei Zauj maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq yia maiq Eang Jiaj.”
10.48: ninb zyrug hatg ninb Bua xij zu'g tevq ye-su ki-tug Eei Buaj Jiaj leid. uaq teij myenb cvj Toq pi-te Zauj ninb Bua yem i ziaj Nxi.
10.34: pi-te zyrug kxvq, “ib zang yia hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen.
10.2: ninb Zauj ninb Eei yetg pyauq myenb kan lovj Tinb huvb, Taaib Tinb huvb. ninb yaag Zwrtq fim Tevj yiu-Tai fivj Eei myenb Jomg myenb Zamq Eei, yaag zanb zang tauj kauj.
10.36: “meib Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Jiu pun i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei tod, tovb myenb Kauj ye-su ki-tug haib tu'q pcvb xn uaq Euvg Kuq fyenj. ye-su ki-tug zruj maang mwrtg Eei zyruq.
10.35: maiq kunq haiq fivj myenb, haiq taub kamb Riaj ninb, yaag zruj hxpg Eei Jauq, Tinb huvb zyrug zipq uaq taub a'q.
10.24: cvj Jiaj taaib yetg Nxi, pi-te Bua mivb Tauj si-saa-li-yaa zivb mig a'q. Tauj uaq pwatg Ko-ne-li-atg Zauj Jyenq Mwavq txig Zyenb Ze'q cvj Zauj ninb heug taaib uaq teij lob kcv txig yem uaq zuaq Jyenq ninb.
10.7: Zauj ninb kxvq waag Eei finb myenb leib Gxi mig a'q. Ko-ne-li-atg zyrug heug i taub ninb Eei pru Zauj taub ninb Eei sinb Len pcv taaib. uaq taub pcv yaag kan lovj Tinb huvb.
10.17: pi-te pwatg liud naaiq teij hing yaavb Eei sig, ninb Zxg Namq maiq Tov naaiq teij sig maaib haiq Euvg eij leid mq pei. txij uaq nxm zyavb hog, Ko-ne-li-atg Paaiq taaib Eei myenb naaig Jyenq taaib lxd pwatg si-mon Eei pyauq, zuvq sruq Jyenq uaq laatg kcvb Daavg.
10.11: pwatg luvb kcvb Gxi. cvj maaib Euvg ka'naaiq Navq yetg Kwaaiq Dia Javq Eei, yaag Navq nanq Jyenq pyei nxm kx'q puvj Fiag Tauj Dau nx.
10.33: yia zyrug lyemb zeib Paaiq myenb mivb lxd meib, meib zyrug taaib a'q. za'kevb! lovj haig. ib zang yia Bua yetg zuvq yem naaiq Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen, xij mwavj zyruq Paaiq meib kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag.”
10.16: Navq naaiq pua Rung liud, uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq zyrug syru faauj luvb mig a'q.
10.40: mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi Tinb huvb pun ninb navb taaib zyrug hing pun myenb pwatg.
10.37: “meib Bua yaag hiuq tu'q yem yo-han zunb Buaj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid, Ga'haaq yem kaa-li-li Jiad kxn Zwrtq taaib kxmj yu-Dia scvq Eei sig.
10.4: hc'q Ko-ne-li-atg kamb Riaj haig, nu'g nu'q Eei mavg finb myenb. ninb naaig kaaj, “zyruq aa'b! haiq Euvg?” finb myenb kxvq, “Tinb huvb mwavj haid meib tauj kauj Eei waag, yaag pwatg meib Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb Eei sig, ninb zyrug Javj Tauj meib.
10.12: uaq Kwaaiq Dia ka'Euad maaib Euvb Euvg scvb Kuq, Euvb Euvg Yiab zxib, Exv Dau Eei ka'naaiq, Zauj Daij Daamb luvb Eei nx'g.
10.46: ninb Bua haid Janj kxvq kanb Euvg waag, yaag Zev Tinb huvb weib Lo.
10.13: ninb cvj haid Qiaj kxvq, “pi-te aa'b! Jiad sin taaib taij naaiq teij ka'naaiq Eang a'q.”
10.26: mq paag pi-te Ken ninb Jiad sin yaag kxvq, “Jiad sin taaib maa'b! yia mq paag paamb myenb Navq lx'g.”
10.28: ninb kxvq, “meib Bua hiuq tu'q, ei yia Bua Eei leid, yiu-Tai myenb maiq haib pia'g Janj Eei txvj, maiq haib Zauj Janj Jiu Tov. mq paag Tinb huvb pun yia hiuq tu'q maiq hxpg zu'g funj haiq taub maiq Zivb Revg, fai maaib wij.
10.8: Ko-ne-li-atg zx'q finb myenb Buaj Eei waag kxvq pun ninb Bua mwavj, zyrug Paaiq ninb Bua mivb yapq-faa muvq.
10.9: ta'Eeig Nxi ninb Bua kan Jauq mivb Tauj fatq teij yapq-faa muvq a'q. luvb aaq lamb aanj, pi-te faauj pyaub vxb, pivj laavb Eei txvj, tauj kauj.
10.32: meib xij zu'g Paaiq myenb mivb yapq-faa muvq lxd laanb myenb, Buaj heug si-mon pi-te, taaib. ib zang ninb yem uaq Kxib Len, si-mon Dopg zavg Eei pyauq.’
10.21: pi-te zyrug Fiag mivb Buaj uaq teij myenb, “yia se tovb meib Bua lxd uaq laanb myenb. meib Bua taaib lxd yia maaib teij haiq Euvg Jauq fai?”
10.23: pi-te zyrug heug uaq teij myenb pia'g pyauq Zauj ninb hitq uaq. ta'Eeig Nxi pi-te Beng taaib Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua mivb a'q. cvj maaib teij yapq-faa muvq Eei kxb yrud yaag Zauj ninb mivb.
10.6: ninb yem Kxib Len, uaq taub Dopg zavg, si-mon, Eei pyauq.”
10.44: pi-te Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang, sivj livb lyemb zeib Fiag taaib yem ninb Bua taub taub mwavj leid Eei myenb Eei sin.
10.20: meib Jiad sin taaib Fiag a'q. maiq tuvq samb so'q. kunq kan ninb Bua mivb a'q, weig zu'g yia Paaiq ninb Bua taaib.”
10.5: ib zang meib xij zu'g pun myenb mivb yapq-faa muvq lxd tovb maaib Buaj heug si-mon pi-te uaq taub taaib naaiq.
10.19: uaq zang pi-te Zxg Namq maiq Tov ninb pwatg liud uaq teij hing yaavb Eei sig. sivj livb kxvq Buaj ninb, “mwavj kaaj! maaib pua laanb myenb taaib lxd meib.
10.38: “meib Bua yaag hiuq tu'q naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su Eei Jaub lrug, yaag hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Zeij sivj livb Zauj tomb Qa'q pun ninb. Tinb huvb Zauj ninb yem, ninb zyrug mivb nxmb nxm txvj zruj Kuq sig yaag zxg lovj yetg zuvq zu'g myenq Eei huvb hxig Eei myenb.
10.31: ninb kxvq, ‘Ko-ne-li-atg aa'b! tovb meib Toq Tinb huvb uaq teij waag, Tinb huvb haid mig a'q, yaag pwatg meib Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb.
10.27: pi-te Zauj Ko-ne-li-atg kxvq Jyenq waag pia'g pyauq mivb zyrug pwatg myenb Zamq Eei kapq zunq yem uaq.
10.41: maiq zeid hing pun taub taub myenb tu'q pwatg. Kuvj tovb zinb Daavg Tinb huvb kinq yia Bua taaib Tevj zruj zxvb zevj Eei myenb tu'q pwatg Navq, se ninb taig mivb cvj navb taaib, yia Bua tu'q Zauj ninb Jwavg Eang Jwavg hopq Eei myenb.
10.1: si-saa-li-yaa zivb maaib taub lo-maa Janj, Buaj heug Ko-ne-li-atg. ninb zruj taub, tovb myenb heug “i-taa-li uaq kwanb,” Eei pcvb pyeiq, kunq yetg pc'q taub pcv.
10.39: “ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb yaag yem yiu-Tai myenb Eei teib puv zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig, yia Bua pwatg yaag Tevj ninb zruj zxvb zevj. “myenb yaag zx'q ye-su tiv yem zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig.
10.47: pi-te kxvq, “naaiq teij myenb zipq sivj livb Navq yia Bua nx. uaq Euvg maaib haiq taub haib laanb Jyenq maiq pun ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid fai?”
10.10: ninb haid Hruq sia Eei, xij Eang Naavj. uaq zang yem pyauq Eei myenb liug leid Jyenq laib Naavj, pi-te pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig Navq Beij Beij nx.
10.25: pi-te pia'g pyauq uaq zang, Ko-ne-li-atg mivb zipq, zyrug Pua'q Fiag ninb Eei zaub Len paaij.
10.22: ninb Bua tau, “Ko-ne-li-atg pcvb pyeiq heug yia Bua taaib. ninb zruj taub Kuq myenb yaag kan lovj Tinb huvb. yetg fivj yiu-Tai myenb Taaib ninb. maaib taub Zivb Revg finb myenb taaib Buaj ninb xij zu'g Toq meib mivb ninb Eei pyauq weig pun ninb mwavj meib kxvq Eei waag.”
10.42: ninb Buaj yia Bua xij zu'g zunb ninb Eei Kuq fyenj pun myenb hiuq tu'q ninb se Tinb huvb Paaiq taaib zruj syemq zwid Jyen, syemq zyavb Jyenq Eei myenb Zauj taig mivb Eei myenb Eei zwid.
10.15: cvj maaib Qiaj kxvq ta'Eeig Rung Buaj ninb, “Tinb huvb pun haiq Euvg Zivb Revg, maiq tuvq funj maaib wij.”
10.29: Navq naaig, meib Bua Paaiq myenb mivb heug yia taaib, yia maiq naaig haiq Euvg zyrug taaib a'q. ib zang yia naaig kaaj meib Bua, meib Bua weig haiq tiug heug yia taaib?”
10.30: Ko-ne-li-atg kxvq, “zinb Daavg pyei Nxi, leib maiq ko naaiq nxm zyavb hog, se txij Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog Eei txvj, yia yem yia Eei pyauq tauj kauj. lyemb zeib maaib taub myenb zu'q Jyenq lwib hruj Fav Eei, yrug! yrug uaq, taaib sruq Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen.

22.18: uaq zang zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, ‘meib xij zu'g kaanq pyauj Zwrtq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. meib Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj mq paag yem naaiq Eei myenb maiq xij mwavj.’
22.8: “yia zyrug naaig, ‘zyruq aa'b! meib tovb haiq taub?’ “ninb tau, ‘yia se naa-saa-letq muvq uaq taub ye-su, tovb meib zruj to'g uaq taub.’
22.3: “yia se yiu-Tai myenb, yem si-li-sia scvq, Taa-satq zivb Zwrtq seij. mq paag yia yem naaiq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Lo taaib. kaa-maa-li-en zruj yia Eei saib tiaj yaag Faauj yia ho'g tu'q Revg Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei leid. yia yaag Jxm Hruq kan Tinb huvb Navq meib Bua ib Nxi yem naaiq Eei taub taub myenb nx.
22.21: “zyruq cvj Buaj yia, ‘mivb a'q. yia xij Paaiq meib mivb ko Eei txvj lxd maang fivj Janj.’+”
22.14: “ninb yaag kxvq, ‘Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb kinq meib taaib pun meib hiuq tu'q ninb Eei za'eij, pun meib pwatg pcvb fim uaq taub yaag haid ninb kanb Eei Rwib kxvq Eei waag.
22.23: myenb naug Jyenq mivb, Jaiq lwi fevj Tin teig Eei, Eau niab Buv faatq faauj luvb.
22.6: “yia mivb kau, leib Daa-matq-katg zivb maiq navg ko. uaq nxm zyavb hog aaq lamb teij luvb aanj a'q. lyemb zeib yem uaq luvb Zwrtq nxm tomb Fav ziuj Fiag kxmj yia Eei sin.
22.2: myenb haid ninb kxvq hipq-lu waag ninb Bua zyrug cvj kaub sekq. pau-lo kxvq Jyenq mivb.
22.20: Tevj meib zruj zxvb zevj uaq taub saa-Te-fen zu'g myenb taij uaq zang, yia sruq Jyenq uaq yaag a'Neiq Eei. zuvq Tevj mavg taij ninb uaq teij myenb Eei lwi.’
22.24: tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug Buaj pcv txb pau-lo pia'g pcv yem Eei txvj ka'Euad, yaag heug ninb Bua lovg pyaab pin Bx'q zaab naaig, mavg kaaj ninb zruj haiq Euvg zwavj myenb Zivj taaib Navq naaiq nx heug.
22.28: tomb pcvb pyeiq cvj kxvq, “yia lovg Eaanb Zamq Eei maaid zruj lo-maa myenb.” pau-lo kxvq, “yia Zwrtq seij taaib penj lo-maa myenb.”
22.7: yia Kiv Fiag Dau mivb, haid maaib Qiaj kxvq, ‘sau-lo aa'b! sau-lo! meib weig haiq tiug zruj to'g yia?’
22.29: xij zaab naaig pau-lo uaq teij myenb lyemb zeib simq Gxi. tomb pcvb pyeiq hiuq tu'q pau-lo se lo-maa myenb ninb zyrug kamb Riaj haig weig zu'g lovg Lia'g limg Dob Jyenq.
22.19: “yia tau, ‘zyruq aag, naaiq teij myenb hiuq tu'q yia mivb nxmb nxm wig txvb zx'q syenj ye-su Eei myenb. maaib teij wrnj lob, maaib teij yaag Bx'q.
22.17: “Ga'haaq yia Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem, yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq tauj kauj, pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig.
22.30: ta'Eeig Nxi, tomb pcvb pyeiq xij hiuq tu'q yiu-Tai myenb weig haiq tiug koj pau-lo. ninb zyrug heug pcv Jaiq Gxi limg yaag heug sai myenb pyeiq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Eei kunq sig wig Eei myenb kapq zunq. ninb zyrug txb pau-lo mivb sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen.
22.27: tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug mivb naaig kaaj pau-lo, “meib za'kevb lo-maa myenb fai? Buaj yia maa'b!” pau-lo tau, “zeid Eei.”
22.11: laaij naaiq henq haig Eei Fav cvq yia Eei mziv yia mavg maiq pwatg. kan yia mivb Eei myenb zyrug Ken yia pia'g Daa-matq-katg zivb.
22.5: tomb sai myenb Zauj kunq sig wig Eei zwavj myenb koj haib zruj zxvb zevj weig zu'g yia mivb ninb Bua uaq zx'q sru txb mivb pun Daa-matq-katg zivb Eei kxb yrud. yia zyrug mivb Daa-matq-katg xij zx'q kan naaiq tiub Jauq Eei myenb Dob Jyenq limg txb ninb Bua Rwrnj naaiq ye-lu-saa-lem tivg zwid.
22.9: Zauj yia mivb uaq teij myenb Kuvj pwatg Fav Navq, maiq haid Zauj yia kxvq waag uaq taub Eei Qiaj.
22.16: ib zang meib zruj haiq Euvg vaib? Jiad sin taaib tevq ye-su Eei Buaj Jiaj uam Eei leid, Raauj kwavg meib Eei zwid.’
22.4: yia zruj to'g kan naaiq tiub Jauq Eei myenb, hxig ninb Bua Tauj taig. maiq kunq mJavg msia'q yia zx'q taaib Dob Jyenq wrnj lob.
22.10: “yia cvj naaig, ‘zyruq aa'b! yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj?’ “zyruq kxvq, ‘meib xij zu'g Jiad sin mivb Daa-matq-katg zivb. Tauj uaq maaib myenb Buaj meib Tinb huvb tivg zyavj pun meib zruj Eei Euvb Euvg sig.’
22.22: zwavj myenb mwavj Tauj pau-lo kxvq naaiq Jruj waag zyrug nib nuvj naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq, “naaiq taub ka'naaiq yem waaig huvb tiaj Eei Daub peib Navq. maiq tuvq pun ninb zyavb luvb Diaq a'q.”
22.12: “yem Daa-matq-katg zivb maaib laanb myenb, Buaj heug aa-naa-nia. ninb Jxm Hruq zavg Tinb huvb, kan lovj leib latg. yem uaq Eei yiu-Tai myenb haiq taub yaag Taaib ninb.
22.15: weig zu'g ninb xij meib kan ninb zruj zxvb zevj Buaj zwavj myenb meib pwatg Jiaj Zauj haid Jiaj Eei sig.
22.13: aa-naa-nia taaib lxd yia. ninb sruq Jyenq yia Eei ka'Len kxvq, ‘sau-lo yrud aa'b! cvj mavg tu'q pwatg a'q.’ uaq zang yia zyrug mavg tu'q pwatg ninb a'q.
22.1: ninb kxvq, “yetg zwavj kxb yrud Zauj myenb koj myenb aa'b! Toq meib Bua mwavj yia kxvq teij yia Eei Jaub lrug.”
22.26: pcvb pyeiq haid pau-lo Navq naaiq kxvq, ninb mivb naaig uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq, “meib xij Navq haiq nx zruj? uaq laanb myenb mq paag lo-maa myenb.”
22.25: pcv lovg Dopg Laav Dob Jyenq xij Bx'q uaq zang, pau-lo naaig sruq ka'Len uaq taub pcvb pyeiq, “maiq kcvb syemq zwid mq paag lovg pyaab pin Bx'q lo-maa myenb se hxpg leid Eei fai?”

12.18: ta'Eeig Dxm zuaq lob Eei pcv lung Revg. maiq hiuq tu'q pi-te Jiaj haaij mig a'q.
12.8: finb myenb kxvq Buaj ninb, “sai Jyenq hrub Laav cvj taapg Jyenq meib Eei heb.” pi-te zyrug ei Jyenq zruj. finb myenb cvj kxvq, “zx'q meib Eei tomb lwi pwij Jyenq kan Jyenq yia mivb a'q.”
12.3: pwatg yiu-Tai myenb a'Neiq ninb Navq naaiq zruj, ninb cvj mivb zx'q pi-te. uaq zang txij Jiaj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq.
12.21: tunj Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj, he-lotq zxv Jyenq ninb Eei huvb lwib hruj faauj ting zweid Jyenq kxvq pun zwavj myenb mwavj.
12.14: ninb zia'q tu'q pi-te Eei Qiaj zyrug a'Neiq haig cvj Tiuj pia'g pyauq, maiq Javj Kxi kcvb. ninb kxvq Buaj yem pyauq Eei myenb, “pi-te zuvq Tauj uaq Dau kcvb Daavg taaib a'q lo'b!”
12.23: maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb lyemb zeib pun he-lotq putq kcv. kcv zyrug Eang ninb taig mig a'q, laaij ninb maiq Taaib Tinb huvb.
12.6: Tauj he-lotq huvb xij txb pi-te Zwrtq zinb Daavg uaq mwrnd, pi-te pweij i taub pcv Eei Bu'Dovj mFxmb, yaag maaib i tiub Lia'g limg Dob Jyenq. cvj maaib i taub pcv zuaq Jyenq lob kcvb.
12.2: ninb lovg Ru'g Daauq taij yo-han Eei kxj, yaa-kxpg.
12.20: he-lotq Qiaj Jiad haig Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn zivb Eei myenb. naaiq teij i nxm zivb Eei myenb zyrug tovb Hruq mivb lxd he-lotq. maiq kcvb lxd uaq zang, ninb Bua peig Diaq mivb Toq kruj huvb ting uaq taub tomb Jyen, Baa-laa-saa-Tatq, Tevj ninb Bua Zauj huvb tiaj Toq kxvq hxpg, weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei teib puv pavg he-lotq kunq uaq nxm teib puv Eei laavb zi'g yuvd pc'g fivj.
12.24: mq paag Tinb huvb Eei tod yetg zei zunb Javq Jyenq mivb.
12.7: lyemb zeib maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb hing Zwrtq taaib yaag maaib Fav ziuj Jyenq uaq Qovj lob. finb myenb Baij pi-te Eei la'Eaapq Buaj ninb, “pi-te aa'b! pi-te! Govb Jiad sin taaib maa'b!” Dob pi-te Eei puad uaq teij i tiub limg lyemb zeib tavj Dutq Revg mig a'q.
12.19: he-lotq heug pcv kaanq lxd, ninb Bua zyrug haiq Dau lxd Revg yaag lxd maiq pwatg. he-lotq zyrug zaab naaig uaq teij pcv. zaab liud, txb mivb taij kwavg mig a'q. Ga'haaq he-lotq Zwrtq yu-Dia scvq mivb yem trug si-saa-li-yaa zivb.
12.17: pi-te Wavj puad Buaj ninb Bua maiq tuvq Ko lo. ninb zyrug kxvq zyruq Navq haiq nx Tevj ninb Zwrtq lob taaib. ninb cvj kxvq, “naaiq teij Jauq meib Bua xij zu'g Buaj yaa-kxpg cvj Zauj yetg zuvq syenj ye-su Eei kxb yrud.” kxvq liud naaiq teij waag, ninb zyrug mivb kanb nxm txvj mig a'q.
12.11: uaq zang pi-te zyrug mevb pc'g naaiq teij sig se zyen Eei. ninb kxvq, “ib zang yia za'kevb hiuq tivg zyruq Paaiq ninb Eei finb myenb taaib txb yia pyauj Dutq he-lotq Eei puab Diaq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb xij zruj hxig yia uaq teij yetg zuvq sig.”
12.5: pi-te zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob mq paag Jiub paav myenb lovg Hruq Fiag Qa'q weig ninb tauj kauj.
12.9: pi-te kan Jyenq finb myenb Zwrtq lob. ninb maiq hiuq tu'q finb myenb zruj Eei se zyen sig. laaig tu'q pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig Navq.
12.16: pi-te Zxg yem uaq vcvq kcvb. ninb Bua zyrug mivb Kxi kcvb pwatg pi-te sruq Jyenq uaq. ninb Bua za'kevb! Bua'g hxvb haig.
12.4: he-lotq zx'q pi-te taaib wrnj Jyenq lob, Jiu pun pyei kwanb pcv zuaq Jyenq. yetg kwanb maaib pyei laanb. ninb taaq zyavj za'eij zuaq Jiaj liud siaj mcvg zipq, xij txv Jyenq zwavj myenb syemq pi-te Eei zwid.
12.10: ninb Bua Jiaj zuaq lob Eei pcv ta'yetq Kav, cvj Jiaj ta'Eeig Kav, cvj Jiaj Tauj tomb Lia'g kcvb, tovb Zwrtq mivb pia'g zivb uaq Kav kcvb. Tauj uaq, kcvb kanb Gxi, ninb Bua zyrug Zwrtq mig a'q. kan Jauq mivb tavb, finb myenb zyav naaig leib Gxi pi-te mig a'q.
12.22: zwavj myenb naub naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq, “naaiq se yetg taub zyenb Eei Qiaj, maiq zeid paamb myenb kxvq Eei waag.”
12.12: pi-te hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig Ziv Eei, ninb zyrug mivb yo-han maa-Ko Eei maa, maa-li-yaa, Eei pyauq. maaib myenb Zamq Eei kapq zunq yem uaq tauj kauj.
12.15: ninb Bua kxvq, “meib maiq Rav Bx lxb.” mq paag uaq taub sia'q Qa'q kxvq pi-te za'kevb Tauj a'q. ninb Bua kxvq, “uaq Euvg mRiaj pi-te Eei finb myenb mq pei.”
12.13: pi-te mivb vcvq ka'Eiag uaq taub kcvb. maaib taub msia'q pru, Buaj heug lo-Daa, mivb mavg kaaj haiq taub taaib.
12.1: uaq zang he-lotq huvb Jiad kxn zruj to'g hxig ziaj laanb Jiub paav myenb.
12.25: Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Beng suv ninb Bua Eei kov, ninb Bua zyrug Rwrnj yaag txb yo-han maa-Ko Zauj Jyenq Rwrnj.

15.18: lob Nxi pun myenb hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig xij Zwrtq taaib uaq taub zyruq kxvq naaiq teij waag.’+”
15.8: Tinb huvb hiuq tu'q maang myenb Eei Hruq yaag pun Ziv ninb a'Neiq Janj, weig zu'g ninb Zeij sivj livb pun ninb Bua Navq Zeij pun Bua nx.
15.33: yem yetg Zaamj uaq, kxb yrud Bua zyrug fuvj ninb Bua pcvb xn Eei Zwrtq Jauq Rwrnj Tauj Paaiq ninb Bua taaib uaq teij.
15.3: Jiub paav zyrug fuvj ninb Bua Zwrtq Jauq mivb. ninb Bua Jiaj fi-ni-sia Zauj saa-maa-lia scvq, Tauj haaij kxvq Buaj myenb Janj Navq haiq nx kxiq Hruq syenj ye-su. zwavj kxb yrud haid naaiq teij fyenj ninb Bua za'kevb a'Neiq haig.
15.32: yu-Daatg Zauj si-laa zruj trug waag myenb yaag kxvq Zamq Eei Kwinj kxb yrud Bua, xn ninb Bua Eei Hruq, Tevj ninb Bua kaub syenj tu'q henq.
15.21: weig zu'g lob Nxi Tauj ib zang yem nxmb nxm zivb maaib myenb zunb mo-se Eei leid. nxmb nxm tivb kov Nxi maaib myenb yem wig txvb to'g ninb Eei leib latg sru.”
15.35: pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Zxg yem an-Ti-okg zivb. ninb Bua Zauj myenb Zamq Eei Faauj yaag zunb zyruq Eei tod.
15.40: mq paag pau-lo kinq si-laa Zauj ninb mivb. syenj ye-su Eei zwavj myenb zyrug zx'q ninb Bua i laanb fuvj pun zyruq ei ninb Eei en kruj.
15.14: si-mon Zo'q ho'g kxvq liud Tinb huvb lxd Janj taaub Rung, kinq Zwrtq teij taaib zruj ninb Eei myenb.
15.23: kovb zob Zauj myenb koj zyrug fiaq fyenj pun ninb Bua txb Jyenq mivb. fyenj kxvq, “Zyen xij Eei yem an-Ti-okg zivb, si-lia teig Zauj si-li-sia scvq kanb fivj Eei zwavj kxb yrud aag, yia Bua kovb zob Zauj myenb koj, meib Bua Eei kxb yrud, fiaq fyenj pun meib Bua. yia Bua Javj Tauj meib Bua.
15.6: kovb zob Zauj myenb koj yetg zuvq kapq zunq Zaavb laavb naaiq teij sig.
15.34: mq paag si-laa tivg Hruq yem uaq.
15.2: pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Zauj ninb Bua Fiag Qa'q Rcvb vcvg lwrnj leid. Jiub paav zyrug tivg Paaiq pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Zauj teij kxb yrud mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb lxd kovb zob Zauj myenb koj Bua Zaavb laavb naaiq teij sig.
15.36: Ga'haaq Zamb Nxi teij Eei, pau-lo kxvq Buaj Baa-naa-Batg, “Bua xij zu'g Rwrnj mivb mavg kaaj, tovb Bua mivb zunb Jiaj zyruq Eei tod Eei nxmb nxm muvq uaq teij kxb yrud Navq haiq nx x'g?”
15.20: mq paag Bua xij zu'g fiaq fyenj Buaj ninb Bua keg, maiq tuvq Eang ziag Jiaj miub favj zyrug maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq,  maiq tuvq zruj maiq lwrnj hxvg Eei sig,  maiq tuvq Eang nc'g Jaav taig Eei scvb Kuq xq, yaag maiq tuvq Eang Ryaamq.
15.24: yia Bua haid myenb kxvq maaib teij yem yia Bua naaiq Eei myenb mivb meib Bua naaig zunb tod Zo'q meib Bua Eei Hruq lung Revg. mq paag maiq zeid yia Bua Paaiq ninb Bua mivb og.
15.28: sivj livb Zauj yia Bua fib Navq Eei maiq xij Tipq haiq Euvg Jaa pun meib Bua Niaq, Zwrtq liud ib zang fiaq Jyenq naaiq teij Navq.
15.7: ninb Bua lwrnj leid laub Eei, pi-te zyrug sruq Jiad taaib kxvq, “kxb yrud aa'b! meib Bua hiuq tu'q zinb Daavg Tinb huvb yem meib Bua ka'Euad kinq yia Zwrtq mivb zunb Kuq fyenj pun Janj mwavj yaag syenj.
15.29: meib Bua xij zu'g keg maiq tuvq Eang ziag Jiaj miub favj Eei ka'naaiq. maiq tuvq Eang Ryaamq, maiq tuvq Eang nc'g Jaav taig Eei scvb Kuq xq, yaag maiq tuvq zruj maiq lwrnj hxvg Eei sig. sij kxvq meib Bua keg Jyenq naaiq pua'q ka'naaiq zyrug lovj a'q. pcvb xn Eei yem og.”
15.19: yaa-kxpg cvj kxvq, “ziuj yia mavg, Bua maiq hxpg zu'g zruj haiq Euvg pun Win taaib lxd Tinb huvb uaq teij Janj haid a'g haig.
15.17: Navq naaig se weig pun Eiag Eei myenb xij taaib lxd zyruq, tovb yia heug taaib zruj yia Eei myenb uaq teij maang fivj Janj.
15.38: mq paag pau-lo haid maiq hxpg zu'g txb, weig zu'g zinb Daavg uaq Rung, Tauj pam-fi-lia, yo-han maa-Ko kwavg ninb Bua, maiq Zauj ninb Bua zruj kov.
15.31: to'g txv naaiq zeiq fyenj, haid fyenj xn ninb Bua Eei Hruq, taub taub zyrug a'Neiq haig a'q.
15.30: syenj ye-su Eei kxb yrud zyrug fuvj naaiq teij myenb Zwrtq Jauq mivb an-Ti-okg zivb. Tauj uaq ninb Bua heug Jiub paav myenb kapq zunq zyrug zx'q uaq zeiq fyenj pun ninb Bua.
15.27: Navq naaig, yia Bua Paaiq yu-Daatg Zauj si-laa mivb Zauj meib Bua txij Myen kxvq mevb naaiq zeiq fyenj Eei sig.
15.11: maiq zeid Navq naaig lx'g. Bua syenj Bua tu'q Fruj se weig zyruq ye-su Eei en Navq ninb Bua nx.”
15.5: mq paag maaib teij faa-li-sij uaq Jauq syenj ye-su Eei myenb sruq Jiad taaib kxvq, “Dovg haaij xij zu'g heug Janj Jiaj kaatq Eei leid yaag hatg ninb Bua ei Revg mo-se Eei leib latg.”
15.9: yiu-Tai myenb fai Janj Tinb huvb maiq funj kanb Euvg. weig ninb Bua syenj, Tinb huvb Raauj ninb Bua Eei Hruq Zivb Revg.
15.16: ‘Ga'haaq yia xij Rwrnj taaib, xij lyepg Jiad Daa-witq Eei pyaub Baav, cvj lovg lob pyauq Eei ka'naaiq kanb syavb Zeij Jiad.
15.41: Zwrtq Jauq mivb, ninb Jiaj si-lia Zauj si-li-sia scvq Tevj zwavj Jiub paav kaub syenj tu'q wrnq.
15.37: Baa-naa-Batg yaag xij txb yo-han maa-Ko Zauj Jyenq mivb.
15.39: ninb Bua i taub fiub Zovj liud, zyrug pun Gxi txig mig a'q. Baa-naa-Batg txb Jyenq maa-Ko pia'g Ravq mivb sai-patg Kxib Rru.
15.4: mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb uaq zang, Jiub paav myenb, kovb zob Bua, Zauj myenb koj Bua a'Neiq zipq. pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg yaag kxvq Revg Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx lovg ninb Bua zruj ninb Eei kov.
15.10: uaq Euvg, meib Bua weig haiq tiug xij seij Tinb huvb? xij zx'q Niaq Eei ka'naaiq pun naaiq teij saib kxj Eiaj, tovb Bua kanb Zauj Bua Eei ovb Taaij zuvq Eiaj maiq tovd Eei ka'naaiq.
15.22: uaq zang kovb zob Zauj myenb koj Zauj zwavj Jiub paav myenb Zaavb laavb hxpg kinq teij myenb Paaiq kan pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg mivb an-Ti-okg zivb. ninb Bua kinq Eei myenb maaib laanb heug yu-Daatg, cvj maaib nxm Buaj heug Baa-sapq-Baatg. maaib laanb heug si-laa. naaiq teij i laanb yem kxb yrud Bu'Dovj zruj pyeiq zeiq Eei myenb.
15.12: zwavj myenb sekg sekq Eei mwavj Baa-naa-Batg Zauj pau-lo kxvq Tinb huvb lovg ninb Bua yem Janj ka'Euad zruj Eei Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig.
15.15: naaiq za'kevb txij zu'g trug waag myenb Eei waag Navq fiaq Jyenq kxvq nx,
15.13: kxvq setq, yaa-kxpg cvj kxvq, “kxb yrud aag, mwavj yia kxvq og.
15.1: maaib teij myenb yem yu-Dia scvq mivb Tauj an-Ti-okg zivb Faauj syenj ye-su Eei kxb yrud. ninb Bua kxvq, “sij kxvq meib Bua maiq ei Jyenq mo-se Eei leid Jiaj kaatq Eei leid nx, meib Bua maiq haib tu'q Fruj.”
15.26: naaiq teij i laanb weig zyruq ye-su ki-tug Eei Buaj maiq funj mcvg Eei zruj.
15.25: yia Bua zyrug tovb Hruq kinq teij myenb taaib Paaiq ninb Bua mivb meib Bua naaig Zauj Jyenq yia Bua Namq Eei txig, Baa-naa-Batg Zauj pau-lo.

13.18: zyrug yem teib puv Waav Eyend Jyenq ninb Bua zruj Eei sig leib maiq ko feij zyepg Havj.
13.45: mq paag yiu-Tai myenb pwatg myenb taaib tu'q Dovg naaig Zamq, ninb Bua zyrug hang haig, mivb Rcv pau-lo kxvq Eei waag, yaag kxvq to'g ninb.
13.3: ninb Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg yaag tauj kauj, cvj lovg puad maan liud Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo, zyrug Paaiq ninb Bua mivb mig a'q.
13.43: zwavj myenb pun Raanj uaq zang, maaib yiu-Tai myenb Zauj kan yiu-Tai myenb syenj Eei Janj Zamq Eei kan pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg mivb. kovb zob Bua Zauj ninb Bua kxvq yaag Kwinj ninb Bua xij zu'g zanb zang Kauj wrnq Tinb huvb Eei en.
13.50: mq paag yiu-Tai myenb Zo'g huq uaq nxm muvq zruj Lo Eei mJavg txn Zauj kan lovj Tinb huvb zavg tavq Eei msia'q txn zruj to'g pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg, yaag zung ninb Bua Zwrtq ninb Bua Eei teib Jaaij.
13.14: pau-lo Bua cvj yavb Jauq mivb Tauj pi-si-Dia teib puv Eei an-Ti-okg zivb. Tauj tivb kov Nxi ninb Bua pia'g wig txvb zweid Jyenq.
13.48: Janj haid naaiq teij waag zyrug a'Neiq haig, Zev zyruq Eei tod. Tinb huvb kinq taaib weig tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg uaq teij zyrug syenj ye-su a'q.
13.34: cvj maaib waag kxvq Tauj ye-su taig mq paag Tinb huvb pun ninb navb taaib, yetg liud maiq pun ninb Eei sei huq. Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia lcvd pun Daa-witq uaq teij Zivb Revg, Kauj tu'q wrnq Eei en, yia xij Zeij pun meib Bua.’
13.2: ninb Bua paaij zyruq yaag zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg uaq zang, sivj livb Buaj ninb Bua, “Paaiq Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo Zwrtq mivb weig zruj yia xij heug ninb Bua zruj Eei kov.”
13.36: “Daa-witq huvb Eei seij zeiq ei Tinb huvb Eei za'eij zruj zyavj, zyrug kwei seij mig a'q, yaag Zauj ninb Eei ovb Taaij zavj Jyenq. ninb Eei sei yaag huq mig a'q.
13.35: cvj maaib kanb nxm txvj kxvq, ‘meib maiq pun meib Eei Zivb Revg pru Eei sei huq.’
13.24: ye-su maiq kcvb Zwrtq taaib zunb tod uaq zang, yo-han zunb Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb ninb Bua xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid, Jiaj uam Eei leid.
13.7: Baa-ye-su Zauj kunq Kxib Rru uaq taub tomb Jyen, sej-Ji-atg pau-lo, yem. naaiq taub sej-Ji-atg pau-lo se kwai haig. ninb xij mwavj Tinb huvb Eei tod zyrug heug Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo taaib zunb pun ninb mwavj.
13.17: i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb kinq Bua Eei ovb Taaij. ninb Bua yem Jyenq i-yipq teib puv uaq zang, Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua Yaavj, yaag lovg tomb Qa'q txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv,
13.49: zyruq Eei tod zyrug siv pwavq uaq nxm teib puv.
13.11: ib zang zyruq Eei puad Fiag Tauj meib, xij pun meib Eei mziv Buaq yetg Zaamj, mavg maiq pwatg luvb Nxi Eei Fav.” e-li-maatq lyemb zeib haid Navq maaib mrug xmj Jyenq ninb Eei mziv mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj Eei. ninb Lua naaiq Lua uaq lxd myenb Ken.
13.33: ib zang ninb weig Bua, ovb Taaij Eei zeib fun zruj zyavj, se tovb ninb pun ye-su cvj navb taaib. Navq fiaq Jyenq ta'Eeig tiub sivj Ruv kxvq nx, ‘meib zruj yia Eei txn, ib Nxi yia penj meib Eei tia.’
13.16: pau-lo zyrug sruq Jiad taaib Wavj puad kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj yetg zuvq zavg Tinb huvb Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj maa'b!
13.40: faij fim og. Raub heij meib Bua haib zu'g trug waag myenb kxvq Eei waag. ninb Bua kxvq,
13.37: mq paag Tinb huvb pun navb taaib uaq taub Eei sei maiq huq.
13.4: Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo zyrug ei sivj livb Paaiq mivb Tauj se-lu-Kia, yem uaq pia'g Ravq mivb sai-patg Kxib Rru.
13.51: kovb zob Bua zyrug fevj kua'q zauj Eei niab Buv weig zruj Javb hog kwaij ninb Bua, Ga'haaq cvj mivb i-Ko-ni-yum zivb.
13.12: tomb Jyen pwatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq, ninb zyrug syenj a'q. ninb Bua'g hxvb haig zyruq Eei tod.
13.46: pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg zyrug puvj laavg Eei kxvq, “yia Bua Dovg haaij xij zu'g taaib zunb Tinb huvb Eei waag pun meib Bua mwavj Daavg. mq paag meib Bua Gemb, maiq funj meib Bua kanb Pwij tu'q zipq yetg liud Eei mcvg, yia Bua zyrug kwavg meib Bua mivb zunb pun Janj mwavj.
13.13: pau-lo Zauj ninb Eei txig yem paa-fotq pia'g Ravq mivb pam-fi-lia teib puv, pe-kaa zivb. yem uaq ninb Bua pun Gxi txig, yo-han maa-Ko Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
13.26: “zwavj kxb yrud, apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun Zauj yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj paaij Tinb huvb Eei myenb aa'b! naaiq Fruj en Eei tod se zunb taaib pun Bua a'q.
13.28: ninb Bua zaab maiq Zwrtq haiq Euvg kxn zig tu'q taij ninb, mq paag ninb Bua Toq pi-laatq pun ninb zu'g taig.
13.8: mq paag zruj faatq uaq taub e-li-maatq, laanb Jyenq, maiq xij pun scvb zyruq syenj. e-li-maatq uaq nxm Buaj kxvq penj kikg waag se zruj faatq Eei myenb.
13.9: sau-lo, tovb myenb yaag heug pau-lo uaq taub, tu'q sivj livb pwavq Hruq zyrug nu'g nu'q Eei mavg e-li-maatq.
13.32: “yia Bua txb naaiq Kuq fyenj taaib Buaj meib Bua. zinb Daavg Tinb huvb lcvd pun Bua Eei ovb Taaij uaq teij waag,
13.21: naaiq teij myenb Toq saa-mu-en pun ninb Bua maaib huvb kunq ninb Bua. Tinb huvb zyrug pun Ben-yaa-min fivj, Kitq Eei txn, sau-lo, zruj huvb kunq feij zyepg Havj.
13.23: “Tinb huvb ei lcvd Eei waag pun taub Daa-witq Eei zeib fun, Buaj heug ye-su, Zwrtq taaib zruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Fruj zyruq.
13.6: Jiaj Jomg Kxib Rru, Tauj paa-fotq tomb zivb pwavb zu'g taub yiu-Tai myenb, Buaj heug Baa-ye-su. ninb zruj faatq yaag zruj Jaaq trug waag myenb.
13.44: Tauj ta'Eeig nxm tivb kov Nxi zyavb muvq Eei myenb aaq lamb taub taub mivb kapq zunq mwavj Tinb huvb Eei tod.
13.20: naaiq teij Jaub lrug lovg zyavb hog leib maiq ko feij pc'q Mmd zyepg Havj. “Ga'haaq Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua maaib Beng sig myenb kunq ninb Bua Tauj trug waag myenb, saa-mu-en, Eei seij zeiq.
13.5: ninb Bua mivb Tauj saa-laa-mitq muvq zyrug yem yiu-Tai myenb Eei nxmb nxm wig txvb zunb Tinb huvb Eei tod. yo-han maa-Ko yaag Zauj ninb Bua yem, Tevj ninb Bua.
13.19: Tinb huvb myetg Revg yem Kaa-naa-an teib puv Eei siag fivj Janj, yaag zx'q uaq nxm teib puv pun ninb Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb Ripg.
13.38: “yia Eei kxb yrud aa'b! meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq tu'q, weig naaiq taub ye-su yia Bua Zivj tu'q zunb Buaj meib Bua, Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx kwavg myenb Eei zwid.
13.31: ninb hing Zwrtq pun yem kaa-li-li kan ninb mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb uaq teij myenb pwatg Zamb Nxi Eei. naaiq teij myenb ib zang zruj zxvb zevj pun i-saa-laa-en myenb mwavj.
13.52: yem an-Ti-okg zivb Eei syenj ye-su Eei myenb Fyenb yrub haig yaag maaib sivj livb pwavq Revg ninb Bua Eei Hruq.
13.27: yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei zwavj myenb Zauj zruj Lo Eei uaq teij maiq hiuq tu'q ye-su zruj Fruj zyruq. nxmb nxm tivb kov Nxi ninb Bua mwavj myenb to'g zwavj trug waag myenb Eei sru yaag maiq pia'g Hruq. mq paag ninb Bua tivg ye-su Eei zwid uaq zang, ninb Bua zruj zyavj txij Revg uaq teij trug waag myenb kxvq Eei waag.
13.41: ‘mavg maa'b! meib Bua mavg Piaj myenb Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g Bua'g hxvb yaag zu'g myetg, weig zu'g yem meib Bua Eei Nxib Eia'g yia zruj Zwrtq yetg Euvg sig. maiq kunq myenb kxvq Buaj meib Bua, meib Bua zuvq maiq syenj.’+”
13.1: yem an-Ti-okg Jiub paav maaib teij trug waag myenb Zauj teij Faauj leid Eei finb scv. maaib Baa-naa-Batg, maaib si-me-on, si-me-on cvj maaib nxm Buaj heug ni-ke, maaib sai-lin myenb, lu-si-atg, maaib maa-naa-en, (maa-naa-en Zauj he-lotq huvb Jwavg pyauq Lo taaib), cvj maaib sau-lo.
13.39: meib Bua yaag xij zu'g hiuq tu'q kan mo-se Eei leib latg maiq haib pun myenb leib Dutq zwid. mq paag haiq taub syenj Kauj ye-su, uaq taub leib Dutq yetg zuvq zwid.
13.47: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq nx Paaiq yia Bua, ‘yia pun meib zruj nxm Fav ziuj pun Janj, weig pun meib txb Fruj en mivb Tauj Jomg luvb Diaq.’+”
13.10: ninb kxvq, “myenq Eei txnb Jweiq aa'b! haiq Euvg lovj Eei, meib txij uaq Euvg zruj winb wavq. Kuvj kxvb pc'g Duaq myenb Navq. meib maiq tivb Fiag zanb zang zruj pun zyruq Eei Jaub za'g penj Jaub Fwrtq fai?
13.25: yo-han zruj ninb Eei kov aaq lamb zyavj, ninb Buaj zwavj myenb, ‘meib Bua laaig yia tovb haiq taub? yia maiq zeid meib Bua zuaq uaq taub og. yia taaib Daavg, ninb Ga'haaq taaib, yia lyemb maiq Pwij Tevj ninb Jaiq heb Laav.’
13.22: Tinb huvb Twij sau-lo Zwrtq mivb, Ga'haaq xn Daa-witq zruj ninb Bua Eei huvb. Tinb huvb kxvq Tauj Daa-witq. ninb kxvq, ‘yia pwatg Jyetg-si Eei txn, Daa-witq, hxpg yia Eei Hruq haig. ninb yaag xij yem maang sig ei Jyenq yia Eei za'eij zruj.’
13.42: pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Zwrtq wig txvb uaq zang, zwavj myenb Toq ninb Bua Tauj ta'Eeig nxm tivb kov Nxi cvj taaib kxvq naaiq teij waag pun ninb Bua mwavj.
13.15: txb leib paaij Eei myenb to'g leib latg sru Zauj Tinb huvb Eei trug waag myenb Eei sru. to'g liud, wig txvb Eei kunq sig myenb Paaiq myenb mivb Buaj pau-lo Bua, “kxb yrud aag, sij kxvq meib Bua maaib haiq Euvg waag xij Kwinj yia Bua, kunq kxvq og.”
13.29: ninb Bua ei kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq ye-su Eei yetg zuvq Jaub lrug zruj zyavj, zyrug zx'q ye-su Eei sei Fiag zyepg Ravg Jaaj taaib, zavj Jyenq zruq.
13.30: mq paag Tinb huvb pun ninb navb taaib.

1.18: (naaiq taub yu-Daatg lovg ninb zruj waaig sig tu'q taaib Eei Eaanb maaid Rov Dau. ninb yem uaq Rov Dau Dxpg, xpq zu'g ka'sia Baaij, Jaavb pctq Zwrtq Revg.
1.8: mq paag sivj livb Fiag taaib yem meib Bua Eei sin uaq zang, meib Bua zyrug tu'q sivj livb Eei Qa'q yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, mivb kxmj yu-Dia Zauj saa-maa-lia scvq, cvj mivb Jomg luvb Diaq Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj.”
1.3: ye-su zu'g hxig liud mcvg, Ga'haaq feij zyepg Nxi ka'Euad ninb hing Zwrtq Zamb Rung pun ninb Eei kovb zob Bua pwatg, yaag zruj ziaj Euvg pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q tivg ninb za'kevb zyavb Jyenq. ninb yaag Zauj ninb Bua kxvq Tauj Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Jaub lrug.
1.14: cvj maaib teij msia'q txn Zauj ye-su Eei maa, maa-li-yaa, Zauj ye-su Eei yrud Bua. ninb Bua lomb Rxib yem uaq tovb Hruq kuq Jyenq tauj kauj.
1.23: ninb Bua zyrug kinq Zwrtq i taub myenb. maaib taub heug yo-sepq, tovb myenb heug Baa-sapq-Baatg, cvj maaib nxm Buaj heug yu-saa-Tatq. maaib taub heug matq-Ti-atg.
1.6: kapq zunq uaq zang, kovb zob Bua naaig kaaj, “zyruq aa'b! ib zang Tauj zyavb hog meib xij lyepg i-saa-laa-en kua'q Jiad taaib Navq lod uaq nx fai?”
1.2: Tauj Tinb huvb txb ninb faauj Tinb txvb. maiq kcvb faauj Tinb txvb uaq zang, ninb lovg sivj livb Eei Qa'q Paaiq zyavj waag pun ninb kinq taaib Eei kovb zob.
1.20: pi-te cvj kxvq, “sivj Ruv sru yaag fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘Toq pun ninb yem Eei txvj penj Daub Waav, yaag maiq tuvq pun haiq taub yem uaq nxm txvj.’ yaag kxvq, ‘pun ta'Eeig taub Ripg ninb Eei kov.’
1.24: kinq liud, ninb Bua tauj kauj kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! meib hiuq Revg taub taub myenb Eei Hruq. Toq pun yia Bua hiuq tu'q naaiq teij i taub hxpg zu'g lovg haiq taub
1.7: ye-su tau ninb Bua, “zavg tiaj lovg ninb kanb Eei hatg maad tivg taaib Eei zyavb hog Zauj Eutg zeiq haiq zang Tauj maiq zeid meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq.
1.19: ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q naaiq Kav sig zyrug ei ninb Bua Eei waag Zwrtq uaq Rov Dau Eei Buaj heug “aa-Ken-Daa-maa.” eij leid se “maaib Ryaamq Eei Dau.”)
1.17: yu-Daatg zruj yetg taub Bua naaiq kwanb myenb Eei myenb yaag Zauj Bua Jwavg naaiq Euvg kov zruj.”
1.11: “kaa-li-li myenb aa'b! meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg sruq naaiq Qa'q mavg kub vwaaig luvb? leib Gxi meib Bua naaiq taub ye-su, Tinb huvb txb faauj luvb mig a'q. meib Bua pwatg ninb Navq haiq nx mivb, ninb cvj xij Navq uaq nx taaib.”
1.5: yo-han lovg uam Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid mq paag maiq maaib Bu'ziaj Nxi Tinb huvb xij lovg sivj livb Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid.”
1.9: ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag, txv Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Myen Tinb huvb txb ninb faauj luvb mig a'q. kovb zob Bua mavg Jyenq ninb faauj uaq zang, maaib txq Bwrnj taaib Txvq Jyenq ye-su, ninb Bua zyav naaig maiq pwatg mig a'q.
1.16: “zwavj kxb yrud aag, kivb sru fiaq Jyenq zinb Daavg sivj livb lovg Daa-witq huvb trug taaib Eei waag kxvq Tauj yu-Daatg, tovb txb myenb mivb zx'q ye-su uaq taub. naaiq teij sig yaag Zwrtq taaib txib tiug Revg.
1.12: kovb zob Bua yem ka'lanq Bov Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, se leib maiq ko yetg ki-lo Jauq.
1.4: ye-su Zauj kovb zob Bua yem uaq zang, ninb hatg kovb zob Bua, “maiq tuvq Zwrtq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. zuaq Jyenq zipq yia Eei tia lcvd pun Eei zivb Eeig, tovb yia Buaj meib Bua uaq.
1.10: kovb zob Bua Zxg yem uaq nu'g nu'q Eei mavg Jyenq luvb, lyemb zeib maaib i taub myenb zu'q Jyenq lwib pc'g sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ka'Len kxvq,
1.22: Navq naaiq xij zu'g cvj kinq taub myenb taaib Zauj Bua Jwavg Jyenq zruj zyruq ye-su navb taaib Eei zxvb zevj. naaiq taub xij zu'g zruj Bua Eei kwanb Eei myenb, tovb kan zyruq ye-su pia'g pia'g Zwrtg Zwrtq, yem yo-han Tevj Jiaj uam Eei leid Tauj ye-su leib Gxi Bua, Tinb huvb txb faauj Tinb txvb.”
1.15: uaq teij Nxi kapq zunq Eei myenb Riaj maaib leib maiq ko yetg pc'q Eig zyepg taub. pi-te yem zwavj kxb muag Bu'Dovj sruq Jiad taaib kxvq,
1.13: Tauj zivb ninb Bua faauj kub vwaaig ninb Bua tivb uaq Ravb pyauq. taaib zunq uaq zang maaib pi-te, yo-han, yaa-kxpg, an-Daa-lu, fi-lipq, To-matq, Baa-To-lo-miu, matq-Taai, an-fe-atg Eei txn, yaa-kxpg, Namq kua'q zavg uaq taub si-mon, Zauj yaa-kxpg Eei txn, yu-Daatg.
1.1: zyen xij Eei Te-o-fi-latq aag, yia fiaq ta'yetq pwrnq sru kxvq ye-su zruj Eei kov Zauj Faauj Eei waag yem ninb Jiad kxn zruj kov
1.26: tauj kauj liud ninb Bua zyrug tivg mcvg mavg, Dxtq zu'g matq-Ti-atg, zyrug Tim matq-Ti-atg pia'g kovb zob Bua zyepg yetq taub.
1.25: zruj kovb zob fub suj tiq yu-Daatg, tovb kwavg Jyenq ninb Eei pwrng kovb zob Eei kov mivb ninb hxpg zu'g yem Eei txvj uaq taub.”

26.18: yia Paaiq meib mivb pun ninb Bua haib mavg tu'q pwatg, pun yem Mwavj Eei myenb haib Zwrtq taaib yem Fav, yaag yem saa-taan Eei puab Diaq Zwrtq taaib lxd Tinb huvb. ninb Bua zyrug tu'q zwid kwavg liud, yaag tu'q Zauj weig syenj yia penj Zivb Revg myenb uaq teij, maaib ninb Bua Eei pwrng.’
26.8: meib Bua yiu-Tai myenb weig haiq tiug maiq haib syenj myenb taig mivb mq paag Tinb huvb haib pun navb taaib?
26.3: weig zu'g meib hiuq yiu-Tai myenb Eei leib fivj yaag hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Rcv Eei Jauq Zamq Eei. Navq naaig, yia Toq meib lovg nxig mwavj yia kxvq og.
26.32: aa-Gi-Paa yaag kxvq Buaj fe-saa-Tatq, “sij kxvq naaiq laanb myenb maiq kcvb Toq pun lo-maa huvb tunj sig, puvj tu'q Eei.”
26.21: weig naaiq, yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, yiu-Tai myenb zx'q yia, xij taij yia.
26.14: yia Bua yetg zuvq Kiv Fiag Dau mig a'q. yia yaag haid maaib Qiaj kxvq penj hipq-lu waag Buaj yia, ‘sau-lo aa'b! sau-lo! meib weig haiq tiug zruj to'g yia? meib Navq vovb Di'q zung vovb pyaaq hxig kanb zu'g mun.’
26.23: ninb Bua kxvq ki-tug xij zu'g syrug Kruq, yaag kxvq ninb zruj taig mivb cvj navb taaib Eei taaub taub, ninb zyrug ziuj Fav pun yiu-Tai myenb Zauj maang fivj Janj.”
26.6: ib zang yia sruq Jyenq naaiq zu'g syemq se weig yia maaib lamb Namq Tinb huvb xij zruj ei ninb Zauj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij lcvd Jiad Eei vcvg waag.
26.2: ninb kxvq, “aa-Gi-Paa huvb aa'b! yia ib Nxi maaib tomb wrng Qiaj tu'q yem meib Eei Ra'Myen kxvq yiu-Tai myenb koj yia Eei yetg zuvq sig,
26.20: yia zyrug yem Daa-matq-katg zivb zunb tod Daavg, Ga'haaq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, cvj mivb kxmj i-saa-laa-en teib puv, cvj Zwrtq mivb Janj Eei txvj zunb tod pun zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q ninb Bua xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid Rwrnj taaib lxd Tinb huvb yaag zruj sig pun Ziv ninb Bua za'kevb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid mig a'q.
26.24: pau-lo Navq naaiq nx kxvq Jaiq sin Eei waag, fe-saa-Tatq zyrug heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq, “pau-lo aa'b! meib maiq Rav Bx lxb. to'g tu'q sru Lav haig, pun meib maiq Rav a'q.”
26.28: aa-Gi-Paa huvb Buaj pau-lo, “zyavb hog Dovg naaiq navq meib Namq taaib meib haib pun yia xij penj ki-tug myenb fai?”
26.7: yia Bua zyepg Eeig fivj yiu-Tai myenb yaag fib Navq Eei maaib naaiq Euvg maaib lamb Namq Zivj taaib Dxm zinb Ryruq Mwavj zavg Tinb huvb zuaq Jyenq. huvb tiaj aa'b! se weig naaiq Euvg maaib lamb Namq yiu-Tai myenb Zivj taaib koj yia.
26.29: pau-lo tau, “maiq kunq zyavb hog Daauq fai navq, yia Toq Tinb huvb pun meib Zauj yem naaiq Eei zwavj myenb yetg zuvq penj Revg Navq yia nx, Zwrtq liud maiq maaib Lia'g limg Dob Navq.”
26.19: “aa-Gi-Paa huvb aa'b! yia maiq vcvg yetg teij yem luvb hing yaavb Eei sig.
26.17: yia xij Fruj meib Zwrtq yiu-Tai myenb Eei puab Diaq cvj Zauj yia Paaiq meib mivb uaq teij Janj Eei puab Diaq.
26.31: Zwrtq mivb. laanb Zauj laanb kxvq, “maiq pwatg naaiq laanb myenb txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taij fai wrnj lob.”
26.30: kxvq liud, aa-Gi-Paa huvb Zauj zuvj Zauj Be-nitq Zauj yem uaq Eei zwavj myenb Jiad sin
26.27: aa-Gi-Paa huvb aa'b! meib syenj Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb Eei waag fai? yia hiuq tu'q meib syenj Eei.”
26.11: yia mivb nxmb nxm wig txvb hxig ninb Bua Zamb Rung a'q. xij aapq ninb Bua kxvq Ki ye-su. yia Qiaj Jiad haig ninb Bua, zuvq mivb Tauj Eiag kua'q Eei zivb zruj to'g ninb Bua.
26.5: ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia laub haig a'q. sij kxvq ninb Bua Eung Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj nx, ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia zruj faa-li-sij myenb, tovb kan leid kaub mwrng Jiaj uaq Jauq.
26.9: “zinb Daavg yia yaag Namq yia xij zu'g lovg Revg za'eij zruj to'g naa-saa-letq muvq uaq taub ye-su Eei Buaj.
26.16: ib zang Jiad sin sruq Jyenq maa'b! yia hing pun meib pwatg weig Paaiq meib zruj yia Eei pru. yia xij meib kan yia zruj zxvb zevj kxvq ib Nxi meib pwatg yia naaiq teij sig cvj Zauj Ga'haaq yia xij pun meib pwatg Eei sig.
26.4: “zwavj yiu-Tai myenb hiuq tu'q yia Eei seij Navq haiq nx. yem yia lunj Eei zyavb hog yia yem yia kanb Eei pwrnb kua'q Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
26.10: yia yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Navq naaig zruj. sai myenb pyeiq pun yia maaib livg zx'q syenj ye-su Eei myenb Zamq Eei taaib wrnj Jyenq lob. ninb Bua zu'g tivg taij uaq zang yia yaag a'Neiq Eei.
26.22: mq paag maaib Tinb huvb Tevj yia Tauj ib Nxi, yia zyrug sruq Jyenq naaiq zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen zruj zxvb zevj pun zruj Lo zruj faij Eei mwavj. yia kxvq Eei se fib Navq trug waag myenb Zauj mo-se kxvq xij Zwrtq taaib Eei sig Navq.
26.12: “maaib Rung yia tu'q sai myenb pyeiq Eei hatg maad Zauj livg mivb Daa-matq-katg zivb.
26.15: “yia zyrug naaig kaaj, ‘zyruq aa'b! meib tovb haiq taub?’ “zyruq tau, ‘yia se ye-su, tovb meib zruj to'g uaq taub.
26.13: huvb tiaj aa'b! yia kan Jauq mivb kau, luvb aanj a'q. yia pwatg yem kub vwaaig luvb maaib Fav, kaub Fav Jiaj Ba'Nxi, ziuj kxmj yia Zauj kan Jyenq yia uaq teij myenb.
26.1: aa-Gi-Paa huvb kxvq Buaj pau-lo, “ib zang yia iq Zovb meib kxvq meib kanb Eei Jauq a'q.” pau-lo zyrug suv puad Zwrtq kxvq Jaiq sin Eei waag.
26.26: huvb tiaj hiuq Revg naaiq teij Euvb Euvg sig, yia zyrug puvj laavg Eei kxvq Revg pun meib mwavj. yia syenj maiq maaib yetg Euvg meib maiq hiuq, weig zu'g maiq zeid pivj Jyenq zruj Eei sig.
26.25: pau-lo tau, “fe-saa-Tatq tomb zyruq aa'b! yia maiq zeid maiq Rav lx'g. yia kxvq Eei se maiq zeid maiq Rav Eei waag. se za'kevb zyen Eei, Zivb Zoq Eei.

25.18: koj ninb uaq teij sruq Jiad sin taaib kxvq mq paag maiq koj Navq yia laaig ninb Bua xij koj Eei x'q sig nx.
25.8: pau-lo zyrug kxvq Jaiq sin Eei waag. ninb kxvq, “yia maiq zruj txvg yiu-Tai myenb Eei haiq Euvg leid fai zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq fai lo-maa tomb ziub huvb.”
25.3: Toq ninb Tevj teij ninb Bua, fuvj pau-lo mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx Toq weig zu'g ninb Bua taaq za'eij tavq Jyenq Daamb Jauq taij pau-lo.
25.21: mq paag pau-lo Toq mivb tomb ziub huvb uaq syemq, yia zyrug heug pcv txb mivb Kwrnj Jyenq zuaq Tauj yia maaib zyavb hog Zivj pun ninb mivb lo-maa huvb uaq.”
25.14: yem uaq Zamb Nxi teij Eei, fe-saa-Tatq zx'q pau-lo Eei Jauq kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj. ninb kxvq, “maaib laanb myenb, fe-likq Zwrtq uaq zang zx'q ninb Kwrnj Jyenq naaiq.
25.23: ta'Eeig Nxi aa-Gi-Paa Zauj Be-nitq zxv Rxib, Zauj tomb pcvb pyeiq Bua Zauj uaq nxm zivb zruj Lo Eei, maaib mevb taub Eei myenb, hrug Jyenq pia'g huvb Jaa Eei tomb wig txvb. taaib Rxib, fe-saa-Tatq heug myenb txb pau-lo pia'g taaib.
25.6: fe-saa-Tatq yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb maiq kaub laub Yetg Nxi fai zyepg Nxi Zivj taaib Rwrnj si-saa-li-yaa zivb. ta'Eeig Nxi ninb zweid Jyenq sig txvb heug myenb txb pau-lo taaib.
25.2: sai myenb pyeiq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Eei pyeiq zyrug mivb fe-saa-Tatq uaq koj pau-lo,
25.20: yia maiq hiuq tu'q xij zu'g Navq haiq nx Beng naaiq teij sig zyrug naaig pau-lo ninb Eung mivb ye-lu-saa-lem tunj naaiq teij sig fai?
25.24: fe-saa-Tatq kxvq, “aa-Gi-Paa huvb Zauj yem naaiq Eei zwavj myenb aa'b! meib Bua pwatg naaiq laanb myenb. yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj yem naaiq Eei yetg zwavj yiu-Tai myenb naug Jyenq kxvq ninb maiq hxpg zu'g maaib mcvg zyavb a'q.
25.7: pau-lo pia'g taaib, yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb taaib koj ninb uaq teij myenb sruq Wiv kxmj lxd zwid Niaq Eei koj pau-lo mq paag maiq maaib yetg yemg maaib zxvb zevj zyen.
25.19: ninb Bua Kuvj Rcv Tauj ninb Bua yiu-Tai myenb Eei leid Navq, yaag Rcv Tauj laanb myenb, Buaj heug ye-su. ninb taig mivb mq paag pau-lo kxvq ninb Zxg zyavb Jyenq Eei.
25.17: koj ninb uaq teij myenb taaib Tauj naaiq yia maiq vaib. ta'Eeig Nxi Navq yia mivb zweid sig txvb heug myenb txb pau-lo pia'g taaib.
25.27: weig zu'g ei yia Namq, fuvj zwib myenb mivb yaag maiq maaib koj ninb Eei waag se maiq hxpg.”
25.11: sij kxvq yia zruj txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taig, yia yaag maiq vcvg. mq paag sij kxvq naaiq teij yiu-Tai myenb taaib koj yia naaiq teij sig maiq zyen nx, maiq maaib haiq taub maaib leid zx'q yia Jiu pun ninb Bua. yia Toq pun lo-maa tomb ziub huvb syemq zwid.”
25.5: sij kxvq pau-lo zruj txvg haiq tiug, xij zu'g pun teij meib Bua zruj Lo Eei myenb kan Jyenq yia mivb koj ninb.”
25.9: fe-saa-Tatq xij yiu-Tai myenb a'Neiq ninb zyrug naaig pau-lo, “meib Eung mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb pun yia tunj meib Eei sig fai?”
25.16: mq paag yia tau ninb Bua, Navq naaig zruj se maiq hxpg lo-maa myenb Eei leid. maiq kunq haiq taub maaib sig, xij zu'g pun ninb Zauj koj ninb uaq teij txij zevj Zivj taaib zx'q ninb Jiu pun haiq taub.
25.4: fe-saa-Tatq tau, “pau-lo Kwrnj Jyenq yem si-saa-li-yaa zivb. maiq navg laub yia yaag xij Rwrnj a'q.
25.10: pau-lo kxvq, “ib zang yia sruq Jyenq lo-maa huvb Eei sig txvb, hxpg zu'g yem naaiq tunj yia Eei sig. yia maiq zruj haiq Euvg txvg yiu-Tai myenb, meib kanb yaag za'kevb hiuq Eei.
25.22: aa-Gi-Paa kxvq Buaj fe-saa-Tatq, “yia kanb yaag xij mwavj ninb kxvq.” fe-saa-Tatq kxvq, “uaq Euvg, Fav Nxi meib tu'q mwavj ninb kxvq a'q.”
25.12: fe-saa-Tatq Zauj ninb Eei kunq sig myenb Zaavb laavb liud ninb zyrug kxvq, “meib Toq lo-maa huvb syemq zwid, uaq Euvg meib zuvq xij zu'g mivb lo-maa huvb uaq a'q.”
25.15: yia mivb ye-lu-saa-lem uaq zang, sai myenb pyeiq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Eei myenb koj taaib koj ninb yaag Toq yia tivg ninb Eei zwid.
25.13: Ga'haaq laub teij, aa-Gi-Paa huvb Zauj Be-nitq mivb si-saa-li-yaa zivb wig pwavb fe-saa-Tatq, Zauj ninb Ryaaug.
25.1: fe-saa-Tatq taaib Tauj ninb Eei scvq, zruj Jyenq zuvj tu'q pua Nxi, ninb Zwrtq si-saa-li-yaa mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
25.26: mq paag yia lxd maiq tu'q haiq Euvg sig fiaq pun lo-maa huvb. yia zyrug txb ninb taaib naaiq, meib Bua Eei Ra'Myen, yaag levg Jeiq Eei yem meib, aa-Gi-Paa huvb, Eei Ra'Myen, weig zaab naaig ninb, yia Zivj taaib maaib waag fiaq.
25.25: mq paag yia zaab naaig ninb, maiq pwatg ninb txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taij ninb. ninb kanb Toq pun lo-maa tomb ziub huvb tunj sig yia zyrug tivg Hruq fuvj ninb mivb.
